Key.Chinese: 卡米諾練靶場
Key.Chinesesimp: 卡米诺射击靶场

Key.Original: Camp Rogain
Key.Chinese: 羅根營地
Key.Chinesesimp: 罗根营地

Container.name: A_Warn_No_Leader
Container.situation: player warns himself about leaving the ao

Key.Original: Where the hell am I? I should check my map.
Key.Chinese: 我到底在哪裡?我應該檢查一下地圖。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我到底在哪里？我应该检查一下地图。

Key.Original: This doesn't look right at all. Where am I?
Key.Chinese: 這看起來不太對。我在哪?
Key.Chinesesimp: 这看起来不太对。我在哪？

Key.Original: Wow, I must be way off course. Better check my map.
Key.Chinese: 哇，我一定走錯路了。最好檢查一下我的地圖。
Key.Chinesesimp: 哇，我一定走错路了。最好检查一下我的地图。

Container.name: A_Warn_Leader_Dead
Container.situation: miller warns the player about leaving the ao

Key.Original: Corporal, you're heading into a minefield. Get back to the mission area.
Key.Chinese: 下士，你正在向地雷區前進。趕快返回任務區域。
Key.Chinesesimp: 下士，你正在向地雷区前进。赶快返回任务区域。

Key.Original: Heads-up, soldier, you're approaching a minefield. Suggest you return to the AO, over.
Key.Chinese: 注意，大兵，你正在接近一處地雷區。建議你趕快返回行動區域，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 注意，大兵，你正在接近一处地雷区。建议你赶快返回行动区域，完毕。

Key.Original: Corporal Kerry, this is Captain Miller. You're heading into a minefield, soldier. Suggest you turn around. Over.
Key.Chinese: 下士克里，這裡是米勒上校。你正在向地雷區前進，大兵。建議你趕快轉身。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 下士克里，这里是米勒上校。你正在向地雷区前进，大兵。建议你赶快转身。完毕。

Container.name: A_Warn_Has_Leader
Container.situation: player's co warns player about leaving the ao

Key.Original: Kerry, where the fuck are you going? Get back here!
Key.Chinese: 克里，你他媽的在幹什麼?趕快回來這裡!
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，你他妈的在干什么？赶快回来这里！

Key.Original: Uh, Kerry, we're over here. The hell are you going?
Key.Chinese: 恩，克里，我們在這邊。你到底想去哪裡?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，克里，我们在这边。你到底想去哪里？

Key.Original: Corporal! Get back here!
Key.Chinese: 下士!立刻給我滾回來!
Key.Chinesesimp: 下士！立刻给我滚回来！

Key.Original: Instructor: %1
Key.Chinese: 教官:%1
Key.Chinesesimp: 教官：%1

Key.Original: NEW ADVICE AVAILABLE
Key.Chinese: 有新的建議
Key.Chinesesimp: 有新的建议

Key.Original: The East Wind
Key.Chinese: 東風
Key.Chinesesimp: 东风

Key.Original: Survive and adapt to unforgiving circumstances, and win victory over a more powerful enemy.
Key.Chinese: 在無情的狀況下生存與適應，並在強大的敵人壓境之下贏取勝利。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在无情的状况下生存与适应，并在强大的敌人压境之下赢取胜利。

Key.Original: Survive
Key.Chinese: 生存
Key.Chinesesimp: 生存

Key.Original: Tensions rise as NATO peacekeeping forces begin to leave The Republic of Altis: a strategic fault-line between crumbling European influence and a powerful, resurgent East.
Key.Chinese: 緊張的局勢隨著北約的維和部隊逐漸撤出阿爾蒂斯共和國共和國而上升，阿爾蒂斯共和國是個夾在日漸沒有影響力的歐洲，以及實力逐漸強大的東方國家中間的一個戰略斷層。
Key.Chinesesimp: 局势随着北约维和部队逐渐撤出阿尔蒂斯共和国而日趋紧张，该国是夹在日渐丧失影响力的欧洲和实力逐渐强大的东方国家中间的一个战略断层。

Key.Original: Contextual hints
Key.Chinese: 相關提示
Key.Chinesesimp: 相关提示

Key.Original: Instructor figure:
Key.Chinese: 教官提醒:
Key.Chinesesimp: 教官提醒：

Key.Original: Instructor
Key.Chinese: 教官
Key.Chinesesimp: 教官

Key.Original: Near Altis
Key.Chinese: 靠近阿爾蒂斯附近
Key.Chinesesimp: 阿尔蒂斯附近

Key.Original: South-west %1
Key.Chinese: %1的西南方
Key.Chinesesimp: %1的西南方

Key.Original: Near %1
Key.Chinese: 靠近%1
Key.Chinesesimp: 靠近%1

Key.Original: South %1
Key.Chinese: %1的南方
Key.Chinesesimp: %1的南方

Key.Original: West %1
Key.Chinese: %1的西方
Key.Chinesesimp: %1的西方

Key.Original: South-east %1
Key.Chinese: %1的東南方
Key.Chinesesimp: %1的东南方

Key.Original: Near Stratis
Key.Chinese: 靠近斯特拉蒂斯
Key.Chinesesimp: 靠近斯特拉蒂斯

Key.Original: Central %1
Key.Chinese: %1的中部
Key.Chinesesimp: %1的中部

Key.Original: East %1
Key.Chinese: %1的東方
Key.Chinesesimp: %1的东方

Key.Original: North %1
Key.Chinese: %1的北方
Key.Chinesesimp: %1的北方

Key.Original: North-east %1
Key.Chinese: %1的東北方
Key.Chinesesimp: %1的东北方

Key.Original: North-west %1
Key.Chinese: %1的西北方
Key.Chinesesimp: %1的西北方

Key.Original: Adams
Key.Chinese: 亞當斯
Key.Chinesesimp: 亚当斯

Key.Original: Akhanteros
Key.Chinese: 阿坎特羅斯
Key.Chinesesimp: 阿坎特罗斯

Key.Original: MacKinnon
Key.Chinese: 麥金農
Key.Chinesesimp: 麦金农

Key.Original: Conway
Key.Chinese: 康維
Key.Chinesesimp: 康维

Key.Original: Mitchell
Key.Chinese: 米徹爾
Key.Chinesesimp: 米彻尔

Key.Original: Georgious
Key.Chinese: 伊奧爾伊奧斯
Key.Chinesesimp: 伊奥尔伊奥斯

Key.Original: Jim
Key.Chinese: 吉姆
Key.Chinesesimp: 吉姆

Key.Original: Joe
Key.Chinese: 喬
Key.Chinesesimp: 乔

Key.Original: Mark
Key.Chinese: 馬克
Key.Chinesesimp: 马克

Key.Original: Air Wing
Key.Chinese: 空軍聯隊
Key.Chinesesimp: 航空联队

Key.Original: Post civil-war armed forces loyal to the new hard-line Altis government. Limited but growing in strength. Entrenched in a long-standing conflict with FIA guerrillas.
Key.Chinese: 在內戰後創立，效忠於阿爾蒂斯新的強硬派政府。實力雖然有限，不過卻在穩定變強當中。現在還在跟自由獨立同盟游擊隊做長期抗戰。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在内战后创立，效忠于阿尔蒂斯新的强硬派政府。实力有限但正在稳定加强。现在还在跟 FIA 游击队长期作战。

Key.Original: Altis Armed Forces
Key.Chinese: 阿爾蒂斯武裝力量
Key.Chinesesimp: 阿尔蒂斯武装部队

Key.Original: The surviving remnants of TF Aegis, led by UKSF Captain Scott Miller.
Key.Chinese: 由"神盾"特遣隊的倖存者們所組成，並由英國特種部隊，上校斯考特·米勒來指揮。
Key.Chinesesimp: 由"宙斯盾"特遣队的幸存者们所组成，并由英国特种部队斯考特·米勒上校指挥。

Key.Original: Miller's CTRG (Combat Technology Research Group) team. Operational remit unknown.
Key.Chinese: 米勒的戰研大隊。任務內容未知。
Key.Chinesesimp: 米勒的战研大队（战斗技术研究大队）小组。任务内容未知。

Key.Original: A weakened squad composed of mainly non-combat and walking-wounded, usually tasked with providing support.
Key.Chinese: 一個弱小的分隊，主要由非戰鬥人員與還可行走的傷兵所組成，通常被分配的任務都屬支援性任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一个减员班，主要由非战斗人员与还可行走的伤兵组成，通常负责支援性任务。

Key.Original: Secondary squad, tasked with providing recon and backup to Alpha.
Key.Chinese: 第二分隊，主要是為Alpha分隊提供偵察與後援等任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 第二班，主要是为 Alpha 提供侦察与后援等任务。

Key.Original: Primary squad, comprised of mostly experienced soldiers, capable of a variety of mission profiles.
Key.Chinese: 第一分隊，成員多數為經驗豐富的士兵，足以應付各種任務內容。
Key.Chinesesimp: 第一班，成员多数为经验丰富的士兵，足以应付各种任务内容。

Key.Original: A US-led joint NATO-AAF peacekeeping force stationed on Stratis, with a strictly limited mandate and combat capacity.
Key.Chinese: 一支由美國領軍的聯合維和部隊，旗下還有北約與阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的參與，該部隊被派駐在斯特拉蒂斯島上，其任務內容與作戰能力都有嚴格的限制。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一支由美国主导的北约—阿尔蒂斯联合维和部队，该部队被派驻在斯特拉蒂斯岛上，其任务内容与作战能力都有严格的限制。

Key.Original: TF Aegis
Key.Chinese: "神盾"特遣隊
Key.Chinesesimp: "宙斯盾"特遣队

Key.Original: Task Force Aegis
Key.Chinese: "神盾"特遣隊
Key.Chinesesimp: "宙斯盾"特遣队

Key.Original: 'So long as there are men there will be wars' - Albert Einstein
Key.Chinese: '只要有人類，就會有戰爭。'-阿爾伯特愛因斯坦
Key.Chinesesimp: '只要有人类，就会有战争。'-阿尔伯特·爱因斯坦

Key.Original: 'Only the dead are safe; only the dead have seen the end of war.' - George Santayana
Key.Chinese: '只有死者才是安全的;只有死者才能看到戰爭的終結。'-喬治桑塔亞那
Key.Chinesesimp: '只有死者才是安全的;只有死者才能看到战争的终结。'-乔治·桑塔亚那

Key.Original: 'War is very simple, but in War the simplest things become very difficult' - Carl von Clausewitz
Key.Chinese: '在戰爭中，一切事情都很簡單，但最簡單的事情往往是最困難的。'-卡爾馮克勞塞維茲
Key.Chinesesimp: '在战争中，一切事情都很简单，但最简单的事情往往是最困难的。'-卡尔·冯·克劳塞维兹

Key.Original: 'The quickest way to end a war is to lose it.' - George Orwell
Key.Chinese: '結束戰爭最快的方法就是戰敗。'-喬治歐威爾
Key.Chinesesimp: '结束战争最快的方法就是战败。'-乔治·奥威尔

Key.Original: 'War is a series of disasters which result in a winner.' - Georges Clemenceau
Key.Chinese: '戰爭就是一系列走向勝利的災難。'-喬治克列孟梭
Key.Chinesesimp: '战争就是一系列走向胜利的灾难。'-乔治·克列孟梭

Key.Original: 'You can't say that civilization doesn't advance, however, for in every war they kill you in a new way.' - Will Rogers
Key.Chinese: '你不能說文明沒有進步，因為它總是在每一場戰爭中用新的方法殺掉你。'-威爾羅傑斯
Key.Chinesesimp: '你不能说文明没有进步，因为它总是在每一场战争中用新的方法杀掉你。'-威尔·罗杰斯

Key.Original: 'When war is declared, truth is the first casualty.' - Arthur Ponsonby
Key.Chinese: '當戰爭開始，真相就是第一個傷亡者。'-阿瑟龐森比
Key.Chinesesimp: '当战争开始，真相就是第一个伤亡者。'-阿瑟·庞森比

Key.Original: 'Brave men are all vertebrates, they have their softness on the surface and their toughness in the middle.' - Lewis Carroll
Key.Chinese: '勇敢的人就像脊椎動物一樣，有著柔軟的表面與堅硬的內在。'-路易斯卡羅
Key.Chinesesimp: '勇敢的人就像脊椎动物一样，有着柔软的表面与坚硬的内在。'-路易斯·卡罗

Key.Original: 'When defeat comes, accept it as a signal that your plans are not sound, rebuild those plans, and set sail once more toward your coveted goal.' - Napolean
Key.Chinese: '當失敗來臨時，接受它作為你計畫不全的一個信號，重建你的計劃，再次向你的目標揚帆啟航。'-拿破侖希爾
Key.Chinesesimp: '当失败来临时，接受它作为你计划不全的一个信号，重建你的计划，再次向你的目标扬帆启航。'-拿破仑·希尔

Key.Original: 'Much good work is lost for the lack of a little more.' - Edward Harriman
Key.Chinese: '很多出色的工作都因為一點點的不足而失敗。'-愛德華哈里曼
Key.Chinesesimp: '很多出色的工作都因为一点点的不足而失败。'-爱德华·哈里曼

Key.Original: 'The object of war is not to die for your country but to make the other bastard die for his.' - General George S. Patton
Key.Chinese: '戰爭的目的不是為了讓你為國捐軀，而是讓那些混蛋為他們的國家去死。'-小喬治史密斯巴頓將軍
Key.Chinesesimp: '战争的目的不是为了让你为国捐躯，而是让那些混蛋为他们的国家去死。'-小乔治·史密斯·巴顿将军

Key.Original: 'You can no more win a war than you can win an earthquake.' - Jeannette Rankin
Key.Chinese: '你無法打贏一場戰爭，就像你無法打贏地震一樣。'-傑尼特蘭金
Key.Chinesesimp: '你无法打赢一场战争，就像你无法打赢地震一样。'-杰尼特·兰金

Key.Original: 'Death is more universal than life. Everyone dies but not everyone lives.' - A. Sachs
Key.Chinese: '死亡比生存更為普遍。每個人都會死亡，但不是每個人都能活下來。'-安德魯薩克斯
Key.Chinesesimp: '死亡比生存更为普遍。每个人都会死亡，但不是每个人都能活下来。'-安德鲁·萨克斯

Key.Original: 'Courage is being scared to death - but saddling up anyway.' - John Wayne
Key.Chinese: '所謂的勇氣就是就算你被嚇得半死-它仍隨時整裝待發。'-約翰韋恩
Key.Chinesesimp: '所谓的勇气就是就算你被吓得半死—仍随时整装待发。'-约翰·韦恩

Key.Original: 'Experience is a hard teacher because she gives the test first, the lesson afterwards.' - Vernon Sanders Law
Key.Chinese: '經驗是位嚴厲的老師，因為她總是先給你考試，才再給你上課。'-弗農桑得斯勞
Key.Chinesesimp: '经验是位严厉的老师，因为她总是先给你考试，才再给你上课。'-弗农·桑得斯·劳

Key.Original: 'We succeed only as we identify in life, or in war, or in anything else, a single overriding objective, and make all other considerations bend to that one objective.' - Dwight D. Eisenhower
Key.Chinese: '在人生，戰場及其它任何事，只有當我們確認一個最重要的目標，並讓其它考量都為此目標讓步時，我們才會成功。'-德懷特大衛艾森豪
Key.Chinesesimp: '在人生，战场及其它任何事，只有当我们确认一个最重要的目标，并让其它考量都为此目标让步时，我们才会成功。'-德怀特·大卫·艾森豪威尔

Key.Original: 'We improve ourselves by victories over ourselves. There must be contest, and we must win.' - Edward Gibbon
Key.Chinese: '我們通過戰勝自己來改進自我。這是一個比賽，而你必須贏。'-愛德華吉本
Key.Chinesesimp: '我们通过战胜自己来改进自我。这是一个比赛，而你必须赢。'-爱德华·吉本

Key.Original: 'It is well that war is so terrible -- lest we should grow too fond of it.' - General Robert E. Lee
Key.Chinese: '幸好戰爭很可怕，要不然我們可能會更喜歡它。'-羅伯愛德華李將軍
Key.Chinesesimp: '幸好战争很可怕，要不然我们可能会更喜欢它。'-罗伯特·爱德华·李将军

Key.Original: 'War seems sweet until one tastes it. Known, it takes the heart and wastes it.' - Pindar
Key.Chinese: '戰爭看起來是甜蜜的，直到某人去嚐試它為止。以知的，它需要心臟與浪費來品嚐。'-品達
Key.Chinesesimp: '战争看起来是甜蜜的，直到某人去尝试它为止。以知的，它需要心脏与浪费来品尝。'-品达

Key.Original: 'War is harmful, not only to the conquered but to the conqueror.' - Ludwig von Mises
Key.Chinese: '戰爭是有害的，不僅對被征服的也對征服者有害。'-路德維希馮米塞斯
Key.Chinesesimp: '战争是有害的，不仅对被征服的也对征服者有害。'-路德维希·冯·米塞斯

Key.Original: 'Wars are like deaths, which, while they can be postponed, will come when they will come and cannot be finally avoided.' - Philip Bobbitt
Key.Chinese: '戰爭就像死亡，它能被推遲，但該來的時候還是會來，不可避免。'-菲利普博比特
Key.Chinesesimp: '战争就像死亡，它能被推迟，但该来的时候还是会来，不可避免。'-菲利普·博比特

Key.Original: 'War does not decide who is right, war decides who is left' - Bertrand Russell
Key.Chinese: '戰爭不會決定誰是對的，戰爭只會決定誰會活下來。'-伯特蘭羅素
Key.Chinesesimp: '战争不会决定谁是对的，战争只会决定谁会活下来。'-伯特兰·罗素

Key.Original: 'In war there is no substitute for victory.' - General Douglas MacArthur
Key.Chinese: '在戰爭中，沒有任何東西能夠取代勝利。'-道格拉斯麥克阿瑟將軍
Key.Chinesesimp: '在战争中，没有任何东西能够取代胜利。'-道格拉斯·麦克阿瑟将军

Key.Original: 'In war, there are no unwounded soldiers.' - José Narosky
Key.Chinese: '在戰爭中，沒有不受傷的士兵。'-喬斯納洛斯基
Key.Chinesesimp: '在战争中，没有不受伤的士兵。'-乔斯·纳洛斯基

Key.Original: 'A man's dying is more the survivors' affair than his own.' - Thomas Mann
Key.Chinese: '人一死，活人的事比死人還多。'-托馬斯曼
Key.Chinesesimp: '人一死，活人的事比死人还多。'-托马斯·曼

Key.Original: Although five years have passed since bloody civil war was brought to an end in the Republic of Altis and Stratis, the impact upon civilian infrastructure remains marked.
Key.Chinese: 雖然阿爾蒂斯和斯特拉蒂斯共和國的血腥內戰已經結束了五年，但其帶給民用基礎設施的影響仍然持續到了今天。
Key.Chinesesimp: 虽然阿尔蒂斯和斯特拉蒂斯共和国的血腥内战已经结束了五年，但其带给民用基础设施的影响仍然持续到了今天。

Key.Original: Thousands of families remain displaced, refugees scattered across countries around the Mediterranean basin.
Key.Chinese: 成千上萬的家庭流離失所，難民被分散在地中海沿岸的國家中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 成千上万的家庭流离失所，难民被分散在地中海沿岸的国家中。

Key.Original: However, with the US-led peacekeeping deployment coming to an end of its mandate, NATO forces are finalising their staged withdrawal from the region.
Key.Chinese: 然而，隨著以美國為首的維和部隊即將結束其任務，北約部隊現在正開始從該地區撤離。
Key.Chinesesimp: 然而，随着以美国为首的维和部队即将结束其任务，北约部队现在正开始从该地区撤离。

Key.Original: As millions of dollars of military equipment and infrastructure is decommissioned, opinion is split as to the wisdom of the drawdown.
Key.Chinese: 上百萬美元的軍用裝備與設施將原地拆解，有人懷疑，這是否是聰明的決定。
Key.Chinesesimp: 价值上百万美元的军用装备与设施将原地拆解，有人怀疑这是否是明智的决定。

Key.Original: In light of CSAT forces stepping up joint military exercises in the Pacific, the US is keen to re-orient its conventional forces, reinforcing battalions in the east.
Key.Chinese: 隨著廣協同盟部隊加緊準備其在太平洋的軍事演習，美國決定移防常規部隊，加強其在東方的防禦。
Key.Chinesesimp: 随着广协部队加紧准备其在太平洋的联合军事演习，美国决定移防常规部队，加强其在东方的防御。

Key.Original: Yet, with the Mediterranean basin representing a strategic fault-line between crumbling European influence and a powerful, resurgent East, some argue that the withdrawal could not come at a worse time.
Key.Chinese: 然而，有些人認為不該選在這麼糟的時間撤軍，因為撤軍會讓地中海變成被夾在沒啥影響力的歐洲與日漸強盛的東方國家中間，成為一個戰略斷層。
Key.Chinesesimp: 然而，有些人认为不该选在这么糟的时间撤军，因为撤军会让地中海变成被夹在影响力日趋没落的欧洲与日渐强盛的东方国家中间，成为一个战略断层。

Key.Original: The FIA are becoming increasingly desperate, as AAF forces begin to consolidate their position on Altis with the backing of Canton Protocol forces equipment and training.
Key.Chinese: 隨著阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的部隊接受了廣東協議部隊的裝備與訓練，其在阿爾蒂斯的地位就越加鞏固，而自由獨立同盟也變得越來越絕望。
Key.Chinesesimp: 随着 AAF 接受了广东协议同盟部队的装备与训练，其在阿尔蒂斯的地位越加巩固，而 FIA 也变得越来越绝望。

Key.Original: The fifth anniversary of the Jerusalem Ceasefire again was used as a platform to push the legitimacy of the government in Pygros, with the commander of Altis Armed Forces, Colonel Georgious Akhanteros, bullishly defending the legacy of his military coup.
Key.Chinese: 耶路撒冷停火協定簽署五週年紀念又一次成為了皮爾戈斯政府自證其合法性的平臺。阿爾蒂斯武裝力量司令伊奧爾伊奧斯·阿坎特羅斯上校堅決捍衛其發動的軍事政變的成果。
Key.Chinesesimp: 耶路撒冷停火协定签署五周年纪念又一次成为了皮尔戈斯政府自证其的合法性的平台。阿尔蒂斯武装部队司令伊奥尔伊奥斯·阿坎特罗斯上校坚决扞卫其发动的军事政变的成果。

Key.Original: 'When Europe cast us out of their failed union of states, we rose from the ashes of a false society, a false economic norm.'
Key.Chinese: '當歐洲把我們從他們失敗的國家聯盟踢出來的時候，我們就成功脫離了虛假的社會與失敗的經濟規範。'
Key.Chinesesimp: '当欧洲把我们从他们失败的国家联盟踢出来的时候，我们得以从虚假的社会和失败的经济模式中崛起。'

Key.Original: 'We gave new hope to our unemployed. Without Berlin's noose around our neck! We stand for what was, is, and will forever be our own! Our land! Our people! One Nation. Altis!'
Key.Chinese: '我們給予了失業的人一個希望。在沒有柏林管住我們之後!我們可以堅持我們自己的立場，並永遠可以保留我們自己的東西!我們的土地!我們的人民!我們的國家。阿爾蒂斯!'
Key.Chinesesimp: '我们给了失业者以希望。现在柏林再也不能对我们指手画脚！我们可以坚持自己的立场，并永远可以保持自我！我们的土地！我们的人民！我们的国家。阿尔蒂斯！'

Key.Original: 'Our CSAT partners recognise the new truth. The potential of our nation. We share with them and grow. They represent the new future. Our new future, our new truth.'
Key.Chinese: '我們的廣協同盟夥伴更讓我們認識到新的真理。以及我們國家擁有的潛力。我們一起分享並一起茁壯。他們代表了新的未來。我們新的未來，我們新的真理。'
Key.Chinesesimp: '我们的广协伙伴更能理解新的真理。以及我们国家拥有的潜力。我们一起分享并一起茁壮。他们代表了新的未来。我们新的未来，我们新的真理。'

Key.Original: In the UK, parliament was recalled for an urgent debate and vote over the possible redeployment of British peacekeeping forces on Stratis.
Key.Chinese: 在英國，國會展開了辯論與投票，討論是否要把斯特拉蒂斯上的英國維和部隊重新佈署在別的地方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在英国，国会展开了辩论与投票，讨论是否要把斯特拉蒂斯上的英国维和部队重新布署在别的地方。

Key.Original: 'Two decades of economic misery simply cannot be ignored. Britain is an island, not an empire. The answer is no longer 'send a gunboat' - it hasn't been the answer for the last fifty years!'
Key.Chinese: '二十年的經濟困境不容被忽視。英國是個島國，不是帝國。答案是不再派遣部隊-這是在過去50年來都沒有發生過的事情!'
Key.Chinesesimp: '二十年的经济困境不容被忽视。英国是个岛国，不是帝国。答案不再是"把炮舰派过去"-最近50年都不再是这样了！'

Key.Original: Prime Minister Nicholas Ramsden said he would respect the defeat of his government's motion, which, effectively, ruled out the possibility of any extension to the NATO deployment in the former sovereign territory.
Key.Chinese: 首相尼古拉斯·拉姆斯頓說他將尊重這決定，雖然這阻礙到了政府的運作，也排除了任何北約擴展部屬在其前領土上的機會。
Key.Chinesesimp: 首相尼古拉斯·拉姆斯顿说他将尊重这背离政府意愿的决定，而这就摒除了北约在其前主权领土上继续部署部队的权力。

Key.Original: Meanwhile, civil disorder spilled over into a third week of violent riots and mass protest across European capitals.
Key.Chinese: 與此同時，內亂波及到了整個歐洲的首都，大規模的群眾抗議與暴動已經進入了第三週。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与此同时，内乱波及到了整个欧洲的首都，大规模的群众抗议与暴动已经进入了第三周。

Key.Original: Again, the streets of Paris and Rome were ablaze last night as military-enforced curfews passed ignored, and the number of deaths rose into the hundreds.
Key.Chinese: 同樣，巴黎與羅馬的街道在晚間都燈火通明，並由軍隊來實施宵禁，因為衝突而導致的死亡人數已經攀升到了數百人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 同样，巴黎与罗马的街道在晚间都灯火通明，并由军队实施宵禁，因为冲突而导致的死亡人数已经攀升到了数百人。

Key.Original: 'CSAT wants to invest in Altis? Let them! The US can no longer be seen to prop up Europe's failed economic situation. This is their mess. We got our own problems - let's deal with those.'
Key.Chinese: '廣協同盟想要投資阿爾蒂斯?讓他們做吧!美國已經沒法再為歐洲失敗的經濟形態撐腰了。這是他們的爛攤子。而我們有我們的麻煩-讓我們解決它們先。'
Key.Chinesesimp: '广协想要投资阿尔蒂斯？让他们做吧！美国已经没法再为欧洲失败的经济状况输血了。这是他们的烂摊子。而我们有我们的麻烦—我们得先解决自己的。'

Key.Original: Although five years have passed since bloody civil war was brought to an end ...
Key.Chinese: 雖然阿爾蒂斯和斯特拉蒂斯共和國的血腥內戰已經結束了五年...
Key.Chinesesimp: 虽然阿尔蒂斯和斯特拉蒂斯共和国的血腥内战已经结束了五年...

Key.Original: ... thousands of families remain displaced, refugees scattered across countries around the Mediterranean ...
Key.Chinese: ...成千上萬的家庭流離失所，難民被分散在地中海沿岸的國家中...
Key.Chinesesimp: ...成千上万的家庭流离失所，难民被分散在地中海沿岸的国家中...

Key.Original: ... The FIA are becoming increasingly desperate ...
Key.Chinese: ...而自由獨立同盟也變得越來越絕望...
Key.Chinesesimp: ...而 FIA 也变得越来越绝望...

Key.Original: ... with the US-led peacekeeping deployment coming to an end of its mandate ...
Key.Chinese: ...隨著以美國為首的維和部隊即將結束其任務...
Key.Chinesesimp: ...随着以美国为首的维和部队即将结束其任务...

Key.Original: As millions of dollars of military equipment is decommissioned, opinion is split as to the wisdom of the drawdown.
Key.Chinese: 上百萬美元的軍用裝備與設施將原地拆解，有人懷疑，這是否是聰明的決定。
Key.Chinesesimp: 上百万美元的军用装备与设施将原地拆解，有人怀疑，这是否是聪明的决定。

Key.Original: In light of CSAT forces stepping up joint military exercises in the Pacific ...
Key.Chinese: 隨著廣協同盟部隊加緊準備其在太平洋的軍事演習...
Key.Chinesesimp: 随着广协部队加紧准备其在太平洋的军事演习...

Key.Original: ... the US is keen to re-orient its conventional forces.
Key.Chinese: ...美國決定移防常規部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: ...美国决定移防常规部队。

Key.Original: ... the Mediterranean basin representing a strategic fault-line between crumbling European influence ...
Key.Chinese: ...地中海變成被夾在沒啥影響力的歐洲與日漸強盛的東方國家中間，成為一個戰略斷層...
Key.Chinesesimp: ...地中海变成被夹在影响日趋势微的欧洲与日渐强盛的东方国家中间，成为一个战略断层...

Key.Original: ... the streets of Paris and Rome were ablaze last night ...
Key.Chinese: ...巴黎與羅馬的街道在晚間都燈火通明...
Key.Chinesesimp: ...巴黎与罗马的街道在晚间都灯火通明...

Key.Original: ... some argue that the withdrawal could not come at a worse time.
Key.Chinese: ...有些人認為不該選在這麼糟的時間撤軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: ...有些人认为不该选在这么糟的时间撤军。

Key.Original: ... as AAF forces begin to consolidate their position with the backing of Canton Protocol forces equipment ...
Key.Chinese: ...隨著阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的部隊接受了廣東協議部隊的裝備與訓練，其在阿爾蒂斯的地位就越加鞏固...
Key.Chinesesimp: ...随着 AAF 接受了广东协议同盟部队的装备与训练，其在阿尔蒂斯的地位越加巩固...

Key.Original: ... again was used as a platform to push the legitimacy ...
Key.Chinese: ...趁勢炒作其在皮爾戈斯政府的合法性...
Key.Chinesesimp: ...被皮尔戈斯政府用于趁势炒作其合法性...

Key.Original: ... parliament was recalled for an urgent debate and vote over the redeployment of UK peacekeeping forces ...
Key.Chinese: ...國會展開了辯論與投票，討論是否要把斯特拉蒂斯上的英國維和部隊重新佈署在別的地方...
Key.Chinesesimp: ...国会展开了辩论与投票，讨论是否要把斯特拉蒂斯岛上的英国维和部队重新布署在别的地方...

Key.Original: Prime Minister Ramsden said he would respect the defeat of his government's motion ...
Key.Chinese: 首相尼古拉斯·拉姆斯頓說他將尊重這決定，雖然這阻礙到了政府的運作...
Key.Chinesesimp: 首相尼古拉斯·拉姆斯顿说他将尊重这决定，虽然这违背了政府的意愿...

Key.Original: ... which, effectively, ruled out the possibility of any extension to the NATO deployment in the former sovereign territory.
Key.Chinese: ...也排除了任何北約擴展部屬在其前領土上的機會。
Key.Chinesesimp: ...而这就摒除了北约在其前主权领土上继续部署部队的权力。

Key.Original: The survivors launch a coordinated assault on Air Station Mike-26.
Key.Chinese: 倖存者們對Mike-26基地臺發起了一場協同攻擊行動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 幸存者们对 Mike-26基地台发起了一场协同攻击行动。

Container.name: x15_Too_Close
Container.situation: reinforcements get too close to use mortars

Key.Original: Dammit, they're too close for our mortar.
Key.Chinese: 該死，他們的距離太近了，我們的迫擊砲無法攻擊他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死，他们的距离太近了，我们的迫击炮无法攻击他们。

Container.name: x10_No_Ammo
Container.situation: player used up all mortar rounds

Key.Original: Shit, Charlie's out of rounds.
Key.Chinese: 該死，"Charlie's"沒有彈藥了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死，Charlie 没有弹药了。

Key.Original: Alright, looks like we're going to have to do this the hard way.
Key.Chinese: 好吧，看來我們只能來硬的了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，看来我们只能硬来了。

Container.name: x05_Out_Of_Ammo
Container.situation: player's co acknowledges the player used all rounds without hitting all targets

Key.Original: Dammit, looks like you didn't get all of them.
Key.Chinese: 該死，看來你並沒有成功解決所有的目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死，看来你并没有成功解决所有的目标。

Container.name: x01_Compromised
Container.situation: player compromises the assault

Key.Original: What the fuck are you doing, Kerry?!
Key.Chinese: 你在搞什麼鬼，克里?!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你在搞什么鬼，克里？！

Container.name: i05_Lead_Targets
Container.situation: leader tells player how to lead targets

Key.Original: Make sure that you lead the moving targets.
Key.Chinese: 先確定好你要攻擊的目標前置量。
Key.Chinesesimp: 先确定好你要攻击的目标前置量。

Key.Original: Don't fire at where they are, but where they're going to be.
Key.Chinese: 不要向他們所在的位置攻擊，必須要推算他們會到達的位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不要向他们所在的位置攻击，必须要推算他们会到达的位置。

Key.Original: And remember, we're running low, don't waste the rounds all at once!
Key.Chinese: 還有請記得，我們的彈藥所剩不多，不要一次就把所有的彈藥都打完!
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有请记得，我们的弹药所剩不多，不要一次就把所有的弹药都打完！

Container.name: i01_Designate_Targets
Container.situation: leader tells player how to designate targets

Key.Original: The way I see it, Kerry, you've got two options. Either you call out targets visually, or you read off the grid from your map.
Key.Chinese: 有兩種方法可供你使用，克里。你可以使用目視來指定目標，或從地圖上指定座標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有两种方法可供你使用，克里。你可以使用目视来指定目标，或从地图上指定座标。

Key.Original: Just remember to use both to adjust Charlie's fire as needed.
Key.Chinese: 請搭配兩種方法來讓"Charlie's"擊中目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请搭配两种方法来让 Charlie 击中目标。

Key.Original: These are the only rounds we've got, so try not to waste them!
Key.Chinese: 這些是我們僅有的彈藥，所以不要浪費了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 这些是我们仅有的弹药，所以不要浪费了！

Container.name: 55_Get_Clear
Container.situation: player's team is ordered to get clear (only in the alternate case)

Key.Original: Timer set! 60 seconds to detonation!
Key.Chinese: 時間設置完成!60秒後引爆!
Key.Chinesesimp: 时间设置完成！60秒后引爆！

Container.name: 50_Reinf_Dead
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Lead;EPA B Miller;
Container.situation: player's team reports the reinforcements were destroyed

Key.Original: Alpha to Falcon, enemy reinforcements neutralized. Awaiting further orders, over.
Key.Chinese: Alpha呼叫"獵鷹"，敵軍援軍已殲滅。正在等待進一步命令，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Alpha 呼叫"猎鹰"，敌军援军已歼灭。正在等待进一步命令，完毕。

Key.Original: Outstanding, Alpha, entrench your position for now.
Key.Chinese: 幹的好極了，Alpha，現在先鞏固你們的位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的好极了，Alpha，现在先巩固你们的位置。

Key.Original: Delta's en route. They'll take a look at setting up long-range comms.
Key.Chinese: "Delta's"在路上了。他們將會負責建立長距離通訊。
Key.Chinesesimp: Delta 在路上了。他们将会负责建立长距离通信。

Key.Original: All call-signs, good work. We'll regroup at Maxwell after Delta inspects the Air Station.
Key.Chinese: 所有單位，幹的好。在Delta查看完基地臺之後，我們在回麥克斯韋集合。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位，干的好。在 Delta 搜索完航空站后，我们回麦克斯韦集合。

Container.name: 50b_Reinf_Dead
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Lead;EPA B Miller;EPA B Delta Lead;EPA B Bravo Lead;
Container.situation: player's team reports the reinforcements were destroyed

Key.Original: Alpha to Falcon, enemy reinforcements neutralized. Awaiting further orders, over.
Key.Chinese: Delta呼叫"獵鷹"，敵軍援軍已殲滅。正在等待進一步命令，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Alpha 呼叫"猎鹰"，敌军援军已歼灭。正在等待进一步命令，完毕。

Key.Original: Wait, what?! You can't just blow it up! What the fuck was all this for then?!
Key.Chinese: 等等，什麼?!你們不能就這樣炸了它!那我們做這些事的意義又如何?!
Key.Chinesesimp: 等等，什么？！你们不能就这样炸了它！那我们做这些事还有什么意义？！

Key.Original: Bad news, sir. We've got nothing here - no way to establish a link to MEDCOM - all the equipment's fried.
Key.Chinese: 壞消息，長官。我們這裡什麼都沒有-沒有法子可以聯繫上地中海司令部-所有設備都已經報廢了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 坏消息，长官。我们这里什么都没有—没法联系上地中海司令部—所有设备都已经报废了。

Key.Original: Fine work, Alpha, entrench your position for now.
Key.Chinese: 幹的好，Alpha，現在先鞏固你們的位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的好，Alpha，现在先巩固你们的阵地。

Key.Original: Delta, SITREP. Over.
Key.Chinese: Delta，狀況回報。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Delta，状态报告。完毕。

Key.Original: At least we can rig it to blow. We're setting the charges now.
Key.Chinese: 但至少我們可以摧毀掉它。我們正在設置炸藥了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但至少我们可以炸掉它。我们现在设置炸药。

Key.Original: All squads, get clear!
Key.Chinese: 所有小隊，區域淨空!
Key.Chinesesimp: 各班，离开爆炸区域！

Key.Original: Stand down, Bravo. That's an order. If we cant hold it, we raze it.
Key.Chinese: 冷靜點，Bravo。這是命令。如果我們不能擁有它，我們就摧毀它。
Key.Chinesesimp: 冷静点，Bravo。这是命令。如果我们守不住它，我们就摧毁它。

Key.Original: Proceed, Delta. Burn it down. The rest of you, fall back to Maxwell. Falcon Out.
Key.Chinese: 請繼續，Delta。毀了它。其餘的人，返回麥克斯韋。"獵鷹"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请继续，Delta。毁了它。其余的人，返回麦克斯韦。"猎鹰"通话完毕。

Container.name: 45_Designate
Container.situation: player's co orders the player to hit the reinforcements with mortars

Key.Original: Kerry, there's another watch tower at the northern end of the facility.
Key.Chinese: 克里，在設施的最北面還有一座哨塔。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，在设施的最北面还有一座哨塔。

Key.Original: Get up there and put our remaining rounds to good use, Charlie's standing by.
Key.Chinese: 上去那裡，好好使用我們剩下的迫擊砲，Charlie已經準備好了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 上去那里，好好使用我们剩下的迫击炮弹，Charlie 已经准备好了。

Container.name: 43_Defend
Container.situation: player's co acknowledges defense of delta (only in the alternate case)

Key.Original: Will do, Delta!
Key.Chinese: 照辦，Delta!
Key.Chinesesimp: 照办，Delta！

Container.name: 40_Reinf
Container.participants: EPA B Miller;EPA B Alpha Lead;
Container.situation: miller informs player's team about the reinforcements

Key.Original: Solid copy, Falcon. We'll be ready for them. Alpha out.
Key.Chinese: 完整收到，"獵鷹"。我們已經準備好對付他們了。Alpha通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 完整收到，"猎鹰"。我们已经准备好对付他们了。Alpha 通话完毕。

Key.Original: Confirmed, Alpha. Delta reports two AAF motorized infantry squads inbound from Rogain. How copy?
Key.Chinese: 了解，Alpha。Delta回報有兩個阿爾蒂斯武裝力量摩托化步兵班正在從羅根趕來。有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，Alpha。Delta 报告称有两个 AAF 的摩托化步兵班正在从罗根赶来。有收到吗？

Container.name: 40b_Reinf
Container.situation: delta informs units at mike-26 about reinforcements.

Key.Original: This is Delta, be advised, Greenbacks are definitely mobilizing!
Key.Chinese: 這裡是Delta，請注意，綠軍肯定是在調派支援了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是 Delta，请注意，绿军肯定是在调派支援了！

Key.Original: We counted at least two mech-infantry squads gearing up at Rogain.
Key.Chinese: 我們發現到至少有兩個摩托化步兵班正在羅根整裝。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们发现到至少有两个摩托化步兵班正在 Delta 整装。

Key.Original: We're en route back to your position now, we'll try to open up a channel to MEDCOM.
Key.Chinese: 我們正在返回你們那邊的路上，我們將會嘗試打通與地中海司令部的通訊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们正在返回你们那边的路上，我们将会尝试打通与地中海司令部的通信。

Key.Original: Just watch your fire - we're coming in from the north-east.
Key.Chinese: 小心你們的開火-我們正在從東北方靠近。
Key.Chinesesimp: 注意火力—我们正在从东北方靠近。

Container.name: 35_Mike26_Clear
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Lead;EPA B Miller;
Container.situation: player's team reports the facility as clear

Key.Original: Falcon, this is Alpha. Be advised, we've secured Mike-26. Any word on AAF reinforcements? Over.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，這裡是Alpha。請注意，我們已經肅清了Mike-26。有任何阿爾蒂斯武裝力量援軍的消息嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，这里是 Alpha。请注意，我们已经肃清了 Mike-26。有任何 AAF 援军的消息吗？完毕。

Key.Original: Excellent work, Alpha. This takes us one step closer to leaving this rock. Wait one.
Key.Chinese: 幹的太好了，Alpha。這又讓我們為離開這座島跨出了一步。請稍等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的太好了，Alpha。这让我们距离开这座岛又近了一步。请稍等。

Container.name: 30_Attack
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Lead;EPA B Bravo Lead;
Container.situation: player's co orders the attack

Key.Original: Alpha to Bravo, engage when ready. Engage when ready. Do you copy?
Key.Chinese: Alpha呼叫Bravo，準備好就開始接戰。準備好就開始接戰。是否收到?
Key.Chinesesimp: Alpha 呼叫 Bravo，准备好就开始接战。准备好就开始接战。是否收到？

Key.Original: We copy you, Alpha. Bravo's on the move. Out.
Key.Chinese: 我們收到了，Alpha。Bravo開始移動。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们收到了，Alpha。Bravo 开始移动。通话完毕。

Container.name: 25_Towers_Dead
Container.situation: player's co commends the player

Key.Original: Good work, Kerry.
Key.Chinese: 幹的好，克里。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的好，克里。

Container.name: 20_Targets
Container.situation: player's co orders the player to designate targets

Key.Original: All right, Kerry, you're up - call out targets for Charlie.
Key.Chinese: 好的，克里，你上吧-為Charlie指定目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，克里，你上吧—为 Charlie 指定目标。

Key.Original: Remember, the tower at Bravo's entry point - anything guarding the main entrance - has priority.
Key.Chinese: 要記住，優先目標為Bravo的進入點與大門口旁的衛兵。
Key.Chinesesimp: 要记住，优先目标为 Bravo 的进入点与大门口旁的哨塔。

Container.name: 15_At_OP
Container.situation: player and co reach the op

Key.Original: All units, be advised, we've taken up a position on overwatch.
Key.Chinese: 所有單位，請注意，我們已經在觀測點就定位了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位，请注意，我们已经在观测点就定位了。

Key.Original: Charlie, expect requests for fire missions shortly. Out.
Key.Chinese: Charlie，預計不久後就會有射擊任務。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Charlie，预计不久后就会有射击任务。通话完毕。

Container.name: 10_Prone
Container.situation: player's co orders the player to go prone

Key.Original: Hit the dirt.
Key.Chinese: 趴下。
Key.Chinesesimp: 趴下。

Container.name: 05_Mike26
Container.situation: player's co spots mike-26

Key.Original: There she is.
Key.Chinese: 看到她了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看到她了。

Key.Original: Okay. Stay low, Kerry.
Key.Chinese: 好。姿態壓低，克里。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好。姿态压低，克里。

Container.name: 01_Start
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Lead;EPA B Bravo Lead;EPA B Charlie Lead;
Container.situation: squads report in

Key.Original: Alpha to Bravo, Charlie, what's your status? Over.
Key.Chinese: Alpha致Bravo，Charlie，你們的狀況如何?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Alpha 呼叫 Bravo，Charlie，你们的状况如何？完毕。

Key.Original: Copy that. Alpha out.
Key.Chinese: 收到。Alpha通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。Alpha 通话完毕。

Key.Original: This is Bravo. In position. Awaiting the order. Over.
Key.Chinese: 這裡是Bravo。就定位了。正在等待命令。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是 Bravo。就位了。正在等待命令。完毕。

Key.Original: Charlie here, we're almost set up. ETA 2 mikes. Over.
Key.Chinese: Charlie在這，我們快要設置好了。預計要2分鐘。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Charlie 在这，我们快要设置好了。预计要2分钟。完毕。

Key.Original: Radio Silence
Key.Chinese: 無線電靜默
Key.Chinesesimp: 无线电静默

Key.Original: Lead Targets
Key.Chinese: 目標前置量
Key.Chinesesimp: 目标提前量

Key.Original: Designate Targets
Key.Chinese: 指定目標
Key.Chinesesimp: 指定目标

Key.Original: In spite of you compromising the initial assault, you managed to seize Air Station Mike-26. However, Delta determined the facility to be unusable - it wasn't possible to establish contact with NATO MEDCOM. Refusing to let it fall back into enemy hands, Miller authorized its destruction. Let's hope it was worth it.
Key.Chinese: 儘管在任務開始時你的表現並不理想，但你仍成功肅清並佔領了Mike-26基地臺。然而，Delta確定該設施已無法使用了-它不可能為我們建立與北?地中海司令部的通訊。為了避免該設施落回敵人的手裡，米勒下令摧毀掉它。讓我們希望這是值得的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管在任务开始时你的表现并不理想，但你仍成功肃清并占领了 Mike-26基地台。然而，Delta 确定该设施已无法使用了—它不可能为我们建立与北约地中海司令部的通信。为了避免该设施落回敌人的手里，米勒下令摧毁掉它。但愿这值得。

Key.Original: Air Station Mike-26 is secured and you successfully repelled the reinforcements. However, Delta determined the facility to be unusable - it wasn't possible to establish contact with NATO MEDCOM. Refusing to let it fall back into enemy hands, Miller authorized its destruction. Let's hope it was worth it.
Key.Chinese: 我們成功的肅清並佔領了Mike-26基地臺，並擊退敵人的援軍。然而，Delta確定該設施已無法使用了-它不可能為我們建立與北約地中海司令部的通訊。為了避免該設施落回敵人的手裡，米勒下令摧毀掉它。讓我們希望這是值得的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们成功的肃清并占领了 Mike-26基地台，并击退敌人的援军。然而，Delta 确定该设施已无法使用了—它不可能为我们建立与北约地中海司令部的通信。为了避免该设施落回敌人的手里，米勒下令摧毁掉它。但愿这值得。

Key.Original: As I'm sure you're all well aware, comms are still down. Efforts to restore contact with NATO MEDCOM have, thus far, proven fruitless. The plain truth is, gentlemen, with the AAF regrouping, we must re-establish a link soon.%1Now, aside from %2the airbase%3, %4Mike-26%5 is probably the most hi-tech installation on Stratis. It's also one of the most strategically valuable positions on the island.%6It's a risk, but hitting the facility will deal a serious blow to the AAF, and - if anywhere holds an opportunity to re-open comms channels - it's there.%7This will be a coordinated effort. Charlie will set up %8a mortar%9. %10Alpha%11 will %12provide overwatch%13 and mark priority targets. We'll strike hard from distance and - together with %14Bravo%15 - move in quickly, holding the position against any potential counter-attack.
Key.Chinese: 正如你們一直很關心的，通訊仍然是斷的。我們一直努力與北約的地中海司令部進行聯繫，但到目前為止，都是徒勞無功的。計劃很明顯，先生們-由於阿爾抵死武裝力量正在重新集結-所以我們必須加快聯繫外援的動作。%1現在，除了%2空軍基地%3，%4Mike-26%5可能是斯特拉蒂斯島上唯一裝有高科技裝備的地方。它也是島上其中一處最具戰略價值的位置%6這風險很高，但打擊這個設施將會重重的打擊阿爾蒂斯武裝力量，並且-假如有任何機會可以重新連繫上通訊頻道-這就是了。%7此次行動將由大家共同合作。Charlie將會設置%8迫擊砲%9。%10Alpha%11則會提供%12觀測%13並標記優先目標。我們將從一定的距離外嚴重打擊他們-然後再與%14Bravo%15一同快速進入，堅守陣地並排除所有潛在的反擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我相信你们也很在意，通信仍然中断。我们一直努力与北约地中海司令部取得联系，但到目前为止一直徒劳无功。事实就是，先生们—由于 AAF 正在重新集结—我们必须加快联系外援的动作。%1现在除了%2空军基地以外%3，%4Mike-26%5可能是斯特拉蒂斯岛上唯一装有高科技设备的地方。它也是岛上其中一处最具战略价值的位置%6这风险很高，但打击这个设施将给 AAF 带来沉重打击，并且—假如有任何机会可以重新建立通信的话—就是这样了。%7此次行动将由大家共同合作。Charlie 将会设置%8迫击炮%9。%10Alpha%11则会提供%12观测%13并标记优先目标。我们将从一定的距离外狠狠打击他们—然后再与%14Bravo%15协同快速突入，坚守阵地并排除所有潜在的反击。

Key.Original: %1Alpha%2 - Your squad.%3%4Bravo%5 - Supporting element.%6%7Charlie%8 - Mortar team.%9%10Falcon%11 - Camp Maxwell HQ.%12%13Delta%14 - Recon element.
Key.Chinese: %1Alpha%2-你的小隊。%3%4Bravo%5-支援小隊。%6%7Charlie%8-迫擊砲小隊。%9%10"獵鷹"%11-麥克斯韋營地指揮部。%12%13Delta%14-偵察小隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: %1Alpha%2-你的班。%3%4Bravo%5-支援分队。%6%7Charlie%8-迫击炮射组。%9%10猎鹰%11-麦克斯韦营地指挥部。%12%13Delta%14-侦察分队。

Key.Original: With the support of %1Charlie%2 and %3Bravo%4, assault and hold %5Air Station Mike-26%6.
Key.Chinese: 在%1Charlie%2與%3Bravo%4的協助下，攻擊並佔領%5Mike-26基地臺%6。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在%1Charlie%2与%3Bravo%4的协助下，攻击并占领%5Mike-26航空站%6。

Key.Original:
1. Take up %1a position on overwatch%2 above %3Mike-26%4.
2. Designate the watch towers for %5Charlie's mortar team%6.
3. Clear the AAF from the vicinity of Mike-26.
4. Hold the facility against any potential counter-attack.
Key.Chinese:
1. 建立%1觀測點%2來觀察%3Mike-26%4。
2. 為%5"Charlie's"的迫擊砲小隊%6指定目標。
3. 肅清Mike-26附近所有的阿爾蒂斯武裝力量部隊。
4. 守住設施並擊退一切反擊。
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 建立%1观测点%2来观察%3Mike-26%4。
2. 为%5Charlie 的迫击炮小组%6指定目标。
3. 肃清 Mike-26附近所有的阿尔蒂斯武裝力量部队。
4. 守住设施并击退一切反击。

Key.Original: Neutralize Watch Towers
Key.Chinese: 殲滅哨塔
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭哨塔

Key.Original: Neutralize the 3 critical watch towers with the support of %1Charlie%2.
Key.Chinese: 在%1Charlie%2的幫助下，殲滅掉3座對我們有極大威脅的哨塔。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在%1Charlie%2的帮助下，摧毁3座对我们有极大威胁的哨塔。

Key.Original: Repel Reinforcements
Key.Chinese: 擊退援軍
Key.Chinesesimp: 击退援军

Key.Original: REPEL
Key.Chinese: 擊退
Key.Chinesesimp: 击退

Key.Original: AAF reinforcements are inbound %1from the north%2; prevent them from re-capturing %3the facility%4.
Key.Chinese: 阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的援軍正從%1北方%2趕來;請防止他們重新佔領%3設施%4。
Key.Chinesesimp: AAF 的援军正从%1北方%2赶来;阻止他们重新占领%3设施%4的企图。

Key.Original: Set Up OP
Key.Chinese: 設置觀測點
Key.Chinesesimp: 设置观测点

Key.Original: Set up %1an overwatch position%2 overlooking %3Air Station Mike-26%4.
Key.Chinese: 設置一個%1觀測點%2來觀察%3Mike-26基地臺%4。
Key.Chinesesimp: 设置一个%1观测点%2来观察%3Mike-26航空站%4。

Key.Original: Seize Air Station Mike-26
Key.Chinese: 肅清Mike-26基地臺
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清 Mike-26航空站

Key.Original: With the towers neutralised, assist %1Bravo%2 with the capture of %3Mike-26%4.
Key.Chinese: 在摧毀哨塔後，協助%1Bravo%2佔領%3Mike-26%4。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在摧毁哨塔后，协助%1Bravo%2占领%3Mike-26%4。

Key.Original: An opportunity to neutralize an AAF commander presents itself.
Key.Chinese: 一個可以讓我們除掉阿爾蒂斯武裝力量指揮官的機會出現了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一个可以让我们除掉 AAF 指挥官的机会出现了。

Key.Original: Wet Work
Key.Chinese: 濕活兒
Key.Chinesesimp: 湿活儿

Key.Original: Stashed SDV
Key.Chinese: 藏匿海豹運輸艇
Key.Chinesesimp: 藏匿的 SDV

Key.Original:
You managed to clear the town and successfully neutralized a high-ranking enemy officer. Unfortunately, it was not our intended target, Goblin.

While the loss of this commander won't go unnoticed among the AAF, it was not the decisive blow we were looking for. Instead, we may have just kicked the hornet's nest.
Key.Chinese:
你成功肅清了小鎮並殲滅掉敵方的高階軍官。不幸的是，他並不是我們本來所設想的目標，"哥布林"。

雖然阿爾蒂斯武裝力量會對失去這個指揮官一事非常在意，但對他們來說並不是致命的一擊。相反的，我們可能捅到了蜂窩。
Key.Chinesesimp:
你成功肃清了小镇并歼灭掉敌方的高级军官。不幸的是，他并不是我们本来所设想的目标，"哥布林"。

虽然 AAF 不会对失去这名指挥官而坐视不管，但对他们来说并不是致命的一击。相反，可能是我们捅到了马蜂窝。

Key.Original: Recon reports indicate that the AAF will make a push south in the next few hours. It appears they're keen to lock down the area around %1Girna%2.%3Intel suggests that the highest-ranking officer on Stratis will himself be in the area. Neutralizing him will deal a serious blow to our enemy. Decapitating their command structure may even signal an end to this whole situation.%4We simply cannot let this opportunity pass us by.%5Now, we've come up with a plan of action. My team has a submersible stashed %6just off the west coast%7. That's why we asked for volunteers - those with diving experience.%8One of my men will use it to lead a small team and insert %9just north of Girna%10. Meanwhile, %11Bravo%12 will circle around and take up %13a position to the south%14. Once both teams are in place, we close the trap.
Key.Chinese: 偵察報告指出，阿爾蒂斯武裝力量將會在接下來的幾個小時向南推進。而且他們正封鎖%1吉爾納%2的四周。%3情報表明，該區將會出現敵軍在斯特拉蒂斯島上最高軍階的軍官。幹掉他將會帶給我們敵人一個重重的打擊。殺掉他們的指揮官可能還可以讓這整件事情結束也說不定。%4我們不能讓這機會流失。%5現在，我們制定出了一個計劃。我的小隊藏匿了一臺潛水艇在%6西海岸邊%7。這就是為什麼要徵求志願者-那些有潛水經驗的人。%8我的其中一個手下，上尉詹姆斯，將會帶領一小支隊伍潛入%9吉爾納的北方%10。同時，%11Bravo%12將會從%13南方的位置%14進行包圍。當兩隊都就定位的時候，我們就可以收網釣大魚了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 侦察报告指出，AAF 将会在接下来的几个小时向南推进。而且他们正封锁%1格尔纳%2的四周。%3情报表明，该区将会出现敌军在斯特拉蒂斯岛上最高军衔的军官。干掉他将给敌人带来重大打击。杀掉他们的指挥官可能还能结束整个事件。%4我们不能错失良机。%5现在我们制定出了一个计划。我的小组在%6西海岸边%7藏匿了一台 SDV。这就是为什么要征求志愿者—那些有潜水经验的人。%8我的其中一个手下詹姆斯上尉，将会带领一小支队伍潜入%9格尔纳的北方%10。同时，%11Bravo%12将会从%13南方的位置%14进行包围。当两队都就定位的时候，我们就可以收网钓大鱼了。

Key.Original: %1Swordfish%2 - Your squad.%3%4Bravo%5 - Supporting element.%6%7Falcon%8 - Camp Maxwell HQ.%9Charlie - Camp Maxwell defense.
Key.Chinese: %1"劍魚"%2-你的小隊。%3%4Bravo%5-支援小隊。%6%7"獵鷹"%8-麥克斯韋營地指揮部。%9Charlie-防禦麥克斯韋營地。
Key.Chinesesimp: %1"剑鱼"%2-你的班。%3%4Bravo%5-支援分队。%6%7"猎鹰"%8-麦克斯韦营地指挥部。%9Charlie-防御麦克斯韦营地。

Key.Original: Insert at %1the bay%2 and take up %3a position%4 north of %5Girna%6. Coordinate with %7Bravo%8, clear the village of hostile forces and neutralize the High Value Target.
Key.Chinese: 滲透進%1海灣%2並移動到%5吉爾納%6北方的%3位置%4。與%7"Braovo"%8合作，肅清小鎮並殲滅掉高價值目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 渗透进%1海湾%2并移动到%5格尔纳%6北方的%3位置%4。与%7Bravo%8合作肃清小镇并歼灭高价值目标。

Key.Original:
1. Use %1the SDV%2 to insert at %3the bay%4.
2. Move into %5position%6 above the town.
3. Clear %7Girna%8 of all hostile forces.
4. Neutralize and verify the HVT, codename: Goblin, located there.
Key.Chinese:
1. 使用%1海豹運輸艇%2滲透進%3海灣%4。
2. 移動到小鎮北方的%5位置%6。
3. 肅清%7吉爾納%8的敵軍部隊。
4. 殲滅並確認高價值目標，其代號為:"哥布林"。
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 使用%1SDV%2渗透进%3海湾%4。
2. 移动到小镇北方的%5位置%6。
3. 肃清%7格尔纳%8的敌军部队。
4. 歼灭并确认高价值目标，其代号为："哥布林"。

Key.Original: Get in the Truck
Key.Chinese: 進入卡車
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入卡车

Key.Original: GET IN
Key.Chinese: 進入
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入

Key.Original: Get in the truck as a passenger.
Key.Chinese: 進入卡車後座。
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入卡车后座。

Key.Original: Clear the Town
Key.Chinese: 肅清小鎮
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清小镇

Key.Original: Neutralize all enemy forces in %1the town%2. Let none escape.
Key.Chinese: 肅清%1小鎮%2裡的所有敵人。不要讓任何一個人逃跑了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清%1小镇%2里的所有敌人。不要让任何一个人逃跑了。

Key.Original: Get into Position
Key.Chinese: 移動到準備位置
Key.Chinesesimp: 移动到准备位置

Key.Original: MOVE
Key.Chinese: 移動
Key.Chinesesimp: 移动

Key.Original: After inserting, move to %1your team's position%2 overlooking %3Girna%4.
Key.Chinese: 成功滲透後，移動到%1準備位置%2來觀察%3吉爾納%4。
Key.Chinesesimp: 成功渗透后，移动到%1准备位置%2来观察%3格尔纳%4。

Key.Original: Insert at the Bay
Key.Chinese: 滲透進海灣
Key.Chinesesimp: 渗透进海湾

Key.Original: INSERT
Key.Chinese: 滲透
Key.Chinesesimp: 渗透

Key.Original: Using %1the SDV%2, insert with your team on %3the beach%4 north of %5Girna%6.
Key.Chinese: 使用%1海豹運輸艇%2，來讓你的小隊滲透到%5吉爾納%6北方的%3海灘%4。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用%1SDV%2将你的小组渗透到%5格尔纳%6北方的%3海滩%4。

Key.Original: Confirm the Kill
Key.Chinese: 確認擊殺
Key.Chinesesimp: 确认击杀

Key.Original: VERIFY
Key.Chinese: 確認
Key.Chinesesimp: 确认

Key.Original: Locate and identify the body of our target.
Key.Chinese: 尋找並確認屍體是否為我們要的目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 寻找并确认尸体是否为我们要的目标。

Key.Original: Retreat to Camp Maxwell
Key.Chinese: 撤退回麥克斯韋營地
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤退回麦克斯韦营地

Key.Original: RETREAT
Key.Chinese: 撤退
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤退

Key.Original: Enemy reinforcements are inbound. Retreat to %1Camp Maxwell%2.
Key.Chinese: 敵人的援軍正在接近當中。請立即撤退回%1麥克斯韋營地%2。
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌人的援军正在接近当中。请立即撤退回%1麦克斯韦营地%2。

Container.name: x01_No_Truck
Container.situation: player has to move out on foot instead

Key.Original: Damn... had you cowboys not wasted it, we could have used that truck.
Key.Chinese: 該死...假如你們沒有因一時衝動而毀了卡車，我們現在就可以用它了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死...假如你们没有因一时冲动而毁了卡车，我们现在就可以用它了。

Key.Original: You guys head south on foot and loop around.
Key.Chinese: 你們用走的並向南邊移動，然後反回營地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们徒步向南走，绕一圈然后返回。

Key.Original: Falcon, the others are moving out on foot. I'm going to double back for the SDV.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，其他人會用走的回去。我則要回去開海豹運輸艇了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，其他人会用走的回去。我则赶回去开 SDV 了。

Key.Original: Meet you back at Maxwell, over.
Key.Chinese: 大夥等下麥克斯韋見，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 大伙等下麦克斯韦见，完毕。

Container.name: 95_Truck
Container.situation: delta orders everyone into the truck

Key.Original: There's a truck in the center of town! Everyone, load up!
Key.Chinese: 小鎮中間有一輛卡車!全員上車!
Key.Chinesesimp: 小镇中间有一辆卡车！全员上车！

Key.Original: Falcon, be advised, the others are commandeering a truck. I'm going to double back for the SDV
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，請注意，其他人徵收了一臺卡車。我則要回去開海豹運輸艇了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，请注意，其他人征用了一台卡车。我则要回去开 SDV 了。

Key.Original: Meet you guys back at Maxwell, over.
Key.Chinese: 大夥等下麥克斯韋見，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 大伙等下麦克斯韦见，完毕。

Container.name: 90_Retreat
Container.participants: EPA B Delta Lead;EPA B Miller;
Container.situation: miller orders them to retreat

Key.Original: Falcon, be advised, our intel was faulty. The target isn't here. Over.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，請注意，我們的情報錯了。目標並不在這。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 猎鹰，请注意，我们的情报错了。目标并不在这。完毕。

Key.Original: It's definitely a high-ranking officer, sir, but it's not our target. Over.
Key.Chinese: 他肯定是位高階軍官，長官，但並不是我們要的目標。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他肯定是位高级军官，长官，但并不是我们要的目标。完毕。

Key.Original: Say again, Swordfish? You're positive it's not him? Over.
Key.Chinese: 請重發，"劍魚"?你確定真不是他?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 再说一遍，"剑鱼"？你确定真不是他？完毕。

Key.Original: Shit... Understood, Swordfish. Get yourselves back here. Falcon out.
Key.Chinese: 該死...我知道了，"劍魚"。你們回來吧。"獵鷹"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死...我知道了，"剑鱼"。你们回来吧。"猎鹰"通话完毕。

Container.name: 85_Identified
Container.participants: EPA B Player;EPA B Delta Lead;
Container.situation: player reports the body

Key.Original: What?
Key.Chinese: 什麼?
Key.Chinesesimp: 什么？

Key.Original: Dammit!
Key.Chinese: 該死!
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死！

Key.Original: Sir, it's not him!
Key.Chinese: 長官，並不是他!
Key.Chinesesimp: 长官，不是他！

Key.Original: It's not him! It's an officer - pretty high-ranking - but it's not our guy!
Key.Chinese: 並不是他!他是個軍官-軍階也很高-但並不是我們要的人!
Key.Chinesesimp: 不是他！他是个军官—军衔也很高—但并不是我们要的人！

Container.name: 80_Reinf_Spotted
Container.situation: player's co spots the reinforcements

Key.Original: Fuck! There are the reinforcements!
Key.Chinese: 幹!援軍到了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 操！援军到了！

Key.Original: Hurry the fuck up, Kerry!
Key.Chinese: 他媽的給我快點，克里!
Key.Chinesesimp: 他妈的给我快点，克里！

Container.name: 75_Identify
Container.situation: player's co orders the player to find the body

Key.Original: Kerry, find and verify the target.
Key.Chinese: 克里，搜尋並確認目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，搜寻并辨识目标。

Key.Original: Make sure it's our guy.
Key.Chinese: 確定是我們要的人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 确定是我们要的人。

Container.name: 70_Town_Clear
Container.participants: EPA B Delta Lead;EPA B Miller;
Container.situation: player's team reports that the town is clear

Key.Original: Falcon, this is Swordfish. Enemy forces in Girna neutralized. Over.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，這裡是"劍魚"。敵軍在吉爾納的部隊已經被殲滅。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，这是"剑鱼"。敌军在格尔纳的部队已被歼灭。完毕。

Key.Original: Making a sweep now, sir. Over.
Key.Chinese: 正在確認中，長官。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正在搜索中，长官。完毕。

Key.Original: Understood. Swordfish out.
Key.Chinese: 了解。"劍魚"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。"剑鱼"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Copy that, Swordfish. Great job. Do you have a kill confirmation on our target? Over.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"劍魚"。幹的好。你們有確認擊殺目標了嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"剑鱼"。干的好。你们确认击杀目标了吗？完毕。

Key.Original: Be quick about it, Swordfish. Assume enemy forces at Tempest are mobilizing.
Key.Chinese: 最好快點，"劍魚"。我們必須假定敵軍在坦皮斯特的援軍已經在來的路上了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 最好快点，"剑鱼"。我们推测敌军在坦皮斯特的援军已经在来的路上了。

Key.Original: I'd estimate you have about 5 minutes until they're on top of you. Over.
Key.Chinese: 我估計在他們到之前你們會有五分鐘的時間可用。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我估计在他们到之前你们会有五分钟的时间可用。完毕。

Container.name: 67_Move_In
Container.situation: player's co orders the player to find the body

Key.Original: Alright, move in. Sweep the village!
Key.Chinese: 好，開始攻擊。肅清小鎮!
Key.Chinesesimp: 好，开始攻击。肃清小镇！

Key.Original: I'll hold my position here on overwatch.
Key.Chinese: 我會留在這裡進行觀察。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我会留在这里进行观察。

Container.name: 65_Moving
Container.situation: bravo starts their assault as well

Key.Original: Copy that. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。通话完毕。

Container.name: 60_Attack
Container.situation: player's co orders the attack

Key.Original: Alright. Bravo, move in, over.
Key.Chinese: 好的。Bravo，開始攻擊，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的。Bravo，开始攻击，完毕。

Container.name: 55_Ready
Container.participants: EPA B Delta Lead;EPA B Miller;EPA B Bravo Lead;
Container.situation: player's co reports they're ready

Key.Original: Falcon, we've got a visual here. HVT in a courtyard in the center of town. Over.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，我們這裡可以看到。高價值目標正在小鎮中心的院子裡。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，我们看到了。高价值目标正在小镇中心的院子里。完毕。

Key.Original: Swordfish to Falcon. In position. Over.
Key.Chinese: "劍魚"呼叫"獵鷹"。就定位了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "剑鱼"呼叫"猎鹰"。就定位了。完毕。

Key.Original: Negative.
Key.Chinese: 不能。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不能。

Key.Original: Copy that. Have you got eyes on the target? Over.
Key.Chinese: 收到。你們能看到目標嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。你们能看到目标吗？完毕。

Key.Original: Understood. The ball's in your court now, Swordfish. Good luck. Out.
Key.Chinese: 了解。現在指揮權交給你了，"劍魚"。祝好運。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。现在指挥权交给你了，"剑鱼"。祝好运。通话完毕。

Container.name: 54_Report_In_Bravo
Container.participants: EPA B Delta Lead;EPA B Miller;EPA B Bravo Lead;
Container.situation: player's co reports the contacts

Key.Original: Falcon, this is Bravo. We're in position. Awaiting your signal. Over.
Key.Chinese: Falcon，這裡是Bravo。我們就定位了。正在等待你的信號。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，这是 Bravo。我们就位了。正在等待信号。完毕。

Key.Original: Wilco, sir. We're en route. Swordfish out.
Key.Chinese: 照辦，長官。我們在路上了。"劍魚"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 照办，长官。我们在路上了。"剑鱼"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Bravo, report in, over.
Key.Chinese: Bravo，請回報，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Bravo，请回报，完毕。

Key.Original: Solid copy, Bravo.
Key.Chinese: 完整收到，Bravo。
Key.Chinesesimp: 完整收到，Bravo。

Key.Original: Swordfish, looks like we're just waiting on you. Get moving, over.
Key.Chinese: "劍魚"，看來我們正在等你們。快點移動，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "剑鱼"，看来我们正在等你们。快点移动，完毕。

Container.name: 53_Move
Container.situation: player's co reports the contacts

Key.Original: Alright. Move quickly and quietly.
Key.Chinese: 好。快速並安靜的移動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好。赶快移动，保持安静。

Key.Original: Hold fire until we're ready to strike.
Key.Chinese: 直到我們開始攻擊前都不要開火。
Key.Chinesesimp: 直到我们开始攻击前都不要开火。

Container.name: 50_Report_In
Container.participants: EPA B Delta Lead;EPA B Miller;
Container.situation: player's co reports the contacts

Key.Original: Falcon, this is Swordfish. Be advised, we've inserted north of Girna.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，這裡是"劍魚"。請注意，我們已成功滲透進吉爾納的北方。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，这里是"剑鱼"。请注意，我们已成功渗透进格尔纳的北方。

Key.Original: We encountered a Greenback patrol, but I doubt they were able to get a warning out. Moving into position now, over.
Key.Chinese: 我們遇到了綠軍的巡邏，但我懷疑他們在被擊倒前來不及發出警告。正在移動到準備位置，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们遇到了绿军的巡逻队，但我怀疑他们没时间发出警报。正在移动到预备位置，完毕。

Key.Original: Copy that, Swordfish. Move quickly. The guys in the town probably heard the shots.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"劍魚"。快點移動。在小鎮裡的敵人應該已經聽到槍聲了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"剑鱼"。快点移动。在小镇里的敌人应该已经听到枪声了。

Container.name: 45_Guards_Dead
Container.situation: the player's team kills the guards on the beach

Key.Original: They're down.
Key.Chinese: 他們倒了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们倒了。

Container.name: 40_Enemies_Spotted
Container.situation: player's co spots the enemy units on the beach

Key.Original: Contact. Four guys, on the beach.
Key.Chinese: 接敵。四個人，在海灘上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 接敌。四个人，在海滩上。

Container.name: 35_Dont_Touch
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Member B;EPA B Alpha Member A;
Container.situation: other squad members joke about the mines

Key.Original: Yeah. Please don't touch any of them.
Key.Chinese: 恩。請不要碰到它們其中的任何一個。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯。请别碰任何一个。

Key.Original: That's a lot of mines.
Key.Chinese: 這裡有一堆水雷。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里有好多水雷。

Container.name: 30_Get_Out
Container.situation: the player's co orders everyone out

Key.Original: Okay, end of the line. Everyone out.
Key.Chinese: 好，我們到底了。大家出船。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好，我们到底了。大家出艇。

Container.name: 25_Mines
Container.situation: the sdv approaches the minefield

Key.Original: Damn. Mines.
Key.Chinese: 該死。有水雷。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。有水雷。

Container.name: 20_Heads
Container.situation: the sdv passes under the large rock formation

Key.Original: Mind your heads.
Key.Chinese: 小心你的頭。
Key.Chinesesimp: 小心你的头。

Container.name: 15_Big_Boat
Container.situation: the sdv passes the larger boat wreck

Key.Original: OK. One more time.
Key.Chinese: 好。再提醒一次。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好。再提醒一次。

Key.Original: We'll insert at the bay and move up to a vantage point above the village.
Key.Chinese: 我們將會滲透進海灣，並移動到準備點來觀察整個小鎮。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们将会渗透进海湾，并移动到准备点来观察整个小镇。

Key.Original: Syncing with Bravo, we'll strike together and neutralize enemy forces.
Key.Chinese: 與Bravo合作，我們將會肅清整個小鎮的敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与 Bravo 合作，我们将会肃清整个小镇的敌人。

Container.name: 10_Doubt
Container.participants: EPA B Kerry;EPA B Delta Lead;
Container.situation: kerry wonders what delta are doing

Key.Original: Go ahead, Kerry.
Key.Chinese: 請問，克里。
Key.Chinesesimp: 问吧，克里。

Key.Original: They've got their own assignment.
Key.Chinese: 他們已經有了別的任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们已经有了别的任务。

Key.Original: Lieutenant, can I ask question?
Key.Chinese: 上尉，我可以問個問題嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 上尉，我可以问个问题吗？

Key.Original: It's need to know, Corporal. If you see what I mean.
Key.Chinese: 你只能知道這些了，下士。如果你能了解我的意思。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你只能知道这些了，下士。如果你能理解我的意思。

Key.Original: Why are we on this mission, exactly? Why didn't Miller just leave it to you guys?
Key.Chinese: 為什麼會由我們來執行這個任務?為什麼米勒不直接讓你們的人來做就行了?
Key.Chinesesimp: 为什么会由我们来执行这个任务？为什么米勒不直接让你们的人来做？

Key.Original: More important than this?
Key.Chinese: 比這還更重要的任務?
Key.Chinesesimp: 比这还更重要的任务？

Container.name: 100_Understood
Container.situation: miller acknowledges the extraction plan

Key.Original: Acknowledged, Swordfish. Out.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"劍魚"。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"剑鱼"。通话完毕。

Container.name: 05_Open_Hatches
Container.situation: sdv driver announces opening the hatches

Key.Original: Releasing the hatch locks.
Key.Chinese: 解開艙門鎖。
Key.Chinesesimp: 解开舱门锁。

Container.name: 01_Diving
Container.situation: sdv driver announces diving

Key.Original: All right. Diving.
Key.Chinese: 好。開始下潛。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好。开始下潜。

Container.name: 10_Treasure
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Member A;EPA B Alpha Member B;
Container.situation: other people in the sdv joke about treasure in the wrecks

Key.Original: See that wreck? I wonder if there's some buried treasure in there.
Key.Chinese: 看到那殘骸了嗎?不知道裡面有沒有埋寶藏。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看到那残骸了吗？不知道里面有没有埋宝藏。

Key.Original: Oh, thanks, Captain Obvious.
Key.Chinese: 喔，感謝提醒，船長大人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，感谢提醒，船长大人。

Key.Original: Nah, it's just a fishing trawler.
Key.Chinese: 哈，它只是一艘拖網漁船。
Key.Chinesesimp: 哈，它只是一艘拖网渔船。

Key.Original: Fuck off.
Key.Chinese: 去你的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 滚蛋。

Key.Original: To be continued
Key.Chinese: 下集待續
Key.Chinesesimp: 下集待续

Key.Original: Sometime later...
Key.Chinese: 一段時間後...
Key.Chinesesimp: 一段时间后...

Container.name: 110_Instructions
Container.situation: boat crews ask for orders

Key.Original: Sir? Orders?!
Key.Chinese: 長官?命令?!
Key.Chinesesimp: 长官？命令？！

Container.name: 105_Contacts
Container.situation: boat crews spot planes

Key.Original: Miller! To the left! Fastmovers inbound!
Key.Chinese: 米勒!我們左前方!有戰鬥機在逼近中!
Key.Chinesesimp: 米勒！左舷！战斗机逼近！

Container.name: 70_Paratroopers
Container.situation: player's co spots the paratroopers

Key.Original: Paratroopers!
Key.Chinese: 有傘兵!
Key.Chinesesimp: 有伞兵！

Container.name: 115_Open_Fire
Container.situation: miller orders them to open fire

Key.Original: Open fire!
Key.Chinese: 全力開火!
Key.Chinesesimp: 打！

Key.Original: The survivors launch a last-ditch effort to drive the remaining AAF units into the sea.
Key.Chinese: 倖存者們展開了最後的行動，希望可以把剩下的阿爾蒂斯武裝力量部隊全部趕到海裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 幸存者们展开了最后的行动，希望可以把剩下的 AAF 全部赶到海里。

Key.Original: Tipping Point
Key.Chinese: 轉捩點
Key.Chinesesimp: 转折点

Key.Original: I know things don't look good for us right now. We took a hit. We lost a number of good men.%1Now, nothing I've got to say will change that fact, but I do have new information. Late last night Delta managed to establish temporary long-range comms with NATO MEDCOM. %2Reinforcements%3 are inbound, gentlemen.%4We need to lay the groundwork for a full invasion. They need an established foothold, not %5a broken down base hidden in the woods%6. I say we attack now. We catch the AAF off-guard. We hold the ground we seize.%7I'll lead Delta behind enemy lines and take up %8an advanced position to the North of Agia Marina%9. %10Alpha%11 and %12Bravo%13 will lead the assault on %14the military range%15, while %16Charlie%17 hit %18Camp Rogain%19 and contain any counter-attack that might flank our main assault.%20Once the Range is secure, we'll converge on %21the town%22 and entrench our position. I'll go through the exact details of the plan with each individual squad leader. They'll bring the rest of their men up to speed.%23'With fearlessness and rage', gentlemen. Good luck.
Key.Chinese: 我知道現在的狀況看來不是倒向我們這邊。我們遭受打擊。我們失去了好幾名優秀的人。%1現在，不管我說什麼都改變不了這個事實，不過我確實有個新消息。昨天深夜，Delta成功建立起臨時的長距離通訊，並與北約的地中海司令部接上了。%2援軍%3正在趕來了，先生們。%4我們需要為入侵行動打下良好的基礎。他們需要一個堅固的立足點，而不是一座%5隱藏在森林裡並毀損的基地%6。我說我們現在就必須要攻擊。我們抓住阿爾蒂斯武裝力量放鬆警戒的時候。我們要堅守住我們肅清的每一塊地。%7我將會帶領Delta深入敵後，%8前往AgiaMarina的北方%9。%10Alpha%11和%12Bravo%13將會攻擊%14軍用靶場%15，同時%16Charlie%17將會攻擊%18羅根營地%19並確保不會有任何反擊會碰觸到我們主攻擊的後翼。%20在靶場被肅清之後，我們將會在%21城鎮%22裡會合並鞏固我們的位置。我將會再跟各個隊長核對具體細節。他們會在個別通知各小隊成員。%23'願無畏與憤怒的精神與你們同在'，先生們。祝好運。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我知道现在的状况对我们不利。我们遭受了打击。我们失去了很多优秀的人。%1现在，不管我说什么都改变不了这些事实，不过我确实有个新消息。昨天深夜，Delta 成功建立起临时的长距离通信，并与北约的地中海司令部联络上了。%2援军%3正在赶来，先生们。%4我们需要为入侵行动打下良好的基础。他们需要一个坚固的立足点，而不是一座%5隐藏在森林里并毁损的基地%6。我说我们现在就必须要攻击。我们抓住 AAF 放松警戒的时候。我们要坚守住我们肃清的每一块土地。%7我将会带领 Delta 深入敌后，%8前往圣马里纳的北方%9。%10Alpha%11和%12Bravo%13将会攻击%14军用靶场%15，同时%16Charlie%17将会攻击%18罗根营地%19以制止任何可能针对我方主要突击侧翼的反击。%20在靶场被肃清之后，我们将会在%21城镇%22里会合并巩固我们的位置。我将会再跟各班长核对具体细节。他们则个别通知各班成员。%23'愿无畏与愤怒的精神与你们同在'，先生们。祝好运。

Key.Original: %1Alpha%2 - Your team.%3%4Bravo%5 - Supporting squad.%6%7Charlie%8 - Tasked with assaulting %9Camp Rogain%10.%11%12Delta%13 - Tasked with flanking %14Agia Marina%15, Operational Lead.
Key.Chinese: %1Alpha%2-你的小隊。%3%4Bravo%5-支援小隊。%6%7Charlie%8-任務為攻擊%9羅根營地%10。%11%12Delta%13-任務為側襲%14聖馬里納%15，此次行動的指揮。
Key.Chinesesimp: %1Alpha%2-你的小组。%3%4Bravo%5-支援班。%6%7Charlie%8-任务为攻击%9罗根营地%10。%11%12Delta%13-任务为侧袭%14圣马里纳%15，此次行动的指挥。

Key.Original: Advance and secure a number of key locations. Clear %1the military range%2 before converging upon %3the town%4. Hold the ground.
Key.Chinese: 攻擊並佔領幾個關鍵位置。先肅清%1軍用靶場%2，然後再於%3城鎮%4中集合。堅守該地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 攻击并占领几个关键位置。先肃清%1军用靶场%2，然后再于%3城镇%4中集合。坚守该地。

Key.Original:
1. Seize %1the military range%2.
2. Advance and clear %3Agia Marina%4 of AAF forces.
3. Entrench your position and await %5inbound NATO reinforcements%6.
Key.Chinese:
1. 肅清%1軍用靶場%2。
2. 攻擊並佔領%3聖馬里納%4。
3. 鞏固你們的位置並等待%5北約援軍%6的抵達。
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 肃清%1军用靶场%2。
2. 攻击并占领%3圣马里纳%4。
3. 巩固你们的位置并等待%5北约援军%6的抵达。

Key.Original: Clear Agia Marina
Key.Chinese: 佔領聖馬里納
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清圣马里纳

Key.Original: Once %1the military range%2 has been secured, move on to %3the town%4 and clear it of all remaining AAF.
Key.Chinese: 當%1軍用靶場%2被肅清後，移動到%3城鎮%4中並清理掉剩下的阿爾蒂斯武裝力量部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当%1军用靶场%2被肃清后，推进到%3城镇%4中并清理掉剩下的 AAF 部队。

Key.Original: Retreat
Key.Chinese: 撤退
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤退

Key.Original: RETREAT
Key.Chinese: 撤退
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤退

Key.Original: Contact with Broadway has been lost and Miller has ordered a full retreat. Rendezvous with him and evacuate from the island.
Key.Chinese: 我們已經與"百老匯"失去聯繫，而米勒也下達了全面撤退的命令。與他會合，並逃離這座島。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们已经与"百老汇"失去联系，而米勒也下达了全面撤退的命令。与他汇合并逃离这座岛。

Key.Original: Capture the Military Range
Key.Chinese: 肅清軍用靶場
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清军用靶场

Key.Original: Clear %1the military range%2 with the help of %3Bravo%4.
Key.Chinese: 在%3Bravo%4的幫助下肅清%1軍用靶場%2。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在%3Bravo%4的帮助下肃清%1军用靶场%2。

Key.Original: Rendezvous with the Guerrillas
Key.Chinese: 與游擊隊會合
Key.Chinesesimp: 与游击队会合

Key.Original: Follow Captain Miller and attempt to rendezvous with the guerrillas on Altis.
Key.Chinese: 跟隨米勒上校前往阿爾蒂斯，並嘗試與游擊隊會合。
Key.Chinesesimp: 跟随米勒上校前往阿尔蒂斯，并尝试与游击队会合。

Key.Original: Rendezvous with Bravo
Key.Chinese: 與Bravo會合
Key.Chinesesimp: 与 Bravo 会合

Key.Original: %1Rendezvous%2 with %3Bravo%4 east of %5the military range%6.
Key.Chinese: 與%3Bravo%4在%5軍用靶場%6的東邊%1會合%2。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与%3Bravo%4在%5军用靶场%6的东边%1会合%2。

Key.Original: Board the Speedboat
Key.Chinese: 搭乘快艇
Key.Chinesesimp: 搭乘快艇

Key.Original: GET IN
Key.Chinese: 搭乘
Key.Chinesesimp: 搭乘

Key.Original: Get in the Speedboat as a passenger.
Key.Chinese: 進入快艇的後座。
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入快艇的后座。

Container.name: x01_Spotted
Container.situation: player compromises the attack

Key.Original: What the fuck are you doing, Corporal Kerry?!
Key.Chinese: 你他媽的在幹什麼，下士克里?!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你他妈的在干什么，克里下士？！

Key.Original: Dammit, we're compromised! Move in!
Key.Chinese: 該死，我們已經被發現了!開始進攻!
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死，我们已经被发现了！开始进攻！

Container.name: 95_Situation
Container.situation: player learns of the plan

Key.Original: ... Permission to speak, sir?
Key.Chinese: ...請允許發言，長官?
Key.Chinesesimp: ...请允许发言，长官？

Key.Original: Respectfully, sir, when the hell are you going to tell us what's going on?
Key.Chinese: 先跟你說聲抱歉，長官，你他媽的到底要什麼時候才會告訴我們全部的事情?
Key.Chinesesimp: 劳烦赐教，长官，你他妈什么时候才肯告诉我们究竟发生了什么事？

Key.Original: Granted.
Key.Chinese: 你講吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你讲吧。

Key.Original: Saying 'respectfully', Corporal, and proceeding to be disrespectful somewhat defeats the purpose, don't you think?
Key.Chinese: 放尊重點，下士，你再這樣不禮貌下去，你什麼也不會得到，難道你不覺得嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你嘴上说"劳烦赐教"，下士，可后面的话都是些粗鄙之语，你这样是问不出话来的，难道你不这么觉得吗？

Key.Original: ... Look, I can't say exactly what happened. What I can say is what's happening right now.
Key.Chinese: ...聽好，我不能準確的說到底是怎樣了。但我能說現在將要發生的事情。
Key.Chinesesimp: ...听好，我也说不清到底发生了什么。但我知道现在会发生什么。

Key.Original: We're headed to Altis.
Key.Chinese: 我們正在前往阿爾蒂斯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们要去阿尔蒂斯。

Key.Original: There's a local guerilla movement there - FIA - the same guys that got themselves killed for us back on Stratis.
Key.Chinese: 那邊有游擊隊出沒-自由獨立同盟-就是那個為了我們在斯特拉蒂斯上戰死的同樣一批人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那边有游击队出没-FIA-就是在斯特拉蒂斯岛上那个为我们战死的人。

Key.Original: We'll make a quiet entrance and link up with them.
Key.Chinese: 我們將會悄悄潛入並與他們碰面。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们将会悄悄潜入并与他们碰面。

Container.name: 90_Away
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Lead;EPA B Miller;
Container.situation: survivors successfully evacuated

Key.Original: Christ, that was close...
Key.Chinese: 天哪，剛剛那可真險...
Key.Chinesesimp: 天哪，刚刚那可真险...

Key.Original: Too close.
Key.Chinese: 太接近了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 太危险了。

Container.name: 85_All_In
Container.situation: player's team informs miller that they're all in

Key.Original: We're in, Go! Go!
Key.Chinese: 我們都進來了，走!走!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们都上船了，走！走！

Container.name: 80_Boats
Container.situation: miller orders the player's team into the boats

Key.Original: There you are, Alpha!
Key.Chinese: 你們來了，Alpha!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们来了，Alpha！

Key.Original: Get the fuck into the boats!
Key.Chinese: 趕快給我滾上船!
Key.Chinesesimp: 赶快给我滚上船！

Container.name: 75_Cover
Container.situation: player's co orders the team to get into cover

Key.Original: Head for the trees!
Key.Chinese: 進入樹林!
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入树林！

Key.Original: Move from cover to cover!
Key.Chinese: 利用掩體移動!
Key.Chinesesimp: 利用掩体移动！

Container.name: 65_Mortars
Container.situation: player's team get hit by mortar fire

Key.Original: Incoming!
Key.Chinese: 迫砲來襲!
Key.Chinesesimp: 迫击炮来袭！

Key.Original: Keep moving! They'll have a harder time getting a bead on you!
Key.Chinese: 保持移動!這會讓他們很難擊中你!
Key.Chinesesimp: 保持移动！这会让他们很难击中你！

Container.name: 60_To_RV
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Lead;EPA B Miller;
Container.situation: player's team move to the rendezvous

Key.Original: Delta, what about Charlie?!
Key.Chinese: Delta，那Charlie該怎麼辦?!
Key.Chinesesimp: Delta，那 Charlie 该怎么办？！

Key.Original: They're non-responsive, Alpha. There's nothing we can do for them.
Key.Chinese: 他們沒有回應了，Alpha。我們已經沒辦法再為他們做什麼了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们没有回应了，Alpha。我们已经没办法再为他们做什么了。

Key.Original: Unless you'd like to end up the same way, I suggest you get your ass into gear!
Key.Chinese: 除非你們想以同樣的方式結束，不然我建議你們趕快滾到我們這裡來!
Key.Chinesesimp: 除非你们想以同样的方式完蛋，不然我建议你们赶快滚到我们这里来！

Key.Original: Double time, Alpha. We'll be waiting. Delta out.
Key.Chinese: 加快移動，Alpha。我們會在這邊等。Delta通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 加快移动，Alpha。我们会在这边等。Delta 通话完毕。

Container.name: 55_Retreat
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Lead;EPA B Miller;
Container.situation: miller orders the retreat

Key.Original: Delta, this is Alpha! What the hell is going on?! Over!
Key.Chinese: Delta，這裡是Alpha!現在他媽的到底是怎麼了!完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: Delta，这里是 Alpha！现在他妈的到底是怎么了！完毕！

Key.Original: Captain Miller! Do you read? Respond!
Key.Chinese: 米勒上校!你是否有聽到?回覆!
Key.Chinesesimp: 米勒上校！你是否有听到？回覆！

Key.Original: Alpha, Bravo, listen carefully. There's not much time. These guys mean business.
Key.Chinese: Alpha，Bravo，仔細聽好了。我們已經沒有多少時間了。這些傢伙的出現意味著有麻煩了。
Key.Chinesesimp: Alpha，Bravo，仔细听好了。我们已经没有多少时间了。这些家伙的出现意味着有麻烦了。

Key.Original: Disengage. Fall back from the town. Head north.
Key.Chinese: 停止交戰。從城鎮中撤出來。向北邊走。
Key.Chinesesimp: 停止交战。从城镇中撤出来。往北走。

Key.Original: We'll RV at a small bay. Grid 032 068.
Key.Chinese: 我們會在一個小海灣跟你們會合。座標是032068。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们会在一个小海湾跟你们会合。座标是032068。

Container.name: 50_Confused
Container.situation: player's co reacts

Key.Original: Jesus Christ!
Key.Chinese: 我的天哪!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的天哪！

Container.name: 45_Under_Attack
Container.situation: csat attack, nato knocked-out

Key.Original: All callsigns, this is Charlie! We're facing a huge counter-attack here! We're being engaged by multiple unknown contacts!
Key.Chinese: 所有小隊，這裡是Charlie!我們這裡正遭遇到猛烈的反擊!我們正與多名未知的目標接戰!
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有小队，这里是 Charlie！我们这里正遭遇到猛烈的反击！我们正与众多不明目标接战！

Key.Original: Numerous aircraft and infantry firing on our positions! Charlie is under heavy assault, I say again -
Key.Chinese: 為數眾多的直升機與步兵正在向我們的位置開火!Charlie正遭受到猛烈的突擊，我重複一遍-
Key.Chinesesimp: 为数众多的飞机与步兵正在向我们的位置开火！Charlie 正遭受到猛烈的突击，我重复一遍-

Container.name: 40_Orders
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Lead;EPA B Miller;
Container.situation: player's team reports the helicopters

Key.Original: Alpha to Delta, a bunch of unidentified helos just buzzed the capital, heading east. Please advise, over.
Key.Chinese: Alpha呼叫Delta，一群不明直升機剛剛飛過了城鎮上空，正往東方移動。有何指示，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Alpha 呼叫 Delta，一群不明直升机刚刚飞过了城镇上空，正往东方移动。有何指示，完毕。

Key.Original: Copy that, Alpha. Wait one.
Key.Chinese: 收到，Alpha。請稍等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，Alpha。请稍等。

Container.name: 35_Helis_Spotted
Container.situation: player's team spots the csat helicopters

Key.Original: What the fuck?!
Key.Chinese: 搞什麼鬼?!
Key.Chinesesimp: 搞什么鬼？！

Container.name: 30_NATO_Inbound
Container.participants: EPA B Miller;EPA B Alpha Lead;
Container.situation: miller tells player's team nato's inbound

Key.Original: Fan-fucking-tastic, Delta! Any guess why? Over.
Key.Chinese: 真他媽的棒極了，Delta!有猜到為什麼嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 真他妈的棒极了，Delta！有猜到为什么吗？完毕。

Key.Original: Solid copy, Delta. We'll get it done. Alpha out.
Key.Chinese: 完整收到，Delta。我們會把它完成的。Alpha通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 完整收到，Delta。我们会搞定的。Alpha 通话完毕。

Key.Original: Splendid news, Alpha. We see AAF forces pulling back. Acknowledge, over.
Key.Chinese: 好消息，Alpha。我們看到了阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的部隊正在撤退。已確認，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好消息，Alpha。我们看到 AAF 正在撤退。已确认，完毕。

Key.Original: Uncertain. It could be that they're regrouping for a counter-offensive.
Key.Chinese: 還不確定。他們可能是要先重新集結，在向我們發動反擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 还不确定。他们可能是要先重新集结，在向我们发动反击。

Key.Original: Either way, now is the time to strike. Push forward, Alpha. Seize and hold.
Key.Chinese: 不論如何，現在正是攻擊的最好時機。向前推進，Alpha。肅清並佔領。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不论如何，现在正是攻击的最好时机。向前推进，Alpha。肃清并占领。

Container.name: 27_Charlie_Status
Container.participants: EPA B Miller;EPA B Charlie Lead;
Container.situation: player's team informs miller the range is clear

Key.Original: We're dug in. Exchanging fire with multiple contacts in the vicinity of Rogain. Over.
Key.Chinese: 我們在攻擊了。正在與羅根附近的敵人交火。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们在攻击了。正在与罗根附近的敌人交火。完毕。

Key.Original: Solid Copy, Delta. Not a chance in hell of that. Charlie out.
Key.Chinese: 完整收到，Delta。不會發生那種情況的。Charlie通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 完整收到，Delta。不会发生那种情况的。Charlie 通话完毕。

Key.Original: Charlie, what your status? Over.
Key.Chinese: Charlie，你們的狀況如何?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Charlie，你们的状况如何？完毕。

Key.Original: Roger. Keep the situation contained, Charlie. Don't get greedy, understood? Over.
Key.Chinese: 了解。持續控制住情勢，Charlie。不要太貪心了，了解嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。持续控制住情势，Charlie。不要太贪心了，了解吗？完毕。

Container.name: 25_To_Town
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Lead;EPA B Miller;
Container.situation: player's team informs miller the range is clear

Key.Original: Delta, this is Alpha. We've taken the mil-range. Ready to proceed to the town. How copy? Over.
Key.Chinese: Delta，這裡是Alpha。我們佔領了軍事靶場。已經準備好前往城鎮。有收到嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Delta，这里是 Alpha。我们占领了军事靶场。已经准备好前往城镇。有收到吗？完毕。

Key.Original: Roger that. Sterling work, Alpha.
Key.Chinese: 了解。幹的好，Alpha。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。干的好，Alpha。

Key.Original: All teams, we are go for main assault. Delta's advancing. Out.
Key.Chinese: 所有小隊，我們將開始主要攻擊。Delta正在推進了。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有小组，我们将开始主要攻击。Delta 正在推进了。通话完毕。

Container.name: 20_Range_Clear
Container.situation: player's co informs team the range is clear

Key.Original: Okay... looks like we're clear.
Key.Chinese: 好的...看來我們已經肅清了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的...看来我们已经肃清了。

Container.name: 15_Attack
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Lead;EPA B Miller;
Container.situation: player's team informs miller they're starting the attack

Key.Original: Alpha to Delta, we've linked up with Bravo. Beginning the main assault. Get ready. Over.
Key.Chinese: Alpha呼叫Delta，我們已經與Bravo會合了。請準備好開始主要攻擊。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Alpha 呼叫 Delta，我们已经与 Bravo 会合了。开始主要攻击。完毕。

Key.Original: Understood. Good luck. out.
Key.Chinese: 了解。祝好運。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。祝好运。通话完毕。

Container.name: 10_Rendezvous
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Lead;EPA B Bravo Lead;
Container.situation: alpha meets with bravo

Key.Original: Good to see you, Bravo.
Key.Chinese: 真高興見到你們，Bravo。
Key.Chinesesimp: 真高兴见到你们，Bravo。

Key.Original: Likewise, Alpha.
Key.Chinese: 我們也一樣，Alpha。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们也一样，Alpha。

Container.name: 100_Insane
Container.situation: player questions miller's sanity

Key.Original: Well, with respect -
Key.Chinese: 恩，恕我直言-
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，敬请赐教-

Key.Original: Okay, fine. It sounds insane.
Key.Chinese: 好吧，好吧。這聽起來很瘋狂。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，好吧。这听起来很疯狂。

Key.Original: We're walking straight into a hornet's nest!
Key.Chinese: 因為我們正在走向蜂窩!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们正笔直冲进马蜂窝！

Key.Original: You're doing it again, Corporal.
Key.Chinese: 你正在做重複的事情，下士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你又来了，下士。

Key.Original: It's our best option - and there are only bad options.
Key.Chinese: 這是我們最好的選項了-而我們也只有壞的選項。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这是我们最好的选项了—而我们也只有坏的选项。

Container.name: 03_Warning
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Lead;EPA B Charlie Lead;
Container.situation: all squads report in

Key.Original: Alpha to Charlie, be advised, we've spotted enemy reinforcements heading in your direction. Over.
Key.Chinese: Alpha呼叫Charlie，請注意，我們發現到敵人的援軍正在往你們的方向移動。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Alpha 呼叫 Charlie，请注意，我们发现到敌人的援军正在往你们的方向移动。完毕。

Key.Original: Copy that, Alpha. Thanks for the heads-up. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，Alpha。感謝提醒。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，Alpha。感谢提醒。通话完毕。

Container.name: 01_Start
Container.participants: EPA B Miller;EPA B Alpha Lead;EPA B Bravo Lead;EPA B Charlie Lead;
Container.situation: all squads report in

Key.Original: This is Alpha, en route to the RV. ETA: 60 seconds. Over.
Key.Chinese: 這裡是Alpha，在前往會合點的路上。預計60秒後抵達。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是 Alpha，在前往会合点的路上。预计60秒后抵达。完毕。

Key.Original: Bravo here, likewise. Over.
Key.Chinese: Bravo在這，也是一樣。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Bravo 在这，也是一样。完毕。

Key.Original: Delta to all callsigns. We're in position. Send SITREP, over.
Key.Chinese: Delta呼叫所有小隊。我們就定位了。請回報狀況，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Delta 呼叫各呼号。我们就位了。请报告状况，完毕。

Key.Original: Charlie to Delta, we're on approach. Should have visual contact in a few seconds, over.
Key.Chinese: Charlie呼叫Delta，我們正在接近目標中。過不久後應該就可以看到敵人了，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Charlie 呼叫 Delta，我们正在接近目标中。过不久后应该就可以看到敌人了，完毕。

Key.Original: All squads, roger that.
Key.Chinese: 所有小隊，收到了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 各班，收到了。

Key.Original: Alright, gentlemen, we've got one shot at this. Let's get it done. Out.
Key.Chinese: 好的，先生們，我們只有一次機會。讓我們幹吧。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，先生们，我们只有一次机会。让我们干吧。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Friendly forces are pinned down in Girna.
Key.Chinese: 友軍部隊被壓制在吉爾納裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 友军部队被压制在格尔纳。

Key.Original: Death Valley
Key.Chinese: 死亡谷
Key.Chinesesimp: 死亡谷

Key.Original: UAV Scouting
Key.Chinese: 空中無人載具偵察
Key.Chinesesimp: 无人机侦察

Key.Original: Grenade Launcher
Key.Chinese: 榴彈發射器
Key.Chinesesimp: 榴弹发射器

Key.Original: Bravo were killed!
Key.Chinese: Bravo全軍覆沒!
Key.Chinesesimp: Bravo 全军覆没！

Key.Original:
It was risky but, thanks to you, Bravo are safe and an enemy mortar position is out of action.

While we're not yet in a position to hold the ground we took - and despite being forced to retreat - we managed to adapt to the situation on the ground and strike another blow against the AAF.
Key.Chinese:
這真危險，但感謝有你，Bravo已經安全了，而且敵方的迫擊砲陣地也已失去作用。

儘管我們還沒有能力能守住我們得到的土地-而且被迫撤退-我們仍成功的適應了現況，並在地面戰中再一次的給阿爾蒂斯武裝力量賞了一巴掌。
Key.Chinesesimp:
这真危险，但多亏有你 Bravo 已经安全了，而且敌方的迫击炮阵地也已失去作用。

尽管我们还没有能力能守住我们得到的土地—而且被迫撤退—我们仍成功的适应了现况，并在地面战中再一次给 AAF 赏了一巴掌。

Key.Original:
It was risky but, thanks to you, Bravo are safe.

While we're not yet in a position to hold the ground we took - and despite being forced to retreat - we managed to adapt to the situation on the ground and strike another blow against the AAF.
Key.Chinese:
這真危險，但感謝有你，Bravo已經安全了。

儘管我們還沒有能力能守住我們得到的土地-而且被迫撤退-我們仍成功的適應了現況，並在地面戰中再一次的給阿爾蒂斯武裝力量賞了一巴掌。
Key.Chinesesimp:
这真危险，但多亏有你 Bravo 已经安全了。

尽管我们还没有能力能守住我们得到的土地—而且被迫撤退—我们仍成功的适应了现况，并在地面战中再一次给 AAF 赏了一巴掌。

Key.Original: As you're probably aware, we've been scouting positions to our north, keeping a check on enemy movement.%1Unfortunately, Bravo ran into trouble, taking contact in %2a village%3 a little to the west of %4our position%5.%6They're pinned down and need our support.%7An advanced element has already set up %8a position nearby%9 to get eyes on the situation. AAF units have mobilized along the valley leading to the village. More support is no doubt en route.%10%11Alpha%12 will approach from the east. Use the high ground and forest to your advantage. Clear the village and get our boys out of there.
Key.Chinese: 正如你們所知，我們已經偵察了我們位置的北方，持續留意敵人的動向。%1不幸的是，Bravo陷入了麻煩，與敵人在%4我們%5西方不遠處的%2村莊%3中交戰。%6他們被壓制，並且需要我們的支援。%7現在，一個%8偵察員%9已經被派遣到前線去了解狀況。阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的部隊正沿著山谷前往村莊。無疑的，更多的支援正在路上了。%10%11Alpha%12將從東方靠近。利用制高點與森林來創造你們的優勢。肅清村莊並帶我們的兄弟離開那裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正如你们所知，我们已经侦察了我们位置的北方，持续留意敌人的动向。%1不幸的是，Bravo 陷入了麻烦，与敌人在%4我们%5西方不远处的%2村庄%3中交战。%6他们被压制，并且需要我们的支援。%7现在，一个%8先遣分队%9已经被派遣到前线去了解状况。AAF 正沿着山谷前往村庄。更多的支援无疑正在路上。%10%11Alpha%12将从东方靠近。利用制高点与森林来创造你们的优势。肃清村庄并带我们的兄弟离开那里。

Key.Original: %1Alpha%2 - Your squad.%3%4Bravo%5 - Friendly element in Girna.%6%7Falcon%8 - Camp Maxwell HQ.%9%10Charlie%11 - Supporting element.%12%13Delta%14 - Camp Maxwell defence.
Key.Chinese: %1Alpha%2-你的小隊。%3%4Bravo%5-在吉爾納裡的友軍。%6%7"獵鷹"%8-麥克斯韋營地指揮部。%9%10Charlie%11-支援小隊。%12%13Delta%14-防禦麥克斯韋營地。
Key.Chinesesimp: %1Alpha%2-你的班。%3%4Bravo%5-在格尔纳里的友军。%6%7"猎鹰"%8-麦克斯韦营地指挥部。%9%10Charlie%11-支援分队。%12%13Delta%14-防御麦克斯韦营地。

Key.Original: Support Bravo by eliminating AAF contacts in the vicinity of %1Girna%2.
Key.Chinese: 通過殲滅在%1吉爾納%2附近的阿爾蒂斯武裝力量部隊來支援Bravo。
Key.Chinesesimp: 通过歼灭在%1格尔纳%2附近的 AAF 部队来支援 Bravo。

Key.Original:
1. Move along the ridgeline and get into position.
2. Secure %1Bravo's position%2.
3. Return to %3Camp Maxwell%4.
Key.Chinese:
1. 沿著山脊線移動到進入位置。
2. 肅清%1Bravo的位置%2。
3. 返回%3麥克斯韋營地%4。
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 沿着山脊线移动到进入位置。
2. 肃清%1Bravo 的位置%2。
3. 返回%3麦克斯韦营地%4。

Key.Original: Assault Girna
Key.Chinese: 突擊吉爾納
Key.Chinesesimp: 突击格尔纳

Key.Original: ASSAULT
Key.Chinese: 突擊
Key.Chinesesimp: 突击

Key.Original: Assault and secure %1the village%2. Take care to avoid friendly fire. Bravo are holed up in %3this building%4.
Key.Chinese: 突擊並肅清%1村莊%2。小心避免誤傷友軍。Bravo正在這棟%3建築物%4裡防守。
Key.Chinesesimp: 突击并肃清%1村庄%2。小心避免误伤友军。Bravo 正在这栋%3建筑物%4里防守。

Key.Original: Deploy the UAV
Key.Chinese: 部署空中無人載具
Key.Chinesesimp: 部署无人机

Key.Original: TAKE EQUIPMENT
Key.Chinese: 拿取裝備
Key.Chinesesimp: 拿取装备

Key.Original: Equip both the backpack and UAV terminal, and deploy the Darter.
Key.Chinese: 裝備背包與無人載具終端機，然後部屬"飞镖"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 装备背包与无人机终端，然后部署"飞镖"。

Key.Original: Eliminate the Spotters
Key.Chinese: 殲滅觀測手
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭观察员

Key.Original: Mortars have opened fire on %1Girna%2. Locate and eliminate %3the spotters%4 before it's too late!
Key.Chinese: 迫擊砲正在攻擊%1吉爾納%2。在一切都太遲之前，搜尋並殲滅敵軍%3觀測手%4!
Key.Chinesesimp: 迫击炮正在攻击%1格尔纳%2。在一切都太迟之前，搜寻并歼灭敌军%3观察员%4！

Key.Original: Retreat
Key.Chinese: 撤退
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤退

Key.Original: RETREAT
Key.Chinese: 撤退
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤退

Key.Original: An AAF Buzzard has engaged %1Girna%2. Fall back to %3Camp Maxwell%4.
Key.Chinese: 一臺阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的"禿鷹"戰鬥機已經鎖定了%1吉爾納%2。趕快撤退回%3麥克斯韋營地%4。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一架 AAF 的"秃鹰"战斗机正在攻击%1格尔纳%2。赶快撤退回%3麦克斯韦营地%4。

Key.Original: Divert
Key.Chinese: 改道
Key.Chinesesimp: 改道

Key.Original: REGROUP
Key.Chinese: 重新集結
Key.Chinesesimp: 重新集结

Key.Original: You lost contact with your man on point. Divert to %1his last known position%2.
Key.Chinese: 你與你的偵察兵失去了聯繫。改道到他的%1最後已知位置%2。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你与你的尖兵失去了联系。改道到他的%1最后已知位置%2。

Key.Original: Move to the Staging Point
Key.Chinese: 移動到進入點
Key.Chinesesimp: 移动到进入点

Key.Original: MOVE
Key.Chinese: 移動
Key.Chinesesimp: 移动

Key.Original: Bravo are pinned down in %1Girna%2. Take the high ground and use the forest to cover your approach.
Key.Chinese: Bravo被壓制在%1吉爾納%2裡。走高的地方，並利用森林來掩護你們的接近。
Key.Chinesesimp: Bravo 被压制在%1格尔纳%2村内。从高地前进，并利用森林来掩护你们的接近。

Key.Original: Defend the Doc
Key.Chinese: 保護醫護兵
Key.Chinesesimp: 保护卫生兵

Key.Original: DEFEND
Key.Chinese: 保護
Key.Chinesesimp: 保护

Key.Original: Your squad mate is down! Cover the medic as he tries to stabilize him.
Key.Chinese: 你的隊友倒下了!掩護醫護兵，好讓他治療傷員。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的队友倒下了！掩护卫生兵，好让他治疗伤员。

Container.name: x20_Faster_Charlie
Container.situation: charlie tells everyone to keep moving instead of bravo

Key.Original: Keep moving! He's not done yet!
Key.Chinese: 繼續移動!它還沒有完!
Key.Chinesesimp: 继续移动！它还没完呢！

Container.name: x15_Mortar_Dead
Container.situation: player took out the mortar instead of the spotters

Key.Original: Sir, mortar neutralized!
Key.Chinese: 長官，敵方迫擊砲已殲滅!
Key.Chinesesimp: 长官，敌方迫击炮已歼灭！

Container.name: x10_UAV_Destroyed
Container.situation: player reports the darter going down

Key.Original: Crap... the Darter's down.
Key.Chinese: 該死..."飞镖"壞了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死..."飞镖"坏了。

Container.name: x05_Doc_Dead
Container.situation: player's co acknowledges the doc's death

Key.Original: Fuck! Doc's hit!
Key.Chinese: 幹!醫生中彈了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 操！医生中弹了！

Container.name: x01_Bravo_Dead
Container.situation: miller reports bravo's death

Key.Original: Falcon to all squads, we've lost comms with Bravo. Presumed KIA. Fall back, ASAP. Out.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"致所有小隊，我們與Bravo失去通訊。推測他們已經陣亡。立即撤回。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"致所有小队，我们与 Bravo 失去通信。推测他们已经阵亡。立即撤回。通话完毕。

Container.name: i05_UAV_Scouting
Container.situation: bravo tells player how to use the uav

Key.Original: Think of it as a micro-helicopter, Corporal. Pitch, bank, rudder, all that crap.
Key.Chinese: 把它想像成一臺迷你直升機，下士。仰角，側傾，方向舵，完全一模一樣。
Key.Chinesesimp: 把它想像成一台迷你直升机，下士。仰角，侧倾，方向舵，完全一模一样。

Key.Original: The thing's got thermal. Use it to pick out the assholes from the trees.
Key.Chinese: 那東西有熱成像。用它來揪出那幾個藏在樹林裡的混蛋。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那东西有热成像。用它来揪出那几个藏在树林里的混蛋。

Key.Original: Once you've found them, pick them off yourself if you think you can. Otherwise, mark them for Charlie to fuck up.
Key.Chinese: 一旦你找到了，你可以選擇自己做掉他們。或者，標記他們，讓Charlie搞定他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一旦你找到了，你可以要么自己做掉他们，或者标记他们，让 Charlie 搞定他们。

Key.Original: Just don't take too long! We haven't exactly got all day here!
Key.Chinese: 只要不要花太多時間!我們並沒有一整天的時間可以耗在這!
Key.Chinesesimp: 只是不要花太多时间！我们不能耗在这儿一整天！

Container.name: i01_Grenade_Launcher
Container.situation: leader tells player how to use the gl

Key.Original: Kerry, if you can take your 3GL to a vantage point, you might be able to rain down hell as we move up!
Key.Chinese: 克里，假如你能帶著你的3GL到制高點，你就有可能為我們在山谷中開路!
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，假如你能带着你的3GL 到制高点，你就有可能为我们在山谷中开路！

Key.Original: But be careful where you aim that thing, it ain't going to behave like a normal round! Try not to blow us up in the process!
Key.Chinese: 但請你瞄準的時候小心點，它跟一般子彈的軌跡並不相同!不要在射擊的過程中把我們給炸了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 但请你瞄准的时候小心点，它跟一般子弹的轨迹不同！别把我们给炸了！

Container.name: 95_Designated
Container.situation: charlie acknowledges the marked spotters

Key.Original: Copy on your mark, Alpha! Engaging!
Key.Chinese: 收到你們的標記，Alpha!交戰中!
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到你们的标记，Alpha！交战中！

Container.name: 90_Designate
Container.participants: EPA B Charlie Lead;EPA B Bravo Lead;
Container.situation: charlie offers their support

Key.Original: Just don't take all day, guys! We're kind of in a situation here! Out!
Key.Chinese: 只要不要花費一整天就好，兄弟!我們正在被攻擊中!通話完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: 只要别花上一整天，兄弟！我们正在被攻击！通话完毕！

Key.Original: Alpha, Bravo, this is Charlie. We're on station, ready to assist.
Key.Chinese: Alpha，Bravo，這裡是Charlie。我們就定位了，已經準備好支援。
Key.Chinesesimp: Alpha，Bravo，这里是 Charlie。我们就位了，已经准备好支援。

Key.Original: If you can get those assholes painted, Alpha, we can fuck them up! Over!
Key.Chinese: 如果你們可以標記到這幾個混蛋，Alpha，我們就可以把他們轟回老家!完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你们可以标记到这几个混蛋，Alpha，我们就可以把他们轰回老家！完毕！

Container.name: 85_On_It
Container.situation: player acknowledges

Key.Original: On it, sir!
Key.Chinese: 好的，長官!
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，长官！

Container.name: 80_Volunteer
Container.situation: player is ordered to use the uav

Key.Original: Kerry, you're up!
Key.Chinese: 克里，你去!
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，你去！

Container.name: 75_Spotters
Container.situation: bravo tells alpha about the uav operator

Key.Original: Alpha, we've got mortar fire incoming!
Key.Chinese: Alpha，我們正遭受迫擊砲的攻擊!
Key.Chinesesimp: Alpha，我们正遭受迫击炮的攻击！

Key.Original: They've gotta have eyes on our position...
Key.Chinese: 他們肯定有人在觀察我們的位置...
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们肯定有人在观察我们的位置...

Key.Original: ... Alpha - listen up - our UAV operator took a hit earlier.
Key.Chinese: ...Alpha-聽好了-我們的無人載具操作員在稍早前已經中彈身亡了。
Key.Chinesesimp: ...Alpha-听好了—我们的无人机操作员在稍早前已经中弹身亡了。

Key.Original: If you can get to it, you can use the Darter to locate the spotters!
Key.Chinese: 假如你們可以拿到他的裝備，你們就可以使用"飞镖"來尋找觀測手的位置!
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如你们可以拿到他的装备，你们就可以使用"飞镖"来寻找观察员的位置！

Container.name: 70_Mortar_Splashed
Container.situation: mortars hit for the first time

Key.Original: What the fuck?!
Key.Chinese: 搞什麼鬼?!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我操什么情况？！

Container.name: 65_Lazy
Container.situation: medic's not too happy with miller's orders. only plays if alive?

Key.Original: Entrench your positions'? That's easy for him to say.
Key.Chinese: '鞏固你們的位置'?他說的可真容易。
Key.Chinesesimp: '巩固你们的位置'？他说的可真容易。

Key.Original: Where the hell are the Brits, anyway? What the fuck is Delta doing?
Key.Chinese: 無論如何，該死的英國人到底在哪?Delta他媽的到底在幹什麼?
Key.Chinesesimp: 说到底该死的英国人到底在哪？Delta 他妈的到底在干什么？

Container.name: 60_Town_Clear
Container.participants: EPA B Bravo Lead;EPA B Miller;
Container.situation: bravo reports that the town's clear

Key.Original: Alright, Alpha... looks like we can move. Appreciate the assist!
Key.Chinese: 好的，Alpha...看來我們可以移動了。感謝協助!
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，Alpha...看来我们可以移动了。感谢协助！

Key.Original: Falcon, this is Bravo. Come in, over.
