Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，這裡是Bravo。接進，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，这里是 Bravo。请回复，完毕。

Key.Original: All clear here, sir. Thanks to Alpha, at least. Requesting further orders, over.
Key.Chinese: 這裡已經全部肅清，長官。這得感謝Alpha的支援。請求進一步命令，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里已经全部肃清，长官。这得感谢 Alpha 的支援。请求进一步命令，完毕。

Key.Original: Receiving you, Bravo. Go ahead. Over.
Key.Chinese: 收到你了，Bravo。請講。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到了，Bravo。请讲。完毕。

Key.Original: Good to hear, Bravo. Fine work, Alpha.
Key.Chinese: 真高興聽見這消息，Bravo。幹的好，Alpha。
Key.Chinesesimp: 真高兴听见这消息，Bravo。干的好，Alpha。

Key.Original: Charlie's inbound with support for your wounded. Entrench your positions. Falcon out.
Key.Chinese: "Charlie's"正在趕來支援你們的傷員。鞏固你們的位置。"獵鷹"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Charlie 正在赶来支援你们的伤员。巩固你们的位置。"猎鹰"通话完毕。

Container.name: 55_Town_Approach
Container.situation: bravo spots alpha

Key.Original: Bravo to Alpha! Bravo to Alpha! Good to see you, guys!
Key.Chinese: Bravo呼叫Alpha!Bravo呼叫Alpha!真高興見到你們，兄弟!
Key.Chinesesimp: Bravo 呼叫 Alpha！Bravo 呼叫 Alpha！真高兴见到你们，兄弟！

Key.Original: We're pinned down here! Two story house, center of the village! Watch your fire!
Key.Chinese: 我們被壓制在這!有兩層樓的房屋裡，村莊中間!小心你們的開火!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们被压制在这！有两层楼的房屋里，村庄中间！注意火力！

Container.name: 50_Ridgelines
Container.situation: player's co points out enemies on the ridge

Key.Original: Contacts on the ridgeline! Northwest! Focus your fire!
Key.Chinese: 接敵，在山脊線上!西北方!集中你們的火力!
Key.Chinesesimp: 接敌，在山脊线上！西北方！集中火力！

Container.name: 45_Keep_Moving
Container.situation: player's co submits

Key.Original: Shit. Alright! You heard it, guys!
Key.Chinese: 該死。好吧!你們都聽到了，大夥!
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。好吧！你们都听到了，大伙！

Key.Original: Kerry, flank left! Take the high ground!
Key.Chinese: 克里，向左包抄!佔領制高點!
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，向左包抄！抢占制高点！

Container.name: 40_Taking_Casualties
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Lead;EPA B Miller;
Container.situation: player's co argues with miller

Key.Original: Falcon, we're a man short and Greenbacks have taken up a position in the valley! What are our orders?
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，我們的人員短缺，而且綠軍已經佔領了山谷!我們的命令是什麼?
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，我们的人员短缺，而且绿军已经占领了山谷！我们的命令是什么？

Key.Original: Stay on mission, Alpha. Bravo still needs your support!
Key.Chinese: 專心在任務上，Alpha。Bravo仍然需要你們的支援!
Key.Chinesesimp: 专心执行任务，Alpha。Bravo 仍然需要你们的支援！

Key.Original: Avoid the valley. Maneuver around the threat. Clear the village. Falcon out.
Key.Chinese: 避開山谷。機動性移動。肅清村莊。"獵鷹"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 避开山谷。绕开威胁。肃清村庄。"猎鹰"通话完毕。

Container.name: 35_No_Hope
Container.situation: medic reports the point man's death to miller

Key.Original: Falcon, come in. This is Alpha-4. Jackson's hit.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，接進。這裡是"Alpha-4"。傑克遜中彈了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，请回答。这里是 Alpha-4"。杰克逊中弹了。

Key.Original: Requesting support at our position, over!
Key.Chinese: 請求支援到我們的位置，完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: 请求支援到我们的位置，完毕！

Key.Original: Negative, Alpha-4. Delta is unavailable. We're stretched thin here. Falcon out.
Key.Chinese: 否定，"Alpha-4"。Delta目前無法支援。我們這裡已經捉襟見肘了。"獵鷹"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不行，Alpha-4"。Delta 目前无法支援。我们这里已经捉襟见肘了。"猎鹰"通话完毕。

Container.name: 30_Concentrate_Fire
Container.situation: player's co tells his team where to fire

Key.Original: Concentrate your fire down the valley!
Key.Chinese: 把你們的火力對準山谷!
Key.Chinesesimp: 集中火力到山谷里！

Container.name: 25_Report_Casualties
Container.situation: player's co reports the casualties to miller

Key.Original: Falcon, this is Alpha. We've taken casualties. Standby for update.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，這裡是Alpha。我們有傷員了。請等待進一步回報。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，这里是 Alpha。我们有减员了。请等待进一步回报。

Container.name: 20_Point_Man_Dead
Container.situation: player's team finds the point man

Key.Original: Dammit, Jackson's down!
Key.Chinese: 該死，傑克遜倒下了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死，杰克逊中弹了！

Key.Original: Doc, check on him! The rest of you, covering fire!
Key.Chinese: 醫護兵，去檢查他!其餘人，掩護射擊!
Key.Chinesesimp: 卫生兵，去检查他！其余人，掩护射击！

Container.name: 17_Point_Man_Divert
Container.situation: co diverts to his last know position

Key.Original: Change of plan - I can't raise Jackson.
Key.Chinese: 計劃改變-我無法聯繫上Jackson。
Key.Chinesesimp: 计划改变—我无法联系上杰克逊。

Key.Original: We'll divert to his last known position. Get set for contact, gentlemen.
Key.Chinese: 我們將改道到他最後的已知位置。準備接敵，先生們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们将改道到他最后的已知位置。准备接敌，先生们。

Container.name: 15_Point_Man_Hit
Container.participants: EPA B Point Man;EPA B Alpha Lead;
Container.situation: point man takes one

Key.Original: Jackson, did you copy my last? Fall back and regroup. Over
Key.Chinese: 傑克遜，你有聽到我最後一句話嗎?返回與我們會合。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 杰克逊，你有听到我最后一句话吗？返回与我们会合。完毕。

Key.Original: Private Jackson, respond! Over.
Key.Chinese: 列兵傑克遜，回覆!完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 杰克逊列兵，回复！完毕。

Container.name: 125_Faster_Bravo
Container.situation: bravo tells everyone to keep moving

Key.Original: Keep moving! He's not done yet!
Key.Chinese: 繼續移動!它還沒有完!
Key.Chinesesimp: 继续移动！它还没完呢！

Container.name: 120_Bombs
Container.situation: player survives the bombing run

Key.Original: Holy shit...
Key.Chinese: 我的天啊...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的天啊...

Container.name: 115_Take_Cover
Container.situation: bravo orders everyone to take cover

Key.Original: Take cover!
Key.Chinese: 找掩護!
Key.Chinesesimp: 找掩护！

Container.name: 110_RTB
Container.participants: EPA B Bravo Lead;EPA B Miller;
Container.situation: bravo reports the plane, ordered to retreat

Key.Original: Bravo to Falcon, we just got buzzed out here!
Key.Chinese: Bravo呼叫"獵鷹"，我們這裡剛被戰鬥機衝場!
Key.Chinesesimp: Bravo 呼叫"猎鹰"，我们这里刚有战斗机通场！

Key.Original: You heard him, guys! Get the fuck out before he comes back!
Key.Chinese: 你們聽到了，大夥!在它回來之前我們趕快離開!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们听到了，大伙！在它回来之前赶快离开！

Key.Original: Copy, Bravo, we saw him! Get out of there!
Key.Chinese: 收到，Bravo，我們看到它了!趕快離開那裡!
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，Bravo，我们看到它了！赶快离开那里！

Container.name: 10_Lets_Go
Container.situation: co provides the sitrep

Key.Original: Okay, Jackson reports contacts in the valley.
Key.Chinese: 好的，傑克遜回報有敵軍在村莊裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，杰克逊报告说有敌军在村庄里。

Key.Original: Keep your eyes open, gentlemen.
Key.Chinese: 保持警戒，先生們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 保持警戒，先生们。

Container.name: 105_Plane
Container.situation: bravo sees the enemy plane

Key.Original: Shit, Fast-mover!
Key.Chinese: 該死，有戰鬥機!
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死，有战斗机！

Container.name: 100_Spotters_Dead
Container.situation: player reports the spotters being killed

Key.Original: Sir, spotters neutralized!
Key.Chinese: 長官，觀測手已殲滅!
Key.Chinesesimp: 长官，观察员已歼灭！

Container.name: 07_Report2
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Lead;EPA B Miller;
Container.situation: stay on mission, n00b

Key.Original: Alpha to Falcon, be advised, contacts spotted near the village. Do we engage? Over.
Key.Chinese: Alpha呼叫"獵鷹"，請注意，偵察回報有敵軍在村莊附近。是否接戰?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Alpha 呼叫"猎鹰"，请注意，侦察报告有敌军在村庄附近。是否接战？完毕。

Key.Original: Negative, Alpha, seize the high ground. Stay on mission. Out.
Key.Chinese: 否定，Alpha，佔領高處。專心在任務上。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不行，Alpha，占领高处。专心执行任务。通话完毕。

Container.name: 05_Report
Container.participants: EPA B Point Man;EPA B Alpha Lead;
Container.situation: the point man reports contacts

Key.Original: Acknowledged, Private, appreciate the heads up.
Key.Chinese: 了解，列兵，感謝提醒。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，列兵，感谢提醒。

Key.Original: We're just east of your position, en route to the staging point. Fall back and link up with us. Out.
Key.Chinese: 我們位置就在你的東邊，正在前往進入點的路上。回來跟我們會合吧。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的位置就在你的东边，正在前往进入点的路上。回来跟我们会合吧。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Sir, update, we've got enemy movement in the valley. At least one Greenback fireteam.
Key.Chinese: 長官，狀況更新，村莊裡有敵軍的動靜。至少有一個綠軍的火力伍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 长官，状况更新，村庄里有敌军的动静。至少有一个绿军的火力组。

Key.Original: Looks like they're outflanking Bravo's position in the village, over.
Key.Chinese: 看來他們打算包抄Bravo在村莊裡的位置，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看来他们打算包抄 Bravo 在村庄里的位置，完毕。

Container.name: 01_Start
Container.participants: EPA B Player;EPA B Alpha Lead;
Container.situation: alpha lead explains that they're tacticool

Key.Original: Double-time, gentlemen - back into the forest.
Key.Chinese: 加快腳步，先生們-返回到森林裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 加快脚步，先生们—返回到森林里。

Key.Original: We'll track along the ridgeline and take up a position above the village.
Key.Chinese: 我們將沿著山脊線移動，並尋找制高點來觀察村莊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们将沿着山脊线移动，并寻找制高点来观察村庄。

Key.Original: RESUPPLY
Key.Chinese: 重新補給
Key.Chinesesimp: 重新补给

Key.Original: Resupply
Key.Chinese: 獲取補給物資
Key.Chinesesimp: 获取补给物资

Container.name: x_00_Casualties
Container.participants: EPA B Player;EPA B Alpha Lead;
Container.situation: kerry reports that team members are dying fast

Key.Original: Focus, Kerry! Return fire!
Key.Chinese: 專注，克里!開火射回去!
Key.Chinesesimp: 专注，克里！开火还击！

Key.Original: We're dropping like flies here, sir!
Key.Chinese: 我們死的比蒼蠅還快，長官!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们死的比苍蝇还快，长官！

Container.name: i_05_ClearHousesHelp
Container.situation: the team leader explains how player should clear the houses

Key.Original: Toss some frags into the buildings, Kerry!
Key.Chinese: 丟一些手榴彈進去房屋裡，克里!
Key.Chinesesimp: 丢一些手榴弹进去房屋里，克里！

Key.Original: Just make sure you're clear of the blast radius - and don't go rushing in before they've gone off!
Key.Chinese: 只要你確定爆炸半徑並不會傷到你-還有就是不要在爆炸之前就衝進房屋裡!
Key.Chinesesimp: 只要你确定爆炸半径并不会伤到你—还有就是不要在爆炸之前就冲进房屋里！

Container.name: i_00_Flank
Container.situation: the team leader explains how player should flank and act

Key.Original: Listen up, Kerry: the others will move from the right.
Key.Chinese: 聽好了，克里:其餘人會從右邊過去。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听好了，克里：其余人会从右边过去。

Key.Original: Watch for the crossfire. We can't afford any friendly fire bullshit.
Key.Chinese: 小心交火。我們無法容忍任何一件友軍誤擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 小心交叉火力。我们承受不起友军误击。

Container.name: 95_AgiosCephasResponse
Container.situation: team leader reports to miller that agios cephas is clear, but no response

Key.Original: Alpha, we're under heavy bombardment.
Key.Chinese: Alpha，我們正遭受到重型轟炸。
Key.Chinesesimp: Alpha，我们正遭受到重火力轰炸。

Key.Original: All teams, do not return! I say again, do not return!
Key.Chinese: 所有小隊，不要回來!我重複一遍，不要回來!
Key.Chinesesimp: 各组注意，不要回来！我重复一遍，不要回来！

Key.Original: Find shelter. Keep your heads down. Wait until you hear from me! How copy?!
Key.Chinese: 尋找藏身處。保持低調。等待我再度呼叫你們!有收到嗎?!
Key.Chinesesimp: 寻找藏身处。保持低调。等我再呼叫你们！有收到吗？！

Container.name: 90_AgiosCephas
Container.situation: team leader reports to miller that agios cephas is clear, but no response

Key.Original: Alright, looks like we're clear.
Key.Chinese: 好的，看來我們已經肅清了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，看来我们已经肃清了。

Key.Original: Falcon, objective complete. Orders?
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，目標完成。命令?
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，目标完成。命令？

Key.Original: Falcon? Do you read? Over.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"?是否聽到?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"？是否听到？完毕。

Container.name: 85_Houses
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Lead;EPA B Player;
Container.situation: team leader orders the player to clear the houses

Key.Original: Kerry, sweep and clear the buildings.
Key.Chinese: 克里，掃蕩並肅清房屋。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，扫荡并肃清房屋。

Key.Original: On it.
Key.Chinese: 在做了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在做了。

Container.name: 80_LzConnorGroup
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Lead;EPA B Player;
Container.situation: team leader reports to group to keep going

Key.Original: Alright, you heard it. Let's take it to them!
Key.Chinese: 好的，你們都聽到了。讓我們幹掉他們!
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，你们都听到了。让我们干掉他们！

Key.Original: Negative, Corporal. Miller wants us to make a stand.
Key.Chinese: 不，下士。米勒希望我們去宣示主權。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不，下士。米勒希望我们去宣示主权。

Key.Original: Let's go!
Key.Chinese: 我們走!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们走！

Key.Original: Wait, we're not falling back to Maxwell, sir?
Key.Chinese: 等等，我們不是要返回麥克斯韋嗎，長官?
Key.Chinesesimp: 等等，我们不是要撤回麦克斯韦吗，长官？

Container.name: 75_LzConnorPapabear
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Lead;EPA B Miller;
Container.situation: team leader reports to miller that lz connor is secure

Key.Original: Miller, Connor's secure but we're too late. They've butchered the resistance. Over.
Key.Chinese: 米勒，康納已經肅清，但我們還是太晚了。他們已經屠殺了反抗軍。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 米勒，康纳已经肃清，但我们还是太晚了。他们已经屠杀了反抗军。完毕。

Key.Original: Hard to say who destroyed them, but they're sure as hell gone now. Over.
Key.Chinese: 很難說是誰毀了它們，但現在它們確實都已經毀了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 很难说是谁毁了它们，但现在它们确实都已经毁了。完毕。

Key.Original: Understood. With pleasure. Out.
Key.Chinese: 了解。我們的榮幸。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。我们的荣幸。通话完毕。

Key.Original: What's the status of the supplies, Alpha?
Key.Chinese: 那補給物資的狀況如何，Alpha?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那补给物资的状况如何，Alpha？

Key.Original: Goddammit! Alright, strike hard, Alpha. Make a point. Clear the area.
Key.Chinese: 天殺的!好吧，嚴厲打擊他們，Alpha。宣示主權。肅清該區。
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的！好吧，狠狠地打，Alpha。宣示主权。肃清该区。

Container.name: 70_LzConnorCasualties
Container.situation: team leader mentions all the dead bodies

Key.Original: Christ, they're all fucking dead!
Key.Chinese: 天哪，他們都已經死的不能再死了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 天哪，他们都死光了！

Container.name: 65_AgiosIoannisClear
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Lead;EPA B Miller;
Container.situation: team leader reports to miller that agios ioannis is secure

Key.Original: Falcon, Ioannis is secure. Over.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，約安尼斯已肅清。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，约安尼斯已肃清。完毕。

Key.Original: On the way. Out
Key.Chinese: 在路上了。通話完畢
Key.Chinesesimp: 在路上了。通话完毕

Key.Original: Good job. Proceed to LZ Connor, ASAP.
Key.Chinese: 幹的好。繼續前往康納著陸區，盡快。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的好。继续前往康纳着陆区，尽快。

Container.name: 60_MedicSaysContactIsDead
Container.participants: EPA B Medic;EPA B Alpha Lead;
Container.situation: medic says nikos friend is dead

Key.Original: Figures. Okay, let's keep moving.
Key.Chinese: 知道了。好的，我們繼續移動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 知道了。好的，我们继续移动。

Key.Original: No pulse. He's not breathing.
Key.Chinese: 沒有脈搏。他沒有在呼吸。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有脉搏。他没在呼吸。

Container.name: 55_MedicHelpContact
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Lead;EPA B Medic;
Container.situation: team leader orders medic to check nikos friend

Key.Original: Shit. I don't see Nikos.
Key.Chinese: 該死。我沒有看到Nikos。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。我没看到尼科斯。

Key.Original: Doc, check his driver.
Key.Chinese: 醫生，去檢查他的駕駛。
Key.Chinesesimp: 医生，去检查他的驾驶员。

Key.Original: On it.
Key.Chinese: 在做了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在做了。

Container.name: 50_Flanking
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Lead;EPA B Player;
Container.situation: team is moving to help at the lz connor

Key.Original: Kerry, Doc, on me. We're flanking left.
Key.Chinese: 克里，醫生，跟著我。我們向左側攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，医生，跟着我。我们从左侧攻击。

Key.Original: The rest of you, flank right! Regroup when it's clear. Understood?
Key.Chinese: 其餘的人，向右側攻擊!肅清之後再重新集合。了解嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 其余的人，向右侧攻击！肃清之后再重新集合。了解吗？

Key.Original: Copy.
Key.Chinese: 收到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。

Container.name: 45_Objectives
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Lead;EPA B Miller;
Container.situation: miller relays objectives to team

Key.Original: We'll do our best, Falcon. Out.
Key.Chinese: 我們會盡我們最大的努力，"獵鷹"。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们会尽我们最大的努力，"猎鹰"。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Alpha, Connor's gone dark. Sounds like the AAF's moved in.
Key.Chinese: Alpha，康納沒有通訊了。聽起來像是阿爾蒂斯武裝力量攻擊了他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: Alpha，康纳没有通信了。听起来像是 AAF 攻击了他们。

Key.Original: They've probably hit the abandoned towns nearby, too.
Key.Chinese: 他們可能也攻擊了旁邊的廢棄城鎮。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们可能也攻击了旁边的废弃城镇。

Key.Original: Kick those arseholes out of there. Secure those supplies. Over.
Key.Chinese: 把那些混蛋踢出那裡。並確保那些補給物資。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 把那些混蛋踢出那里。并确保那些补给物资。完毕。

Container.name: 42_HowDidTheyFindOut
Container.participants: EPA B Player;EPA B Alpha Lead;
Container.situation: team is moving to help at the lz connor and kerry questions how did aff found out about the weapons

Key.Original: I don't know, Kerry. Just keep moving.
Key.Chinese: 我不知道，克里。繼續移動就是了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不知道，克里。继续移动就是了。

Key.Original: How the hell did they find out about the weapons?
Key.Chinese: 他們到底是怎樣發現武器的?
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们到底是怎样发现武器的？

Container.name: 40_MovingToHelp
Container.situation: team is moving to help at the lz connor

Key.Original: Let's move!
Key.Chinese: 我們走!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们走！

Container.name: 35_ConnorUnderAttackPapabear
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Lead;EPA B Miller;
Container.situation: team leader reports lz connor under attack to miller

Key.Original: Falcon, this is Alpha, do you copy?!
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，這裡是Alpha，是否收到?!
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，这里是 Alpha，是否收到？！

Key.Original: It's Connor! Something blew the fuck up!
Key.Chinese: 是康納!有東西把那邊給炸了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 是康纳！那地方被炸得好惨！

Key.Original: Way ahead of you! We're on it!
Key.Chinese: 已經在做了!我們在路上了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 已经在做了！我们在路上了！

Key.Original: Alpha, what the fuck was that?!
Key.Chinese: Alpha，那裡發生了啥事情?!
Key.Chinesesimp: Alpha，那他妈怎么回事？！

Key.Original: Dammit, Alpha, get moving! We need those supplies!
Key.Chinese: 該死，Alpha，快點移動!我們需要那些補給物資!
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死，Alpha，快点移动！我们需要那些补给物资！

Container.name: 30_NikosBoardingVehicle
Container.situation: nikos orders his driver to board the vehicle and rush to lz connor

Key.Original: Shit. We need to go. Now. Move.
Key.Chinese: 該死。我們該走了。現在。移動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。我们该走了。现在。移动。

Container.name: 25_ConnorUnderAttackGroup
Container.situation: player group reacts to lz connor being under attack

Key.Original: What the hell?
Key.Chinese: 搞什麼鬼?
Key.Chinesesimp: 搞什么鬼？

Key.Original: Holy shit! That's Connor!
Key.Chinese: 天殺的!那裡是康納!
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的！那里是康纳！

Container.name: 15_NearContact
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Lead;EPA I Nikos;
Container.situation: group arrives at contact position and start talking with him

Key.Original: Nikos?
Key.Chinese: 尼科斯?
Key.Chinesesimp: 尼科斯？

Key.Original: Took you long enough. We were just about to leave.
Key.Chinese: 你們讓我們等夠久的。我們才正打算要離開這裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们让我们等够久的。我们正打算要离开这里。

Container.name: 10_OnTheWayToMeeting
Container.participants: EPA B Player;EPA B Alpha Lead;
Container.situation: small chat between player and team leader about who is the contact they're meeting

Key.Original: Miller says he's a resistance contact of his - tied with a bigger cell on Altis.
Key.Chinese: 米勒說他是一個反抗軍，隸屬在阿爾蒂斯總部旗下的一個部門。
Key.Chinesesimp: 米勒说他是一名反抗军，和在阿尔蒂斯岛上更大规模的分支有关。

Key.Original: Yeah, I get the impression that it's somehow linked to his team being here, originally.
Key.Chinese: 是啊，我得到的印象是，他原本會出現在這裡，是因為要跟他的小隊碰面。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊，我的理解是这和他的小组有关。

Key.Original: Who's this Nikos guy, again?
Key.Chinese: 請再說一次，這個叫尼科斯的傢伙是誰?
Key.Chinesesimp: 请再说一次，这个叫尼科斯的家伙是谁？

Key.Original: The whole thing looks pretty fucking shady, to be honest.
Key.Chinese: 說實在，這整件事情看起來有著很大的黑幕在裡面。
Key.Chinesesimp: 说实话，整件事情底下可能有很大的黑幕。

Key.Original: Altis?
Key.Chinese: 阿爾蒂斯?
Key.Chinesesimp: 阿尔蒂斯？

Key.Original: Fuck knows, Corporal. Delta and Charlie moved north. Coordinating the recon, I guess.
Key.Chinese: 天知道，下士。Delta與Charlie前往了北方。我猜可能是去做偵察。
Key.Chinesesimp: 天知道，下士。Delta 与 Charlie 去了北方。我猜可能是去做侦察。

Key.Original: But he's right: we do need the supplies if we want to keep on kicking Greenback ass.
Key.Chinese: 但他是對的:假使我們想要繼續踹綠軍的屁股，我們的確需要補給物資。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但他是对的：假使我们想要继续收拾绿军，就的确需要补给物资。

Key.Original: So - with respect, sir - where's Miller now?
Key.Chinese: 所以-恕我直言，長官-米勒現在在哪裡?
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以—恕我直言，长官—米勒现在在哪里？

Key.Original: Now, stay sharp. Keep moving. We don't have all night.
Key.Chinese: 現在，先把注意力保持在當前的任務上。繼續移動。我們並沒有一整晚的時間。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在，先把注意力保持在当前的任务上。继续移动。我们并没有一整晚的时间。

Key.Original: Understood.
Key.Chinese: 知道了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 知道了。

Container.name: 105_VisualOnMaxwell
Container.participants: EPA B Player;EPA B Alpha Lead;
Container.situation: the team has visual on under attack camp maxwell

Key.Original: I don't know yet, Kerry! Just keep moving!
Key.Chinese: 我還不知道，克里!移動就是了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我还不知道，克里！移动就是了！

Key.Original: Jesus, sir, what's the plan?!
Key.Chinese: 天殺的，長官，你的計劃是?!
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的，长官，你的计划是？！

Container.name: 100_Maxwell
Container.situation: returning to maxwell, while it is under attack

Key.Original: Copy that, but, with respect, Miller, fuck that!
Key.Chinese: 收到，但，原諒我們，米勒，我們恕難從命!
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，但是恕我直言，米勒，去你大爷的！

Key.Original: We're on our way back! Out!
Key.Chinese: 我們在回來的路上了!通話完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们在回来的路上了！通话完毕！

Container.name: 05_NearGroup
Container.situation: leader gives a quick sitrep to player

Key.Original: Kerry! Over here!
Key.Chinese: 克里!在這裡!
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里！这边！

Key.Original: Take the pack. There's a spare set of NVGs in it, too.
Key.Chinese: 撿起這個背包。裡面有一套夜視鏡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 捡起这个背包。里面有一套夜视仪。

Key.Original: Alright, everybody set? Let's go meet Miller's contact.
Key.Chinese: 好，大家都好了嗎?讓我們去見米勒的線人吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好，大家都好了吗？让我们去见米勒的线人吧。

Container.name: 00_Sitrep
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Lead;EPA B Player;
Container.situation: player reports eta to leader

Key.Original: Kerry, what's your ETA? Over.
Key.Chinese: 克里，你多久後抵達?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，你多久后能抵达？完毕。

Key.Original: Alright. Just get a move on.
Key.Chinese: 好的。趕快來就是了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的。赶快来就是了。

Key.Original: Less than a minute out, sir. Over.
Key.Chinese: 1分鐘之內，長官。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 1分钟之内，长官。完毕。

Key.Original: Resupply at %3LZ Connor%1.
Key.Chinese: 在%3康納著陸區%1獲取補給物資。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在%3康纳着陆区%1获取补给物资。

Key.Original: We've struck some fairly significant blows against the AAF. They've been weakened.%1%1We only have a small window of opportunity to exploit that fact, though, before they're reinforced. It's also become clear that we're running short on ammo and supplies. We're beginning to stretch ourselves thin.%1%1Fortunately, an opportunity has presented itself. We've managed to re-establish communication with a contact that has ties to the local guerillas. It's a small cell. Part of a larger network of resistance on the Altis mainland. They call themselves the F-I-A. 'Fee-ah'.%1%1In the wake of the AAF attack, our contact - goes by the name Nikos - set up an ammunition dump somewhere near %4LZ Connor%2. Now he's offering to, well, share it, in a manner of speaking. We've agreed to link up %5just south of here%2.%1%1Meet with him, secure some supplies, and RTB. Be on your guard and good luck.
Key.Chinese: 我們已經對阿爾蒂斯武裝力量做出了一些重大的打擊。他們現在已被削弱。%1%1趁他們重新整備好之前，我們有一個機會可以好好利用。相信大家也很清楚，我們的彈藥與物資快要用完了。我們已經捉襟見肘了。%1%1幸運的是，一個機會向我們展開了雙臂。我們已經重新與當地的游擊隊搭上線。他們是個分部。屬於阿爾蒂斯主島上反抗軍的一部分。他們稱呼自己為自由獨立同盟F-I-A。'Fee-ah'。%1%1在阿爾蒂斯武裝力量發動攻擊之後，我們的線人-其名稱為'尼科斯'-設置了一處彈藥庫在%4康納著陸區%2附近。他通過對話說要提供，這個，分享他的資源。我們已經同意與他在%5南方的位置%2碰頭。%1%1跟他碰面，確保物資，然後返回基地。保持警戒，祝好運。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们已经给予 AAF 一系列重大打击。他们现在已被削弱。%1%1趁他们重新整备好之前，我们有一个机会可以好好利用。相信大家也很清楚，我们的弹药与物资快要用完了。我们已经捉襟见肘了。%1%1幸运的是，一个机会向我们展开了双臂。我们已经重新与当地的游击队搭上线。他们是阿尔蒂斯主岛上反抗军一个分部的下属。他们称呼自己为 FIAF-I-A。'Fee-ah'。%1%1在 AAF 发动攻击之后，我们的线人—其名为'尼科斯'-在%4康纳着陆区%2附近设置了存储了一些弹药。现在他决定要，这么讲，分享他的资源。我们已经同意与他在%5南方的位置%2碰头。%1%1跟他碰面，确保物资，然后返回基地。保持警戒，祝好运。

Key.Original: REGROUP
Key.Chinese: 會合
Key.Chinesesimp: 会合

Key.Original: Regroup
Key.Chinese: 會合
Key.Chinesesimp: 会合

Key.Original: Regroup with the rest of %3Alpha%1, who are waiting just outside %2Camp Maxwell%1.
Key.Chinese: 與剩下的%3Alpha%1隊員會合，他們正在%2麥克斯韋營地%1的外邊等你。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与剩下的%3Alpha%1队员会合，他们正在%2麦克斯韦营地%1的外边等你。

Key.Original: Crossing Paths
Key.Chinese: 交叉路
Key.Chinesesimp: 交叉路口

Key.Original: Link up with %5Nikos%2, secure the supplies located near %6LZ Connor%2, and return to %3Camp Maxwell%2.
Key.Chinese: 與%5尼科斯%2會合，並確保%6康納著陸區%2附近的補給物資，然後返回%3麥克斯韋營地%2。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与%5尼科斯%2会合，并确保%6康纳着陆区%2附近的补给物资，然后返回%3麦克斯韦营地%2。

Key.Original: MEET
Key.Chinese: 碰面
Key.Chinesesimp: 碰面

Key.Original: Meeting
Key.Chinese: 碰面
Key.Chinesesimp: 碰面

Key.Original: Meet up with Miller's contact, %2Nikos%1, to the south of %3Camp Maxwell%1.
Key.Chinese: 與米勒的線人%2尼科斯%1在%3麥克斯韋營地%1的南方碰面。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与米勒的线人%2尼科斯%1在%3麦克斯韦营地%1以南碰面。

Key.Original: RETURN
Key.Chinese: 返回
Key.Chinesesimp: 返回

Key.Original: Return to Camp Maxwell
Key.Chinese: 返回麥克斯韋營地
Key.Chinesesimp: 返回麦克斯韦营地

Key.Original: Return with the supplies to %3Camp Maxwell%1.
Key.Chinese: 帶著補給物資返回%3麥克斯韋營地%1。
Key.Chinesesimp: 带着补给物资返回%3麦克斯韦营地%1。

Key.Original: SECURE
Key.Chinese: 肅清
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清

Key.Original: Secure LZ Connor
Key.Chinese: 肅清康納著陸區
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清康纳着陆区

Key.Original: Secure %2LZ Connor%1.
Key.Chinese: 肅清%2康納著陸區%1。
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清%2康纳着陆区%1。

Key.Original: CLEAR
Key.Chinese: 肅清
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清

Key.Original: Clear houses
Key.Chinese: 肅清房屋
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清房屋

Key.Original: Sweep and clear the %2buildings%1 inside %3Agios Cephas%1.
Key.Chinese: 肅清在%3聖海法斯%1村莊裡的%2房屋%1。
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清%3圣海法斯%1村里的%2房屋%1。

Key.Original:
1. Rendezvous with %5Nikos%2.
2. Continue to %6LZ Connor%2.
3. Secure the promised supplies.
4. Deliver the supplies to %3Camp Maxwell%2.
Key.Chinese:
1. 與%5尼科斯s%2碰面。
2.前進到%6康納著陸區%2.
3. 確保他們答應要給我們的補給物資。
4. 運送補給物資回%3麥克斯韋營地%2。
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 与%5尼科斯%2碰面。
2.前进到%6康纳着陆区%2.
3. 确保他们答应要给我们的补给物资。
4. 运送补给物资回%3麦克斯韦营地%2。

Key.Original: Despite your intervention, LZ Connor was overrun. The supplies were destroyed and you suffered heavy casualties. Worse still, an unexpected attack has left Camp Maxwell decimated. It looks like we're fast out of options.
Key.Chinese: 儘管你有試著挽救，康納著陸區的補給品還是被摧毀了，而且你也付出了慘痛的代價。更糟的是，一場意想不到的攻擊就這麼重創了麥克斯韋營地。看來我們的時日已所剩不多了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管有你的介入，康纳着陆区还是被敌军攻陷了，补给都被摧毁且你也付出惨痛伤亡。更糟的是，一场意想不到的攻击重创了麦克斯韦营地。看来我们的时日已所剩不多了。

Key.Original: Despite your intervention, LZ Connor was overrun and the supplies were destroyed. Worse still, an unexpected attack has left Camp Maxwell decimated. It looks like we're fast out of options.
Key.Chinese: 儘管你有試著挽救，康納著陸區的補給品還是被摧毀了。更糟的是，一場意想不到的攻擊就這麼重創了麥克斯韋營地。看來我們的時日已所剩不多了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管有你的介入，康纳着陆区还是被敌军攻陷了，补给都被摧毁。更糟的是，一场意想不到的攻击重创了麦克斯韦营地。看来我们的时日已所剩不多了。

Key.Original: Your team left without you!
Key.Chinese: 你的小隊丟下你離開了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的小组丢下你离开了！

Key.Original: %4Alpha%2 - Your squad.%1%5Nikos%2 - Miller's contact in the FIA.%1%3Falcon%2 - Camp Maxwell HQ.%1%3Bravo%2 - Camp Maxwell defence.%1%6Charlie%2 - North-east sector recon.%1%7Delta%2 - North-west sector recon.
Key.Chinese: %4Alpha%2-你的小隊。%1%5尼科斯%2-米勒在自由獨立同盟裡的線人。%1%3"獵鷹"%2-麥克斯韋營地指揮部。%1%3Bravo%2-防禦麥克斯韋營地。%1%6Charlie%2-在東北方進行偵察。%1%7Delta%2-在西北方進行偵察。
Key.Chinesesimp: %4Alpha%2-你的班。%1%5尼科斯%2-米勒在 FIA 里的线人。%1%3"猎鹰"%2-麦克斯韦营地指挥部。%1%3Bravo%2-防御麦克斯韦营地。%1%6Charlie%2-在东北方进行侦察。%1%7Delta%2-在西北方进行侦察。

Key.Original: TAKE
Key.Chinese: 撿起
Key.Chinesesimp: 捡起

Key.Original: Take the backpack
Key.Chinese: 撿起背包
Key.Chinesesimp: 捡起背包

Key.Original: Take the backpack and equip your night vision goggles.
Key.Chinese: 撿起背包並裝備上夜視鏡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 捡起背包并装备上夜视仪。

Key.Original: SECURE
Key.Chinese: 肅清
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清

Key.Original: Secure Agios Ioannis
Key.Chinese: 肅清聖約安尼斯
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清圣约安尼斯

Key.Original: Secure the village of %2Agios Ioannis%1.
Key.Chinese: 肅清%2聖約安尼斯%1村莊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清%2圣约安尼斯%1村。

Key.Original: SECURE
Key.Chinese: 肅清
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清

Key.Original: Secure Agios Cephas
Key.Chinese: 肅清聖海法斯
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清圣海法斯

Key.Original: Secure the village of %2Agios Cephas%1.
Key.Chinese: 肅清%2聖海法斯%1村莊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清%2圣海法斯%1村。

Key.Original: Flanking
Key.Chinese: 側面攻擊
Key.Chinesesimp: 侧翼包抄

Key.Original: Clear Houses
Key.Chinese: 肅清房屋
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清房屋

Key.Original: Meet FIA soldiers and resupply at their depot.
Key.Chinese: 與自由獨立同盟的士兵碰面，並在他們的倉庫獲得補給資源。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与 FIA 士兵碰面，并在他们的储藏库获得补给资源。

Key.Original: Tensions grow as NATO peacekeepers prepare to leave the island of Stratis.
Key.Chinese: 緊張的局勢隨著北約的維和部隊準備離開斯特拉蒂斯島而升溫。
Key.Chinesesimp: 局势随着北约维和部队准备离开斯特拉蒂斯岛而日趋紧张。

Key.Original: Drawdown 2035
Point Zulu
Key.Chinese: 'Zulu'點
Key.Chinesesimp: 'Zulu'点

Key.Original: Point X-ray
Key.Chinese: 'X-Ray'點
Key.Chinesesimp: 'X-ray'点

Key.Original: First Aid Kit
Key.Chinese: 急救箱
Key.Chinesesimp: 急救包

Container.name: x10_MoveOn
Container.situation: player taking his sweet time at the checkpoint

Key.Original: When the angry looking gentleman with the gun tells you to drive on, Kerry, you drive on. Get a move on.
Key.Chinese: 當有一位憤怒的紳士拿著槍並叫你駛離，克里，你就得駛離。趕快開走。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当有位愤怒的先生拿着枪叫你继续开，克里，你就得继续开。赶快开走。

Container.name: x05_SlowItDown
Container.situation: player driving the truck a bit too fast

Key.Original: Ease up a bit on the gas, Kerry.
Key.Chinese: 不要太衝動，克里。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不要太冲动，克里。

Key.Original: This thing stops like an oil tanker.
Key.Chinese: 這東西煞起車來就像是一臺油輪。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这东西刹起车来就像是一艘油轮。

Container.name: x01_Offroading
Container.situation: player takes a crazy route out of rogain

Key.Original: Fuck, Kerry, what are you doing?!
Key.Chinese: 幹，克里，你在做什麼?!
Key.Chinesesimp: 操，克里，你在做什么？！

Container.name: i10_Driving
Container.situation: leader gives the player some hints on how to drive

Key.Original: Just so we're clear, Kerry, this thing isn't exactly a sports car.
Key.Chinese: 先講明白一件事，克里，這臺並不是一臺跑車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 先讲明白一件事，克里，这可不是一辆跑车。

Key.Original: It's going to be heavier; it's going to be less responsive.
Key.Chinese: 這臺重量比較重，所以他的反應時間也需要比較長。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这辆车要重一些，所以它的反应时间也需要比较长。

Key.Original: Please don't flip us, and definitely don't run some poor SOB over. I, for one, am not interested in that paperwork.
Key.Chinese: 請不要把我們弄翻了，也不要做一些太超過的事情。我個人是不喜歡那些文書工作的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请不要把我们弄翻了，也千万别碾了哪个倒霉鬼。我个人是不喜欢那些文书工作的。

Container.name: i05_Fatigue
Container.situation: leader tells player to catch his breath

Key.Original: Jesus fucking Christ, Kerry, you won't hit shit if you're fucking wheezing like that, ok?
Key.Chinese: 我的天哪，克里，不要把你自己搞得氣喘如牛，好嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的天哪，克里，你要喘成这样你是谁也打不中的，懂吗？

Key.Original: Focus. Take a breather if you need it. Slow is smooth and smooth is fast.
Key.Chinese: 專注。假如有需要的話，深吸一口氣。穩下來會讓你比較好射擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 专注。假如有需要的话，深吸一口气。稳下来会让你比较好射击。

Key.Original: Move carefully - cover to cover - conserve your energy.
Key.Chinese: 小心移動-使用掩體前進-節省你的體力。
Key.Chinesesimp: 小心移动—使用掩体前进—节省你的体力。

Container.name: i01_First_Aid_Kit
Container.situation: leader tells player to use his first aid kit

Key.Original: Kerry, you look like shit. Get those wounds looked at.
Key.Chinese: 克里，你看起來很糟該。看著那些傷口點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，你看起来很糟啊。看着那些伤口。

Key.Original: If you have to, patch yourself up with your first aid kit.
Key.Chinese: 假如有需要，使用急救箱來治療你自己。
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如有需要，使用急救包来治疗你自己。

Key.Original: Better now than when the bullets are flying; better yet once you're in hard cover.
Key.Chinese: 最好在遭遇槍林彈雨之前;或者在有良好的掩護之下，在進行這些動作。
Key.Chinesesimp: 最好在遭遇枪林弹雨之前;或者在有良好的掩护之下，在进行这些动作。

Container.name: 97_Tense
Container.participants: EPA B Player;EPA B Intro CO;EPA B Bravo Lead;
Container.situation: player and co acknowledge the tense situation en route to the checkpoint

Key.Original: Yes, Staff Sergeant! I'll put on my best smile, sir.
Key.Chinese: 是，上士!我會掛上我最棒的笑容，長官。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是，上士！我会挂上我最棒的笑容，长官。

Key.Original: No kidding. I better give Lacey the heads up.
Key.Chinese: 不開玩笑。我最好提醒萊西一下。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不开玩笑。我最好提醒莱西一下。

Key.Original: Jesus, the AAF seem really on edge, huh?
Key.Chinese: 天哪，阿爾蒂斯武裝力量他們看起來真的很緊張，是吧?
Key.Chinesesimp: 天哪，这些 AAF 看起来真的很紧张，是吧？

Key.Original: Sergeant Lacey, be advised, Greenbacks are really waving their dicks around today.
Key.Chinese: 中士萊西，請注意，綠軍他們今天真的在到處揮舞著他們的老二。
Key.Chinesesimp: 中士莱西，请注意，绿军他们今天真的在到处挥舞着他们的老二。

Key.Original: Be on your best behavior at the checkpoint, soldier, you got that?
Key.Chinese: 在檢查站時請多加注意你的行為，大兵，你收到了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 在检查站时请多加注意你的行为，大兵，你收到了吗？

Key.Original: You know, I don't think they even know what they're looking for, Kerry.
Key.Chinese: 你知道的，我不認為他們真的知道自己在找什麼，克里。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你知道，我不决定他们真的知道自己在找什么，克里。

Container.name: 95_Inspect
Container.participants: EPA B Checkpoint Officer;EPA B Checkpoint Inspector;
Container.situation: checkpoint officer orders a soldier to inspect the truck

Key.Original: Yes, sir.
Key.Chinese: 是，長官。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是，长官。

Key.Original: Private, check their truck.
Key.Chinese: 列兵，檢查他們的卡車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 列兵，检查他们的卡车。

Container.name: 90_Stop
Container.situation: checkpoint officer orders the player to stop

Key.Original: Halt!
Key.Chinese: 停下!
Key.Chinesesimp: 停下！

Container.name: 80_Slow_Down
Container.situation: player's co tells the player to slow down

Key.Original: There's a checkpoint up ahead.
Key.Chinese: 前頭有個檢查站。
Key.Chinesesimp: 前头有个检查站。

Key.Original: Slow it down, nice and easy.
Key.Chinese: 慢下來，別緊張。
Key.Chinesesimp: 慢下来，别紧张。

Container.name: 76_Turn
Container.participants: EPA B Intro CO;EPA B Player;
Container.situation: player's co tells the player where to drive

Key.Original: Take a left at the T-junction.
Key.Chinese: 在T字路口左轉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在T字路口左转。

Key.Original: And, Kerry, do try not to make roadkill of the local wildlife.
Key.Chinese: 還有，克里，盡量不要撞上當地的野生動物。
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有，克里，尽量不要撞上当地的野生动物。

Key.Original: The AAF already hate our guts - we need to at least keep the goat population on side, you copy that, soldier?
Key.Chinese: 阿爾蒂斯武裝力量已經對我們恨之入骨了-我們至少必須確保他們的山羊沒有傷亡，你了解嗎，大兵?
Key.Chinesesimp: AAF 已经对我们恨之入骨了—我们至少得争取"羊心"，懂吗，大兵？

Key.Original: Minimize collateral damage, sir. Hearts and minds, sir.
Key.Chinese: 最大限度的減少附加傷亡，長官。了然於心，長官。
Key.Chinesesimp: 最小化连带损伤，长官。了然于心，长官。

Container.name: 75_Road
Container.situation: player's co tells the player where to drive

Key.Original: Alright, take the dirt road out of the camp.
Key.Chinese: 好吧，走這條泥路來出營地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，走这条泥路离开营地。

Key.Original: Sergeant Lacey, grab the second truck. We're headed down to Kamino.
Key.Chinese: 中士萊西，去開第二輛卡車。我們要前往卡米諾了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 莱西中士，去开第二辆卡车。我们要前往卡米诺了。

Container.name: 73_Great_Service
Container.situation: helicopter gets out of the truck's path

Key.Original: You know, Kerry, the service here sure is excellent, sometimes.
Key.Chinese: 你要知道，克里，這裡的服務是很優秀的，有時候啦。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你要知道，克里，这里的服务是很优秀的，有时候啦。

Container.name: 70_Fly_Away
Container.participants: EPA B November;EPA B Intro CO;
Container.situation: helicopter gets out of the truck's path

Key.Original: Sure, appreciated!
Key.Chinese: 當然，不勝感激!
Key.Chinesesimp: 当然，不胜感激！

Key.Original: Hold up a second there, Staff Sergeant, let us get out of your way.
Key.Chinese: 稍等一下，上士，讓我們為你清出一條路。
Key.Chinesesimp: 稍等一下，上士，让我们为你清出一条路。

Container.name: 65_Get_In
Container.participants: EPA B Intro CO;EPA B Player;
Container.situation: player's co asks what the new plan is

Key.Original: Well?
Key.Chinese: 怎樣?
Key.Chinesesimp: 怎样？

Key.Original: You sure you can handle that?
Key.Chinese: 你確定你會開嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你确定你会开吗？

Key.Original: Sounds like MacKinnon needs some heavy lifting done at Kamino. I'll drive.
Key.Chinese: 聽起來像是麥金農需要在卡米諾做一些重型拖吊。我來開車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听起来麦金农需要在卡米诺做一些重型拖吊。我来开车。

Key.Original: Fuck you, man.
Key.Chinese: 去你媽的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 去你妈的。

Container.name: 60_Understood
Container.situation: player confirms his new orders

Key.Original: Understood.
Key.Chinese: 了解。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。

Container.name: 55_Orders
Container.participants: EPA B Player;EPA B Logistics Officer;
Container.situation: player receives new orders from the logistics officer

Key.Original: Corporal Ben Kerry, reporting for duty.
Key.Chinese: 下士本·克里，向您報到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 下士本·克里向您报到。

Key.Original: Any idea why, sir?
Key.Chinese: 有任何想法為什麼會這樣嗎，長官?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你觉得为什么呢，长官？

Key.Original: At ease.
Key.Chinese: 稍息。
Key.Chinesesimp: 稍息。

Key.Original: Okay, there's been slight change of plan.
Key.Chinese: 好吧，我們的計畫有一點點改變。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，我们的计划有一点点改变。

Key.Original: Commander MacKinnon requires logistical support down at Kamino. He left just as you guys were coming in.
Key.Chinese: 指揮官麥金農要求後勤支援到卡米諾。你們到的時候他才剛離開。
Key.Chinesesimp: 指挥官麦金农在卡米诺召唤后勤支援。你们到的时候他才刚离开。

Key.Original: No, Corporal. Now, take the trucks over there. You should probably get a move on.
Key.Chinese: 沒有，下士。現在，駕駛那邊的卡車。你現在最好開始動作了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不知道，下士。现在，驾驶那边的卡车。你最好赶快去。

Container.name: 50_Report
Container.situation: the player's co orders him to go speak to the logistics officer

Key.Original: Kerry, go check in with the Lieutenant over there. He runs the show here at Rogain.
Key.Chinese: 克里，去跟那邊的中尉報到。他是羅根的主管。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，去跟那边的中尉报到。他是罗根的主管。

Key.Original: Lacey - I dunno - make yourself useful for a change. I've got to piss.
Key.Chinese: 萊西-我不知道-改變一下你自己，變得有用點。我要去小便了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 莱西—我不知道—让你自己变得有用点。我去小便了。

Container.name: 40_Landing
Container.situation: the helicopter comes in for landing

Key.Original: Alright, guys, I'm going to turn us around before bringing us in.
Key.Chinese: 好吧，夥計們，在降落前我要先轉個圈。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，伙计们，在降落前我要先转个圈。

Key.Original: Try not to fall off.
Key.Chinese: 小心別掉下去了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 小心别掉下去了。

Container.name: 40_Landed
Container.situation: the helicopter lands at camp rogain

Key.Original: Thanks for flying. Please disembark in an orderly fashion.
Key.Chinese: 感謝搭乘。請依序下機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 感谢搭乘。请依序下机。

Container.name: 35_Lock_Down
Container.participants: EPA B Bravo Lead;EPA B Intro CO;
Container.situation: player sees a truck leaving camp rogain

Key.Original: I thought the roads were closed?
Key.Chinese: 我以為道路已經被封鎖了?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我以为道路已经被封锁了？

Key.Original: Why's there a truck leaving Rogain?
Key.Chinese: 那為什麼會有一輛卡車駛離羅根?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那为什么会有一辆卡车驶离罗根？

Key.Original: They are.
Key.Chinese: 的確是阿。
Key.Chinesesimp: 的确是啊。

Key.Original: Good question. No idea. Maybe something important.
Key.Chinese: 好問題。但我不知道。可能是有重要的事吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好问题。但我不知道。可能是有重要的事吧。

Container.name: 30_Baldy
Container.participants: EPA B Intro CO;EPA B Bravo Lead;
Container.situation: player observes lz baldy

Key.Original: Nice. At this rate, we might even get out of here in, oh, 20 years...
Key.Chinese: 太棒了。按照這種速度，離開這裡只要再花，喔，20年...
Key.Chinesesimp: 太棒了。按照这种速度，离开这里只要再花，喔，20年...

Key.Original: Yeah? Well they can respectfully go fuck themselves, sir.
Key.Chinese: 是嗎?那麼他們可以恭敬地去吃自己了，長官。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是吗？那么他们可以恭敬地去操自己了，长官。

Key.Original: I see LZ Baldy's packed up.
Key.Chinese: 看來巴爾迪著陸區已經收拾好了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看来巴尔迪着陆区已经收拾好了。

Key.Original: We didn't butcher half our own population and I sure as hell didn't ask to be on their pissant island.
Key.Chinese: 我們並沒有屠殺自己一半的國民，而且我也很確定地獄並沒有要求降臨在他們該死的島上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们又没屠杀自己一半的国民，而且我也特么非常确定我不是被请来到这鬼岛上的。

Key.Original: Greenbacks wouldn't take a stand for that, Lacey. They've had a stick up their ass about Baldy for weeks now.
Key.Chinese: 綠軍不會讓我們這麼做的，萊西。他們已經糾結巴爾迪的事情好幾個星期了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 绿军不会让我们这么做的，莱西。他们已经纠结巴尔迪的事几星期了。

Key.Original: Well ain't that just half the problem.
Key.Chinese: 這只不過是問題的一半。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这只不过是问题的一半。

Container.name: 25_Mike26
Container.participants: EPA B Intro CO;EPA B Bravo Lead;
Container.situation: player observes air station mike-26

Key.Original: Mike-26 sure looks quiet.
Key.Chinese: Mike-26看起來很安靜。
Key.Chinesesimp: Mike-26看起来很安静。

Key.Original: Just us lucky few left doing the monkey work, huh?
Key.Chinese: 我們只是幾個幸運的傢伙，留下來做猴子的工作，是吧?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们只是几个留下来干蠢活儿的幸运儿，是吧？

Key.Original: I'd rather be the hell off this rock, sir.
Key.Chinese: 我情願離開這滿是石頭的地獄，長官。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我倒真情愿离开这石头岛，长官。

Key.Original: Yeah. Most of the guys have shipped out already.
Key.Chinese: 恩。大多數人都已經撤走了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯。大多数人都已经撤走了。

Key.Original: You'd rather be on a boat in the Pacific, Sergeant?
Key.Chinese: 還是你寧願待在太平洋的船上，中士?
Key.Chinesesimp: 还是你宁愿待在太平洋的船上，中士？

Container.name: 230_In_Forest
Container.situation: player and co reach the forest

Key.Original: We're alive but, Jesus, for how long?
Key.Chinese: 我們至少還活著，天殺的，但能活多久?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们至少还活着，该死，但能活多久？

Container.name: 225_Near_Forest
Container.situation: player and co approach the forest

Key.Original: Come on, there's the forest!
Key.Chinese: 跟上，森林就在前面!
Key.Chinesesimp: 跟上，森林就在前面！

Container.name: 220_Find_Shelter
Container.participants: EPA B Intro CO;EPA B Player;
Container.situation: player's co comes up with a new plan

Key.Original: We need to get out of the open. Now.
Key.Chinese: 我們必須離開這片開闊地。馬上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们必须离开这片开阔地。马上。

Key.Original: Rogain's down. Kamino's fucked ... it's only bad news back where we came from.
Key.Chinese: 羅根沒了。卡米諾也完蛋了...只有這件壞消息會傳回我們老家。
Key.Chinesesimp: 罗根完了。卡米诺也完蛋了...从我们那儿就带来这么份坏消息。

Key.Original: We've got to head south - there's a forest just over the hill.
Key.Chinese: 我們必須向南移動-在山的那邊有一片森林。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们必须向南移动—在山的那边有一片森林。

Key.Original: If you've got any better ideas, feel free to share! Let's go!
Key.Chinese: 如果你有更好的點子，請跟我分享!我們走!
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你有更好的点子，请跟我分享！我们走！

Key.Original: A forest? Are you serious?
Key.Chinese: 森林?你認真的嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 森林？你认真的吗？

Container.name: 215_Now_What
Container.participants: EPA B Player;EPA B Intro CO;
Container.situation: player asks co what to do now

Key.Original: Shit, I don't know - we're out of options!
Key.Chinese: 該死，我不知道-我們沒有其他的選擇了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死，我不知道—我们没有其他的选择了！

Key.Original: Now what, sir?!
Key.Chinese: 現在怎辦，長官?!
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在怎么办，长官？！

Container.name: 210_Check_In
Container.situation: player's co tries to raise the evac helicopter

Key.Original: Echo! Do you copy? Echo!?
Key.Chinese: Echo!是否收到?Echo!?
Key.Chinesesimp: Echo！是否收到？Echo！？

Container.name: 20_Maxwell
Container.participants: EPA B Bravo Lead;EPA B Intro CO;
Container.situation: player sees helicopter at camp maxwell

Key.Original: Hey, check out Maxwell - there's a helo - didn't we finish with that place already?
Key.Chinese: 嘿，看看麥克斯韋-那邊有一架直升機-我們不是早就清光那邊了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，看看麦克斯韦—那边有一架直升机—我们不是早就清光那边了吗？

Key.Original: Guess not.
Key.Chinese: 顯然沒有。
Key.Chinesesimp: 显然没有。

Key.Original: Then again, command doesn't really seem to know or particularly care what's going on. Part of me can't really blame them.
Key.Chinese: 再說，指揮官好像也不真的知道或在意到底發生了什麼事情。一部分的我也不能責怪他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 再说，司令部好像也不真的知道或不在意到底发生了什么事情。我也不太能责怪他们。

Container.name: 205_Heli_Dead
Container.situation: the evac helicopter gets destroyed

Key.Original: Fuck!
Key.Chinese: 幹!
Key.Chinesesimp: 操！

Container.name: 200_Bomb_Inbound
Container.situation: player's co tries to warn the evac helicopter

Key.Original: Echo, fastmover vectoring on your position! Get out of there!
Key.Chinese: Echo，戰鬥機正在接近你的位置!快離開那邊!
Key.Chinesesimp: Echo，战斗机正在接近你的位置！快离开！

Container.name: 195_Bomber_Spotted
Container.situation: player's co spots the bomber

Key.Original: Shit!
Key.Chinese: 該死!
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死！

Container.name: 190_Fly_Over
Container.situation: evac helicopter gets buzzed by an enemy plane

Key.Original: Echo to all units, we just got buzzed by a fastmover. Expedite! Out.
Key.Chinese: Echo致所有單位，我們剛被戰鬥機衝場。加快腳步!通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Echo 致所有单位，我们刚被战斗机通场。请赶快！通话完毕。

Container.name: 185_Request_Evac
Container.participants: EPA B Evac Helicopter;EPA B Intro CO;
Container.situation: player's co requests a ride

Key.Original: Echo to all units in the Rogain area. We're setting up an evac point at LZ Baldy. Over.
Key.Chinese: Echo致所有在羅根附近的友軍。我們設了一個撤退點在巴爾迪著陸區。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Echo 致所有在罗根附近的友军。我们在巴尔迪着陆区附近设置了一个紧急撤离点。完毕。

Key.Original: Affirmative. We'll hold, but we can't stall forever. Over.
Key.Chinese: 收到了。我們會堅持住，但我們不可能永遠待在這邊。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到了。我们会坚持住，但我们不可能永远待在这边。完毕。

Key.Original: Echo, this Staff Sargent Adams - we're en route! It's just the two of us, part of a detachment from Rogain. We're moving out from Point X-ray now. How copy?
Key.Chinese: Echo，這裡是上士亞當斯-我們在路上了!我們只有兩個人，從羅根出來的小隊。我們正從'X-Ray'點出發。有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: Echo，这里是亚当斯上士—我们在路上了！我们只有两个人，来自从罗根出来的分队。我们正从'X-ray'点出发。有收到吗？

Key.Original: You're a Godsend, Echo! Don't worry, we'll be there! Out!
Key.Chinese: 你們一定是上帝派來的，Echo!別擔心，我們一下就到!通話完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们一定是上帝派来的，Echo！别担心，我们一下就到！通话完毕！

Container.name: 185_Evac_Spotted
Container.situation: player's co hears a helictopers

Key.Original: Wait, I hear a chopper.
Key.Chinese: 等等，我聽到了直升機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 等等，我听到了直升机声。

Container.name: 183_Evac_Confirmed
Container.situation: player's co hears a helictopers

Key.Original: It's one of ours!
Key.Chinese: 這是我們的人馬!
Key.Chinesesimp: 这是我们的人！

Container.name: 180_At_AA
Container.situation: player and co reach the aa site

Key.Original: Damn.
Key.Chinese: 該死。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。

Container.name: 175_Bad_Sign
Container.situation: player and co kill enemy forces at the aa site

Key.Original: Well, that's not exactly a good sign.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，這不是一個好兆頭。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，这不是好兆头。

Container.name: 170_Over_Camp
Container.participants: EPA B Player;EPA B Intro CO;
Container.situation: player and co spot camp rogain

Key.Original: Let's hope X-ray's had better luck. Move it.
Key.Chinese: 讓我們希望'X-Ray'點有比較好的運氣。走吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 让我们希望在'X-ray'点有比较好的运气。走吧。

Key.Original: Jesus. Rogain's taken a beating.
Key.Chinese: 天哪。羅根被打歪了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 天哪。罗根被攻击了。

Container.name: 165_AA
Container.participants: EPA B Player;EPA B Intro CO;
Container.situation: player's co decides to check the aa site instead

Key.Original: Stay focused. Point X-ray's just over the hill.
Key.Chinese: 保持專注。'X-Ray'點就在山的那邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 保持专注。'X-ray'点就在山的那边。

Key.Original: Our best bet is to RV with them and take it from there.
Key.Chinese: 我們最好的機會就是前往會合點與他們會合，然後我們再想辦法。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们最好的机会就是前往会合点与他们会合，然后我们再想办法。

Key.Original: Fuck! What do we do, sir?
Key.Chinese: 該死!我們該怎麼辦，長官?
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死！我们该怎么办，长官？

Container.name: 160_Evac
Container.participants: EPA B Logistics Officer;EPA B HQ;
Container.situation: hq orders all units to evacuate

Key.Original: That's a negative, Rogain.
Key.Chinese: 這是沒辦法的，羅根。
Key.Chinesesimp: 做不到，罗根。

Key.Original: Broadway to all NATO forces on Stratis: Code Foxtrot. Code Foxtrot.
Key.Chinese: "百老匯"致所有北約在斯特拉蒂斯上的部隊:代號Foxtrot。代號Foxtrot。
Key.Chinesesimp: "百老汇"呼叫所有北约在斯特拉蒂斯岛上的部队：代号 Foxtrot。代号 Foxtrot。

Key.Original: Rogain to Broadway! We're under heavy assault! Send backup! Over!
Key.Chinese: 羅根呼叫"百老匯"!我們正遭受猛烈的突擊!請派遣支援!完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: 罗根呼叫"百老汇"！我们正遭受猛烈的突击！请派遣支援！完毕！

Key.Original: AAF forces have overwhelmed the airfield and Air Station Mike-26. We're pulling back.
Key.Chinese: 阿爾蒂斯武裝力量部隊已經佔領了空軍基地與Mike-26基地臺。我們正在撤退。
Key.Chinesesimp: AAF 已经占领了机场和 Mike-26航空站。我们正在撤退。

Key.Original: Try to get -
Key.Chinese: 嘗試前往...
Key.Chinesesimp: 尝试前往...

Container.name: 15_Roads
Container.participants: EPA B Bravo Lead;EPA B Intro CO;
Container.situation: player asks why the roads are locked

Key.Original: What's the deal with the roads? Why the lockdown?
Key.Chinese: 這些路是怎麼回事?為什麼要封鎖?
Key.Chinesesimp: 这些路是怎么回事？为什么要封锁？

Key.Original: You'd think the Greenbacks were actually competent or something.
Key.Chinese: 你認為綠軍在我們走之後能守住這個島或者....
Key.Chinesesimp: 你难道觉得绿军真有能耐么。

Key.Original: Someone forgot to tell the AAF commander we'd be decommissioning the airbase.
Key.Chinese: 有人忘記告訴阿爾蒂斯武裝力量指揮官我們將要拆掉空軍基地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有人忘了告诉 AAF 指挥官我们将要拆掉空军基地。

Key.Original: He's throwing some kind of hissy fit over there right now. It's a mess.
Key.Chinese: 他正在那邊為這件事情大吵大鬧。這真是一團混亂。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他正在那边为这件事情大吵大闹。真是一团混乱。

Key.Original: I wouldn't go that far.
Key.Chinese: 我沒想那麼多。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我可没这意思。

Container.name: 155_Contacts
Container.situation: player's co reports the contacts

Key.Original: Rogain, we've just had a run in with Greenback forces in the forest to your south. Over.
Key.Chinese: 羅根，我們剛與綠軍在你們南方的森林中相遇。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 罗根，我们刚在你们南方的森林中遭遇一队绿军。完毕。

Key.Original: Camp Rogain, do you read? Over.
Key.Chinese: 羅根營地，你是否聽到?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 罗根营地，你是否听到？完毕。

Container.name: 150_Safer
Container.participants: EPA B Player;EPA B Intro CO;
Container.situation: player acknowledges the situation, again

Key.Original: Tell me about it! Let's just get back to Rogain.
Key.Chinese: 感謝你的提醒!我們快回羅根吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 感谢你的提醒！我们快回罗根吧。

Key.Original: What was that you said about it being safer on foot?!
Key.Chinese: 剛剛是誰說用走的會比較安全?!
Key.Chinesesimp: 刚刚是谁说用走的会比较安全？！

Container.name: 145_FUBAR
Container.participants: EPA B Player;EPA B Intro CO;
Container.situation: player acknowledges the situation

Key.Original: I don't know what the hell's going on right now.
Key.Chinese: 我不知道現在到底發生了什麼事情。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不知道现在到底发生了什么事情。

Key.Original: Just stay alert. Get set for contact.
Key.Chinese: 先保持緊戒。準備接敵。
Key.Chinesesimp: 先保持紧戒。准备接敌。

Key.Original: What the literal fuck - are you kidding me?
Key.Chinese: 剛剛那段訊息是什麼意思-不是在開玩笑吧?
Key.Chinesesimp: 刚刚那段信息是什么意思—不是在开玩笑吧？

Container.name: 140_Enemies
Container.situation: hq acknowledges that the aaf are hostile

Key.Original: Copy that, Kamino. Dispatching reinforcements. Just hold on!
Key.Chinese: 收到，卡米諾。正在調度增援。堅持住!
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，卡米诺。正在调度增援。坚持住！

Key.Original: Broadway to all NATO forces on Stratis: Green on Blue, I say again, Green on Blue.
Key.Chinese: "百老匯"致所有北約在斯特拉蒂斯上的部隊:綠對藍，我重複一遍，綠對藍。
Key.Chinesesimp: "百老汇"致所有北约在斯特拉蒂斯岛上的部队：绿对蓝，我重复一遍，绿对蓝。

Key.Original: AAF forces considered hostile. Hold your ground! Out.
Key.Chinese: 已確認阿爾蒂斯武裝力量部隊為敵人。堅守陣地!通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 已确认 AAF 为敌人。坚守阵地！通话完毕。

Container.name: 137_WTF
Container.participants: EPA B Player;EPA B Intro CO;
Container.situation: player follows co

Key.Original: Not a clue. Sounds like a goddamn invasion.
Key.Chinese: 沒有頭緒。感覺像是該死的入侵。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有头绪。感觉像是该死的入侵。

Key.Original: Just stay focused, Kerry. Eyes open.
Key.Chinese: 先保持專心，克里。眼觀四方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 先保持专心，克里。眼观四方。

Key.Original: Sir, you got any idea what's going on?
Key.Chinese: 長官，你對這些事有任何想法嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 长官，你对这些事有任何想法吗？

Key.Original: Wait, CSAT?
Key.Chinese: 等等，廣協同盟?
Key.Chinesesimp: 等等，广协？

Container.name: 135_On_Foot
Container.participants: EPA B Intro CO;EPA B Player;
Container.situation: player's co orders the player to follow him

Key.Original: Shit. Come on, Kerry! It'll be safer on foot.
Key.Chinese: 該死。來吧，克里!我們用走的會比較安全。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。来吧，克里！我们用走的会比较安全。

Key.Original: Right behind you, sir.
Key.Chinese: 在你後面，長官。
Key.Chinesesimp: 跟着呢，长官。

Container.name: 130_Planes
Container.situation: player's co spots the plane

Key.Original: What the fuck is going on?
Key.Chinese: 他媽的到底發生了什麼事情?
Key.Chinesesimp: 他妈的到底发生了什么事情？

Container.name: 128_Ambient_2
Container.participants: EPA B Xray CO;EPA B HQ;
Container.situation: ambient chatter of attack

Key.Original: Go ahead, X-ray. Over.
Key.Chinese: 請講，X-Ray。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请讲，X-ray。完毕。

Key.Original: Broadway, this Point X-Ray, message, over.
Key.Chinese: "百老匯"，這裡是'X-Ray'點，有訊息，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "百老汇"，这里是'X-ray'点，有信息，完毕。

Key.Original: We've lost contact with Kamino - I say again - lost comms with Kamino.
Key.Chinese: 我們剛與卡米諾失去聯繫-我重複一遍-與卡米諾失去通訊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们刚与卡米诺失去联系—我重复一遍—与卡米诺失去联络。

Key.Original: Can you confirm? Over.
Key.Chinese: 你能否確認?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你能否确认？完毕。

Container.name: 127_Ambient_1
Container.participants: EPA B Evac Helicopter;EPA B HQ;
Container.situation: ambient chatter of attack

Key.Original: Situation unclear, Echo. Wait one.
Key.Chinese: 狀況不明，Echo。請稍等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 状况不明，Echo。请稍等。

Key.Original: Echo, we see explosions at Kamino ... gunfire across the island...
Key.Chinese: 這裡是Echo，我們在卡米諾看到爆炸...整個島到處都是炮火...
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是 Echo，我们看到卡米诺发生爆炸...整个岛到处都是炮火...

Key.Original: Broadway, give me a report!
Key.Chinese: "百老匯"，給我一份報告!
Key.Chinesesimp: "百老汇"，给我一份报告！

Container.name: 125_Comply
Container.situation: player's co agrees to return

Key.Original: Understood, sir. Out.
Key.Chinese: 明白了，長官。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白了，长官。通话完毕。

Container.name: 120_Range
Container.participants: EPA B Kamino Firing Range;EPA B Logistics Officer;EPA B Intro CO;EPA B HQ;
Container.situation: kamino firing range reports the attack

Key.Original: Kamino, Broadway - we read you - wait one!
Key.Chinese: 卡米諾，這裡是"百老匯"-我們聽到了-請稍等!
Key.Chinesesimp: 卡米诺，这里是"百老汇"-我们收到了—请稍等！

Key.Original: Copy, Rogain, but, what about Kamino? What the fuck is going on?
Key.Chinese: 收到，羅根，但是，卡米諾該怎麼辦?他媽的到底發生了什麼事情?
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，罗根，但是卡米诺该怎么办？他妈的到底发生了什么事情？

Key.Original: Kamino to Broadway! Shots fired!
Key.Chinese: 卡米諾呼叫"百老匯"!有人開火!
Key.Chinesesimp: 卡米诺呼叫"百老汇"！有人开火！

Key.Original: Requesting support! - Broadway, do you copy? Over!
Key.Chinese: 請求支援!-"百老匯"，是否收到?完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: 请求支援！-"百老汇"，是否收到？完毕！

Key.Original: Adams, this is Rogain. Get your asses back here! Over.
Key.Chinese: 亞當斯，這裡是羅根。你們趕快回來這裡!完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 亚当斯，这里是罗根。你们赶快回来！完毕。

Key.Original: No buts, Staff Sergeant. That's an order. Out.
Key.Chinese: 沒有可是，上士。這是命令。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有可是，上士。这是命令。通话完毕。

Container.name: 117_Request_Help
Container.situation: player's co demands help from kamino

Key.Original: Staff Sergeant Adams to Kamino, come in! Commander MacKinnon's down! Requesting urgent assistance! Over!
Key.Chinese: 上士亞當斯呼叫卡米諾，接進!指揮官麥金農倒下了!請求緊急支援!完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: 亚当斯上士呼叫卡米诺，请回答！指挥官麦金农倒下了！请求紧急支援！完毕！

Key.Original: Kamino, I say again, requesting urgent medical support at our position! Commander MacKinnon is down! Please respond!
Key.Chinese: 卡米諾，我重複一遍，請求緊急醫療支援到我們的位置!指揮官麥金農倒下了!請回覆!
Key.Chinesesimp: 卡米诺，我重复一遍，请求紧急医疗支援到我们的位置！指挥官麦金农倒下了！请回复！

Container.name: 115_Check
Container.situation: player's co checks on the commander

Key.Original: Fuck, he's not breathing! What the hell happened?
Key.Chinese: 幹，他沒有呼吸了!到底發生了什麼事情?
Key.Chinesesimp: 操，他没有呼吸了！到底是怎么了？

Container.name: 110_Hazard
Container.situation: commander's truck spotted

Key.Original: Wait, is that MacKinnon?
Key.Chinese: 等等，那是麥金農嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 等等，那是麦金农吗？

Key.Original: Shit. Stop the truck, Kerry!
Key.Chinese: 該死。停下卡車，克里!
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。停下卡车，克里！

Container.name: 10_All_In
Container.participants: EPA B Intro CO;EPA B November;
Container.situation: player's co tells helicopter pilot they're in

Key.Original: All right, we're set. Let's go.
Key.Chinese: 好，我們都進來了。我們走吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好，我们都进来了。我们走吧。

Key.Original: Copy that, November's away.
Key.Chinese: 收到，November上路了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，November 上路了。

Container.name: 105_Left_Checkpoint
Container.situation: player left the checkpoint

Key.Original: Did you catch that one, Kerry? It's 'all clear?'. Oh, Sure, ok!
Key.Chinese: 你有沒有聽到那句，克里?'安全'?恩，可能是我多疑了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你有没有听到那句，克里？'安全'？恩，当然安全，好吧！

Key.Original: I mean, Christ, give me a break. What a complete waste of time these people are.
Key.Chinese: 我的意思是，天殺的，讓我休息一下。這些人完全就是在浪費我們的時間。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我是说，该死的，饶了我吧。这些人完全就是在浪费我们的时间。

Key.Original: What's that saying about not getting laid in a whore house?
Key.Chinese: 不是有句話這麼說嗎?不要陶醉在溫柔鄉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不是有句话这么说吗？不要陶醉在温柔乡。

Key.Original: Whatever, let's just get to Kamino.
Key.Chinese: 管他的，我們快去卡米諾吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 管他的，我们快去卡米诺吧。

Container.name: 100_Clear
Container.participants: EPA I Checkpoint Inspector;EPA I Checkpoint Officer;
Container.situation: soldier gives the all clear

Key.Original: All clear, sir!
Key.Chinese: 安全，長官!
Key.Chinesesimp: 安全，长官！

Key.Original: Ok. Raise the gate!
Key.Chinese: 好。升起柵欄!
Key.Chinesesimp: 好。升起栅栏！

Container.name: 05_Load_Up
Container.situation: player's co orders player to get in

Key.Original: Hop in.
Key.Chinese: 坐進來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 坐进来。

Container.name: 01_Wave
Container.situation: player's co waves to the player to get his attention

Key.Original: Over here, Kerry.
Key.Chinese: 在這裡，克里。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这边，克里。

Key.Original: Fatigue
Key.Chinese: 疲勞
Key.Chinesesimp: 疲劳

Key.Original: Driving
Key.Chinese: 駕駛
Key.Chinesesimp: 驾驶

Key.Original: You Disobeyed Your Orders
Key.Chinese: 你不服從你的命令
Key.Chinesesimp: 你不服从你的命令

Key.Original: The Truck Was Destroyed
Key.Chinese: 卡車被摧毀了
Key.Chinesesimp: 卡车被摧毁了

Key.Original: The decommissioning of NATO assets on Stratis is roughly halfway complete, but Commander MacKinnon wants to step up the pace of tearing down these bases.%1To that end, additional support is required across at %2Camp Rogain%3 and %4Kamino%5; however, an AAF lockdown is making the process all the more difficult. The Greenback brass are due to visit (more than likely to protest against our work, our flags, our very presence - the same old, same old).%6Most of the roads are closed. Those which are actually open have our friendly neighborhood watch closely monitoring them. At the moment, only specially authorized vehicles are currently permitted freedom of movement. Airspace is open, but it's heavily restricted.%7We'll have to assess the situation on-the-fly to determine what work we can actually get done. Bring a good book, though, it's nailed on that there'll be plenty of hanging around today.
Key.Chinese: 北約大半的軍備都已經從斯特拉蒂斯島上撤離了，但是指揮官麥金農希望加緊腳步拆掉這些基地。%1為此，%2羅根營地%3與%4卡米諾%5需要一些額外的支援;然而，因為阿爾蒂斯武裝力量封鎖了整個島嶼，而讓這些工作變得困難許多。只有綠軍的人馬能自由進出(大概是為了抗議我們在這邊的工作，我們的旗幟，我們的存在-都老生常談了)。%6大部分的道路皆已封鎖。這些道路本來也就只是對我們的友軍開放使用。但此時此刻，只有特別取得許可的車輛才能自由移動。空域是開放的，但是它有大量的規定與限制。%7在我們飛過去的路上，我們可以好好評估狀況，看看有那些事是我們可以做的。記得帶上一本好書，今天會有很多空閒的時間可給你利用。
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约设施在斯特拉蒂斯岛的废弃工作已经完成了一半，但是指挥官麦金农希望加紧脚步拆掉这些基地。%1为此，%2罗根营地%3与%4卡米诺%5需要一些额外的支援;然而，因为 AAF 封锁了整个岛屿，这些工作变得困难许多。只有绿军的人马能自由进出（大概是为了抗议我们在这边的工作，我们的旗帜，我们的存在—都老生常谈了）。%6大部分的道路皆已封锁。这些道路本来也就只是对我们的友军开放使用。但此时此刻，只有特别取得许可的车辆才能自由移动。空域是开放的，但是它有大量的规定与限制。%7在我们飞过去的路上，我们可以好好评估状况，看看有那些事是我们可以做的。记得带上一本好书，今天会有很多空闲的时间可给你利用。

Key.Original: Board the Truck
Key.Chinese: 登上卡車
Key.Chinesesimp: 登上卡车

Key.Original: GET IN
Key.Chinese: 搭乘
Key.Chinesesimp: 搭乘

Key.Original: Get in the truck as the driver.
Key.Chinese: 進入卡車並擔當駕駛。
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入卡车并担当驾驶。

Key.Original: Get to Safety
Key.Chinese: 到安全的地方
Key.Chinesesimp: 到安全的地方

Key.Original: Echo is down and you're out of options. You need to get out of the open. Follow your CO and find shelter in the forest.
Key.Chinese: Echo已被擊落，而你也沒有別的法子了。你必須離開這片開闊地。跟隨你的隊長並進入森林裡尋找掩護。
Key.Chinesesimp: Echo 已被击落，而你也没有别的法子了。你必须离开这片开阔地。跟随你的队长并进入森林里寻找掩护。

Key.Original: Return to Camp Rogain
Key.Chinese: 返回羅根營地
Key.Chinesesimp: 返回罗根营地

Key.Original: NATO forces are under attack. Return to %1Camp Rogain%2 immediately.
Key.Chinese: 北約部隊正遭受攻擊。立即返回%1羅根營地%2。
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约部队正遭受攻击。立即返回%1罗根营地%2。

Key.Original: Report In
Key.Chinese: 報到
Key.Chinesesimp: 报到

Key.Original: REPORT IN
Key.Chinese: 報到
Key.Chinesesimp: 报到

Key.Original: Report in with the camp's logistics officer.
Key.Chinese: 跟營地裡的後勤官報到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 跟营地里的后勤官报到。

Key.Original: Provide Logistical Support
Key.Chinese: 提供後勤支援
Key.Chinesesimp: 提供后勤支援

Key.Original: DRIVE
Key.Chinese: 駕駛
Key.Chinesesimp: 驾驶

Key.Original: Drive the logistics truck to the %1Kamino Firing Range%2 and assist Commander MacKinnon.
Key.Chinese: 駕駛後勤卡車到%1卡米諾練靶場%2並協助麥金農指揮官。
Key.Chinesesimp: 驾驶后勤卡车到%1卡米诺射击靶场%2并协助麦金农指挥官。

Key.Original: Board the Helicopter
Key.Chinese: 搭乘直升機
Key.Chinesesimp: 搭乘直升机

Key.Original: GET IN
Key.Chinese: 搭乘
Key.Chinesesimp: 搭乘

Key.Original: Board the helicopter.
Key.Chinese: 搭乘直升機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搭乘直升机。

Key.Original: Retreat
Key.Chinese: 撤退
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤退

Key.Original: AAF forces have turned their guns on NATO. %1The air base%2 has fallen, and with it, NATO command. Code Foxtrot has been issued, ordering all NATO forces to retreat. Stick with your commander and get to safety.
Key.Chinese: 阿爾蒂斯武裝力量部隊把他們的槍口轉向了北約。%1空軍基地%2與北約指揮官皆已失去。代號Foxtrot已經發出，命令所有的北約部隊進行撤退。跟緊你的隊長並前往安全的地方。
Key.Chinesesimp: AAF 调转枪口进攻了北约部队。%1空军基地%2与当地的北约司令部皆已损失。代号 Foxtrot 已经发出，命令所有北约部队进行撤退。跟紧你的队长并前往安全的地方。

Key.Original: Rendezvous with your CO
Key.Chinese: 與你的隊長會合
Key.Chinesesimp: 与你的队长会合

Key.Original: RENDEZVOUS
Key.Chinese: 會合
Key.Chinesesimp: 会合

Key.Original: Your CO is waiting for you at %1LZ Connor%2. Check in with him.
Key.Chinese: 你的隊長正在%1康納著陸區%2等你。去跟他報到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的指挥官正在%1康纳着陆区%2等你。去跟他报到。

Key.Original: Pass the AAF Checkpoint
Key.Chinese: 通過阿爾蒂斯武裝力量檢查站
Key.Chinesesimp: 通过 AAF 检查站

Key.Original: WAIT
Key.Chinese: 等待
Key.Chinesesimp: 等待

Key.Original: Pass %1the security checkpoint%2 between %3Camp Rogain%4 and the %5Kamino Firing Range%6.
Key.Chinese: 通過介於%3羅根營地%4與%5卡米諾練靶場%6之間的%1安全檢查站%2。
Key.Chinesesimp: 通过介于%3罗根营地%4与%5卡米诺射击靶场%6之间的%1安全检查站%2。

Key.Original: Go to Camp Rogain
Key.Chinese: 前往羅根營地
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往罗根营地

Key.Original: The roads are locked down. Get to %1Camp Rogain%2 by helicopter.
Key.Chinese: 道路被封鎖了。使用直升機前往%1羅根營地%2。
Key.Chinesesimp: 道路被封锁了。使用直升机前往%1罗根营地%2。

Key.Original: Two hours later...
Key.Chinese: 兩小時過後...
Key.Chinesesimp: 两小时过后...

Key.Original: NATO forces struggle to regroup.
Key.Chinese: 北約部隊正努力重新集結。
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约部队正努力重新集结。

Key.Original: Situation Normal
Key.Chinese: 狀況正常
Key.Chinesesimp: 状况正常

Container.name: x25_Survivors_Dead
Container.participants: EPA B Player;EPA B Delta Lead;
Container.situation: player moves out with only the rv team

Key.Original: No. We heard gunfire earlier and they went dark... No sense waiting any longer.
Key.Chinese: 沒有。我們稍早前有聽到槍聲，之後我們就與他們失去聯繫...已經沒有意義再繼續等下去了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有。我们稍早前有听到枪声，之后我们就与他们失去联系...再等下去没意义了。

Key.Original: Have you heard from the other survivors, sir?
Key.Chinese: 你有聽到其他倖存者的消息嗎，長官?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你有听到有关其他幸存者的消息吗，长官？

Key.Original: Damn.
Key.Chinese: 該死。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。

Container.name: x20_Out_Of_Time
Container.situation: survivors tell player they're leaving without him

Key.Original: You're out of time, Kerry. We've got to get moving to the rendezvous. Good luck. Out.
Key.Chinese: 你已經沒有時間了，克里。我們必須前往會合點了。祝好運。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你已经没有时间了，克里。我们必须前往会合点了。祝好运。通话完毕。

Container.name: x15_Warning2
Container.situation: survivors give player his second warning

Key.Original: You've got one minute, Kerry. Then we're leaving. Out.
Key.Chinese: 你只剩下1分鐘，克里。然後我們就要走了。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你只剩下1分钟，克里。然后我们就要走了。通话完毕。

Container.name: x10_Warning1
Container.situation: survivors give player his first warning

Key.Original: Five minutes to go, Kerry. Come on, move it.
Key.Chinese: 5分鐘後出發，克里。快過來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 5分钟后出发，克里。快过来。

Container.name: x05_Exploded_No_Kit
Container.participants: EPA B Player;EPA B Bravo Lead;
Container.situation: player was injured by the mine and has no first aid kit

Key.Original: I hate to say it, soldier, but... the other guy might still have his.
Key.Chinese: 我很討厭這麼說，大兵，但是...另一個傢伙身上應該也有一個。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我很讨厌这么说，大兵，但是...另一个家伙身上应该也有一个。

Key.Original: Have a look and see if you can get yourself patched up and make your way to us. Out.
Key.Chinese: 去看一下，看看能不能治療你自己，然後想辦法來我們這邊。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 去看一下，看看能不能治疗你自己，然后想办法来我们这边。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Yeah, I caught some fucking shrapnel and I've got nothing to treat it with.
Key.Chinese: 是，我受了一點傷，而且我沒有任何的醫療工具在身上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是，我受了一点伤，而且我身上什么治疗工具都没有。

Container.name: x01_Exploded_Has_Kit
Container.participants: EPA B Player;EPA B Bravo Lead;
Container.situation: player was injured by the mine but has a first aid kit

Key.Original: Okay, fix yourself up as best you can, then make your way here. Out.
Key.Chinese: 好，盡你所能的治療一下你自己，然後趕往我們這裡。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好，尽你所能的治疗一下你自己，然后赶往我们这里。通话完毕。

Key.Original: I'm... shit, I mean... I'm a little banged up, but I've still got my field dressings on me.
Key.Chinese: 我...該死，我的意思是...我是有點受傷了，不過我身上有一些應急治療的工具。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我...该死，我的意思是...我是有点受伤了，不过我身上有一些应急治疗的工具。

Container.name: i01_Navigation
Container.situation: survivors help player orientate himself

Key.Original: Heads up, Kerry, here's some additional info.
Key.Chinese: 注意聽，克里，給你一些額外的建議。
Key.Chinesesimp: 注意听，克里，给你一些额外的建议。

Key.Original: Since Adams hit a mine, I'd advise against continuing in your original direction of travel.
Key.Chinese: 在剛剛亞當斯踩中地雷的時候，我建議你趕快離開原本的位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在刚刚亚当斯踩中地雷的时候，我建议你赶快改变原本的行进方向。

Key.Original: Take a look at your map. Once again, we're at grid 043043, at the old outpost north of Mike-26.
Key.Chinese: 看一下你的地圖。再提一次，我們的座標在043043，在Mike-26北方的舊前哨站。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看一下你的地图。再提一次，我们的座标在043043，在 Mike-26北方的旧前哨站。

Key.Original: If you can get some place higher up, you should be able to see Mike-26's dome and orientate yourself from there.
Key.Chinese: 假如你能到一處高地，你應該就能看見Mike-26的圓頂，並從中獲得方向。
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如你能到一处高地，你应该就能看见 Mike-26的圆顶，并从中获得方向。

Key.Original: Good luck, Corporal
Key.Chinese: 祝好運，下士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 祝好运，下士。

Container.name: 95_Keep_Moving
Container.situation: survivor lead tells them to keep going

Key.Original: Keep moving. The trees will help hide us from view.
Key.Chinese: 繼續移動。樹木會幫助我們掩蔽身形。
Key.Chinesesimp: 继续移动。树木会帮助掩蔽我们。

Container.name: 90_Heli_Patrol
Container.situation: player spots the enemy helicopter

Key.Original: Shit. Helicopter.
Key.Chinese: 該死。有直升機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。有直升机。

Container.name: 85_Check_In
Container.participants: EPA B Delta Lead;EPA B Bravo Lead;
Container.situation: the rendezvous team contacts the survivors

Key.Original: Good to hear from you, Falcon. We ran into a Greenback patrol. Nothing we couldn't handle, over.
Key.Chinese: 真高興聽見你們，"獵鷹"。我們剛剛與綠軍的巡邏隊相遇。沒有什麼事是我們不能掌握的，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 真高兴听见你们，"猎鹰"。我们刚刚撞上一队绿军的巡逻队。我们还能应付，完毕。

Key.Original: Understood, Falcon. See you soon. Out.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"獵鷹"。等下見。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"猎鹰"。等下见。通话完毕。

Key.Original: This is Falcon. We just heard gunfire. Are you guys alright? Over.
Key.Chinese: 這裡是"獵鷹"。我們剛剛聽到了槍聲。你們都還好嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是"猎鹰"。我们刚刚听到了枪声。你们都还好吗？完毕。

Key.Original: Copy. We're in position at the rendezvous, awaiting your arrival.
Key.Chinese: 收到。我們已經在會合點了，等待你們的到達。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。我们已经在会合点了，等待你们的到达。

Container.name: 80_Bad_Idea
Container.situation: player says i told you so

Key.Original: I told you going through the forest was a bad idea!
Key.Chinese: 我就告訴過你進入森林裡是個壞主意!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我就告诉过你进森林是个坏主意！

Container.name: 75_Too_Quiet
Container.participants: EPA B Bravo Lead;EPA B Player;
Container.situation: survivor lead remarks on how quiet it is

Key.Original: I don't like this. It's too quiet.
Key.Chinese: 我不喜歡這樣。太安靜了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不喜欢这样。太安静了。

Key.Original: You say that like that's a bad thing.
Key.Chinese: 你說的好像安靜是一件壞事。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你说的好像安静是件坏事。

Container.name: 70_Stay_Alert
Container.situation: survivor lead tells team to stay alert

Key.Original: Alright, guys, keep your heads on a swivel.
Key.Chinese: 好的，兄弟們，保持你們的頭是在轉的，注意四周。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，兄弟们，保持注意四周。

Container.name: 65_Forest
Container.participants: EPA B Player;EPA B Bravo Lead;
Container.situation: player isn't happy with going through the forest

Key.Original: Yup.
Key.Chinese: 是的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的。

Key.Original: You've got a problem with forests, Kerry?
Key.Chinese: 你跟森林之間有任何問題嗎，克里?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你跟森林之间有什么梁子吗，克里？

Key.Original: We're going in there?
Key.Chinese: 我們要進去那裡?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们要进那里？

Key.Original: Into the forest?
Key.Chinese: 進去森林?
Key.Chinesesimp: 进森林？

Key.Original: I've just not had that much luck with them today.
Key.Chinese: 只是今天我沒有太多好運在森林裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 只是今天我在森林里运气不佳。

Container.name: 60_Plan
Container.situation: leader of the survivors reiterates the plan

Key.Original: Alright, guys, just so we're all on the same page.
Key.Chinese: 好的，大夥，讓我們再確認一次計劃。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，大伙，让我们再确认一次计划。

Key.Original: We're going to push south to the rendezvous, link up with the Brits, and continue to Camp Maxwell.
Key.Chinese: 我們將向南推進到會合點，與英國人會合，然後再到麥克斯韋營地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们将向南推进到会合点，与英国人会合，然后再到麦克斯韦营地。

Key.Original: Okay. Let's do this.
Key.Chinese: 好。我們行動吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好。我们行动吧。

Container.name: 55_Regrouped
Container.participants: EPA B Bravo Lead;EPA B Player;
Container.situation: the player regrouped with the survivors

Key.Original: Good to see you, Kerry. Let's move.
Key.Chinese: 真高興見到你，克里。我們走吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 真高兴见到你，克里。我们走吧。

Key.Original: Likewise, Sergeant.
Key.Chinese: 同感，中士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 同感，中士。

Container.name: 50_Position
Container.participants: EPA B Bravo Lead;EPA B Player;
Container.situation: the survivors tell the player where they are

Key.Original: We're over here, Kerry. You see the big white building?
Key.Chinese: 我們在這裡，克里。你有看到一棟大白色建築嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们在这里，克里。你有看到一栋大白色建筑吗？

Key.Original: Not that one - the old one next to it.
Key.Chinese: 不是那個-是在他旁邊比較舊的那個。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不是那个—是在他旁边比较旧的那个。

Key.Original: Yup.
Key.Chinese: 有。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有。

Key.Original: Old one next to it. Got it. Out.
Key.Chinese: 在旁邊比較舊的那個。收到了。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在旁边比较旧的那个。收到了。通话完毕。

Container.name: 45_Copy
Container.participants: EPA B Bravo Lead;EPA B Player;
Container.situation: the survivors agree to meet miller's team

Key.Original: Copy that, sir. We'll be there! Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到了，長官。我們會到達那裡!通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到了，长官。我们会到达那里！通话完毕。

Key.Original: Kerry, you get that? Over.
Key.Chinese: 克里，你聽到了嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，你听到了吗？完毕。

Key.Original: We can't keep them waiting all day. We're leaving in 10. Hope to see you before then! Out.
Key.Chinese: 我們不能讓他們等上一整天。我們將在10分鐘之內離開。希望能在那之前見到你!通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们不能让他们等上一整天。我们将在10分钟之内离开。希望能在那之前见到你！通话完毕。

Key.Original: Copy.
Key.Chinese: 收到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。

Container.name: 40_Contact
Container.participants: EPA B Miller;EPA B Bravo Lead;
Container.situation: miller contacts the survivors

Key.Original: Uh... Receiving you, sir. Sergeant Lacey. Over.
Key.Chinese: 呃...收到了，長官。這裡是中士萊西。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 呃...收到了，长官。这里是中士莱西。完毕。

Key.Original: Yes, sir! Of course!
Key.Chinese: 是，長官!當然!
Key.Chinesesimp: 是，长官！当然！

Key.Original: This is Captain Scott Miller, Royal Navy. Come in, over.
Key.Chinese: 這裡是斯考特·米勒上校，皇家海軍。接進，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是斯考特·米勒上校，皇家海军。请回答，完毕。

Key.Original: Next time, avoid broadcasting over the whole net, soldier.
Key.Chinese: 下次，請注意不要蓋臺整個通訊頻道，大兵。
Key.Chinesesimp: 下次，请注意别在整个通信频道广播，大兵。

Key.Original: We're consolidating the remnants of our forces at Camp Maxwell. You're welcome to join us, if you want.
Key.Chinese: 我們在麥克斯韋營地集結了剩餘的部隊。很歡迎你們加入我們，假如你們想的話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们在麦克斯韦营地集结了剩余的部队。很欢迎你们加入我们，假如你们想的话。

Key.Original: Not so fast. Altis Armed Forces have concentrated themselves around Mike-26 and the air base, meaning there's sea AAF units between you and us.
Key.Chinese: 先不著急。阿爾蒂斯武裝力量集結在Mike-26與空軍基地附近，這意謂著我們跟你們之間存在著海量的敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 先不着急。阿尔蒂斯武装部队正集结在 Mike-26 与空军基地附近，这意味着你我之间存在着海量的敌人。

Key.Original: I'm dispatching a team to RV with you at 028037, just east of Camp Tempest. Our callsign is Falcon. Make your way there. Over.
Key.Chinese: 我派遣了一個小隊在028037接應你們，就在坦皮斯特營地的東方。我們的呼號是"獵鷹"。想辦法自己抵達那裡。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我派遣了一个小组在028037接应你们，就在坦皮斯特营地的东方。我们的呼号是"猎鹰"。想办法自己抵达那里。完毕。

Container.name: 35_Exploded_Fine
Container.participants: EPA B Player;EPA B Bravo Lead;
Container.situation: player was not injured by the explosion

Key.Original: Okay. Make your way to us and we'll go from there. Out.
Key.Chinese: 好的。用你自己的方式到我們這邊來，然後我們再從這邊出發。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的。用你自己的方式到我们这边来，然后我们再从这边出发。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Yeah - I mean, no - I'm fine.
Key.Chinese: 是-我的意思是，不-我很好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是—我的意思是，不—我很好。

Container.name: 30b_Situation_lowpass
Container.participants: EPA B Bravo Lead;EPA B Player;
Container.situation: kerry's ears are ringing, duplicated text

Key.Original: Sergeant Adams, we just heard an explosion. You guys ok? Over.
Key.Chinese: 上士亞當斯，我們聽到了爆炸聲。你們還好嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 亚当斯上士，我们听到了爆炸声。你们还好吗？完毕。

Key.Original: Adams? Kerry? You there? Respond.
Key.Chinese: 亞當斯?克里?你們在嗎?請回覆。
Key.Chinesesimp: 亚当斯？克里？你们在吗？请回复。

Key.Original: Wait, what happened? Where's Adams? Over.
Key.Chinese: 等等，發生了什麼事?亞當斯在哪?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 等等，发生了什么事？亚当斯在哪？完毕。

Key.Original: Fuck. Shit, Kerry, I'm sorry, but you've got to get out of there. If we heard it, you can bet the AAF did too. You copy?
Key.Chinese: 幹。該死，克里，我很抱歉，但是你必須趕快離開那裡。假如我們能聽到，你也可以假設阿爾蒂斯武裝力量也聽到了。你收到了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 操。该死，克里，我很遗憾，但是你必须赶快离开那里。假如我们能听到的话，AAF 肯定也听到了。你收到了吗？

Key.Original: Yeah... I'm here... Fuck!
Are you hurt?
Key.Chinese: 你受傷了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你受伤了吗？

Key.Original: ... a landmine... I'm on my own.
Key.Chinese: ...一個地雷...我只剩我自己了。
Key.Chinesesimp: ...一枚地雷...只剩我自己了。

Key.Original: Yeah, I... fuck... I copy.
Key.Chinese: 是，我...幹...我收到了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是，我...操...我收到了。

Container.name: 30a_Situation
Container.participants: EPA B Bravo Lead;EPA B Player;
Container.situation: the survivors ask what happened

Key.Original: Sergeant Adams, we just heard an explosion. You guys ok? Over.
Key.Chinese: 上士亞當斯，我們聽到了爆炸聲。你們還好嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 亚当斯上士，我们听到了爆炸声。你们还好吗？完毕。

Key.Original: Adams? Kerry? You there? Respond.
Key.Chinese: 亞當斯?克里?你們在嗎?請回覆。
Key.Chinesesimp: 亚当斯？克里？你们在吗？请回复。

Key.Original: Wait, what happened? Where's Adams? Over.
Key.Chinese: 等等，發生了什麼事?亞當斯在哪?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 等等，出什么事了？亚当斯在哪？完毕。

Key.Original: Fuck. Shit, Kerry, I'm sorry, but you've got to get out of there. If we heard it, you can bet the AAF did too. You copy?
Key.Chinese: 幹。該死，克里，我很抱歉，但是你必須趕快離開那裡。假如我們能聽到，你也可以假設阿爾蒂斯武裝力量也聽到了。你收到了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 操。该死，克里，我很遗憾，但是你必须赶快离开那里。假如我们能听到的话，AAF 肯定也听到了。你收到了吗？

Key.Original: Yeah... I'm here... Fuck!
Are you hurt?
Key.Chinese: 你受傷了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你受伤了吗？

Key.Original: ... a landmine... I'm on my own.
Key.Chinese: ...一個地雷...我只剩我自己了。
Key.Chinesesimp: ...一颗地雷...我只剩我自己了。

Key.Original: Yeah, I... fuck... I copy.
Key.Chinese: 是，我...幹...我收到了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是，我...操...我收到了。

Container.name: 25_Mine
Container.situation: player's co steps on a mine

Key.Original: Fuck!
Key.Chinese: 幹!
Key.Chinesesimp: 操！

Key.Original: Sarge? Sergeant Adams?!
Key.Chinese: 上士?上士亞當斯?!
Key.Chinesesimp: 上士？亚当斯上士？！

Key.Original: Jesus!
Key.Chinese: 天殺的!
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的！

Container.name: 24_Mine
Container.situation: player's co steps on a mine

Container.name: 20_Trust
Container.participants: EPA B Player;EPA B Intro CO;
Container.situation: player asks his co if they can trust the survivors

Key.Original: I don't think we have much of a choice, Kerry.
Key.Chinese: 我不認為我們有更多的選擇，克里。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不认为我们有更多的选择，克里。

Key.Original: You think we can make it there, sir?
Key.Chinese: 你認為我們能成功抵達那裡嗎，長官?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你认为我们能成功抵达那里吗，长官？

Container.name: 15_Rendezvous
Container.participants: EPA B Intro CO;EPA B Bravo Lead;
Container.situation: player's co agrees to meet survivors

Key.Original: Solid copy, we'll be here. Just get a move on. Out.
Key.Chinese: 完整收到，我們會在這邊。趕快過來就是了。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 完整收到，我们会在这边。赶快过来就是了。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Understood, will rendezvous with you there. How copy? Over.
Key.Chinese: 了解，將會與你在那邊會合。有收到嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，将会与你在那边会合。有收到吗？完毕。

Container.name: 125_Survivors_Alive
Container.participants: EPA B Bravo Lead;EPA B Delta Lead;
Container.situation: player moves out with survivors and rv team

Key.Original: How many other guys have you helped this way?
Key.Chinese: 你們用這種方式幫助了多少人?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们用这种方式帮助了多少人？

Key.Original: Damn.
Key.Chinese: 該死。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。

Key.Original: You're the only ones so far.
Key.Chinese: 你們是到目前為止唯一的一個。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们是到目前为止唯一的一批。

Container.name: 120_RV
Container.situation: player reaches the rendezvous

Key.Original: Glad to see you made it in one piece. Let's go.
Key.Chinese: 真高興還見到你們是完整的。我們走吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 真高兴还见到你们还活着。我们走吧。

Container.name: 115_Reveal
Container.situation: rv team comes out of hiding

Key.Original: Alright, men, you can come out of hiding now.
Key.Chinese: 好吧，兄弟們，你們可以從隱身處出來了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，兄弟们，你们可以从隐蔽处出来了。

Container.name: 110_Near_RV
Container.participants: EPA B Bravo Lead;EPA B Delta Lead;
Container.situation: survivors approach the rendezvous

Key.Original: Falcon, be advised, we're nearing your position. Try not to shoot us! Over.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，請注意，我們在你們的位置附近了。請試著不要射到我們!完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，请注意，我们在你们的位置附近了。请保证别打我们！完毕。

Key.Original: No promises. Falcon out.
Key.Chinese: 不保證。"獵鷹"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不保证。"猎鹰"通话完毕。

Container.name: 10_Survivors
Container.participants: EPA B Bravo Lead;EPA B Intro CO;
Container.situation: the survivors contact the player and his co

Key.Original: Hello? Hello? Does anyone copy?
Key.Chinese: 哈囉?哈囉?有任何人收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 哈啰？哈啰？有谁收到吗？

Key.Original: Does anyone copy? Over.
Key.Chinese: 有任何人收到嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有任何人收到吗？完毕。

Key.Original: Sarge, thank Christ, we thought we were the only ones left.
Key.Chinese: 上士，感謝上帝，我們以為我們是唯一被留下的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 上士，感谢上帝，我们还以为我们是唯一剩下的人。

Key.Original: Staff Sergeant Adams here, I read you. Over.
Key.Chinese: 上士亞當斯在這，我聽到了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这是亚当斯上士，我听到了。完毕。

Key.Original: I managed to link up with a couple of guys from Point Zulu.
Key.Chinese: 我設法集結了幾個從祖魯點來的傢伙。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我设法集结了几个从 Zulu 点来的家伙。

Key.Original: Affirmative - Is that you, Lacey? Over.
Key.Chinese: 了解-是你嗎，萊西?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解—是你吗，莱西？完毕。

Key.Original: Uh... We're just north of Mike-26, at the old outpost. 043043. We've been here for, shit, at least an hour now. Over.
Key.Chinese: 呃...我們在Mike-26的北邊，就在那個舊前哨站。座標043043。我們在這邊，該死，至少待了一個小時以上了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 呃...我们在 Mike-26的北边，就在那个旧前哨站。座标043043。我们在这边，该死，至少待了一个小时以上了。完毕。

Key.Original: What's your grid Sergeant? Over.
Key.Chinese: 中士，你們的座標在哪?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 中士，你们的座标在哪？完毕。

Container.name: 105_Left_Forest
Container.situation: player breathes a sigh of relief

Key.Original: Well. Glad that's over with.
Key.Chinese: 終於。我們總算脫離森林了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 终于。我们总算脱离森林了。

Container.name: 100_Almost_There
Container.situation: survivor lead acknowledges they're almost at the rendezvous

Key.Original: Okay, we're almost there.
Key.Chinese: 好，我們快要到了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好，我们快要到了。

Container.name: 05_Move_Out
Container.situation: player's co tells him it's okay to move

Key.Original: Okay, let's move.
Key.Chinese: 好，我們移動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好，我们移动。

Container.name: 01_Stay_Low
Container.situation: player's co tells him to stay low

Key.Original: Stay low, Kerry.
Key.Chinese: 低調點，克里。
Key.Chinesesimp: 低调点，克里。

Key.Original: Let him pass.
Key.Chinese: 讓他過去。
Key.Chinesesimp: 让他过去。

Key.Original: Survivors
Key.Chinese: 倖存者
Key.Chinesesimp: 幸存者

Key.Original: Rendezvous
Key.Chinese: 會合點
Key.Chinesesimp: 会合点

Key.Original: Point Zulu
Key.Chinese: 'Zulu'點
Key.Chinesesimp: 'Zulu'点

Key.Original: Point X-ray
Key.Chinese: 'X-Ray'點
Key.Chinesesimp: 'X-ray'点

Key.Original: Navigation
Key.Chinese: 導航
Key.Chinesesimp: 导航

Key.Original: Earlier this morning, Altis Armed Forces and NATO peacekeepers unexpectedly entered a state of sudden and bloody conflict. Exactly how this situation came about is not yet entirely clear.%1NATO Command issued 'Code Foxtrot': the complete and immediate withdrawal of all forces from Stratis. Those personnel remaining on the island can, for now, only try to survive long enough to regroup and reassess.
Key.Chinese: 今天稍早，阿爾蒂斯武裝力量(AAF)跟北約維和部隊無預警地進入交戰的狀態。目前還並不清楚為什麼會發生這種狀況。%1北約指揮部發布了'代號Foxtrot'的命令:立即撤離所有在斯特拉蒂斯上的部隊。現在，對於那些還被留在島上的人員，他們只能盡量的想辦法活下去，同時集結其他的倖存者並重新審視狀況。
Key.Chinesesimp: 今天稍早，阿尔蒂斯武装部队（AAF）跟北约维和部队无预警地进入交战状态。目前还并不清楚为什么会发生这种状况。%1北约司令部发布了'代号 Foxtrot'的命令：立即撤离所有在斯特拉蒂斯岛上的部队。现在，对于那些还被留在岛上的人员，他们只能尽量的想办法活下去，同时集结其他的幸存者并重新审视状况。

Key.Original: Link Up with Bravo
Key.Chinese: 與Bravo會合
Key.Chinesesimp: 与 Bravo 会合

Key.Original: REGROUP
Key.Chinese: 會合
Key.Chinesesimp: 会合

Key.Original: Move to %1the old military outpost%2 and meet up with Bravo.
Key.Chinese: 移動到%1舊前哨站%2，並與Bravo碰面。
Key.Chinesesimp: 移动到%1旧前哨站%2，并与 Bravo 碰面。

Key.Original: Move to the Rendezvous
Key.Chinese: 移動到會合點
Key.Chinesesimp: 移动到会合点

Key.Original: RENDEZVOUS
Key.Chinese: 會合點
Key.Chinesesimp: 会合点

Key.Original: Meet Cpt. Miller's unit at %1the RV point%2.
Key.Chinese: 與米勒上校的人馬在%1會合點%2碰面。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与米勒上校的人马在%1会合点%2碰面。

Key.Original: A NATO helicopter went down in a nearby forest.
Key.Chinese: 一架北約的直升機墜落在附近的森林裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一架北约的直升机坠落在附近的森林里。

Container.name: 01_Start
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Lead;EPA B Miller;
Container.situation: player's team approaches the crash site

Key.Original: Alpha to Falcon, approaching crash site, over.
Key.Chinese: Alpha呼叫"獵鷹"，正在接近墜機點，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Alpha 呼叫"猎鹰"，正在接近坠机点，完毕。

Key.Original: Confirmed, Alpha. Make a sweep of the immediate area. Out.
Key.Chinese: 了解，Alpha。請立即掃蕩一遍該區。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，Alpha。请立即扫荡一遍该区。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Blackfoot Down
Key.Chinese: 黑足墜落
Key.Chinesesimp: 黑足坠落

Key.Original: Defensive Perimeter
Key.Chinese: 防守圈
Key.Chinesesimp: 防御圈

Container.name: x20_Detonate_Casualties
Container.situation: medic orders player to detonate the charge

Key.Original: All right, Kerry. Do it.
Key.Chinese: 好的，克里。引爆吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，克里。引爆吧。

Container.name: x15_Get_Clear_Casualties
Container.situation: medic orders everyone to get clear

Key.Original: Okay. Wait until we're all clear before detonating.
Key.Chinese: 好。等我們都撤離後再引爆。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好。等我们都撤离后再引爆。

Container.name: x14_Reprimand_Casualties
Container.situation: medic reprimands the player

Key.Original: Fuck's sake, Kerry! You'd better hope one of these assholes around here has something you can use!
Key.Chinese: 天殺的，克里!你最好希望附近這些混蛋身上有你要的東西!
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的，克里！你最好希望附近这些混蛋身上有你要的东西！

Container.name: x13_Reprimand
Container.situation: player's co reprimands the player

Key.Original: Fuck's sake, Kerry! You'd better hope one of these assholes around here has something you can use!
Key.Chinese: 天殺的，克里!你最好希望附近這些混蛋身上有你要的東西!
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的，克里！你最好希望附近这些混蛋身上有你要的东西！

Container.name: x12_No_Charges
Container.situation: kerry doesn't have any charges

Key.Original: Yeah - we got a problem, sir - I'm out.
Key.Chinese: 唉呀-我們有麻煩了，長官-我沒有炸藥了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 唉呀—我们有个麻烦，长官—我没有炸药了。

Container.name: x10_Plant_Casualties
Container.situation: medic orders player to plant the charge

Key.Original: Kerry, set up a charge on that wreckage.
Key.Chinese: 克里，在那殘骸旁設置炸藥。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，在那残骸旁设置炸药。

Container.name: x05_Inform_Casualties
Container.situation: medic reports the survivor

Key.Original: Falcon, we've got a survivor at the crash site.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，我們在墜機點找到了一個生還者。
