Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，我们在坠机点找到了一个生还者。

Key.Original: He's immobilized. We don't have the supplies to get him moving. Requesting medevac, over.
Key.Chinese: 他全身骨折。我們並沒有設備能移動他。請求醫療後送，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他没法行动。我们也没有设备能移动他。请求医疗后送，完毕。

Container.name: x01_Survivor_Casualties
Container.situation: only the player and medic spot the survivor

Key.Original: There's a survivor over here!
Key.Chinese: 這裡有一個生還者!
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里有一个生还者！

Key.Original: I'll check up on him. Kerry, we need a perimeter.
Key.Chinese: 我會負責檢查他。克里，我們需要一個防守圈。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我会负责检查他。克里，我们需要建立防御圈。

Key.Original: Plant your mines and take up a defensive position.
Key.Chinese: 設置你的炸藥並防禦這裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 设置你的炸药并防御这里。

Container.name: i01_Mines
Container.situation: miller provides advice on how to plant mines

Key.Original: Alpha, update: expect enemy contact to come from the west, vectoring from Girna.
Key.Chinese: Alpha，狀況更新:預計會有敵人從西方，也就是吉爾納的方向向你們靠近。
Key.Chinesesimp: Alpha，状况更新：预计会有敌人从西方，也就是格尔纳的方向向你们靠近。

Key.Original: When setting up your defense, focus upon the ridgeline just in front of your position.
Key.Chinese: 當你們設置好防禦後，請注意你們前面的山脊線。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当你们设置好防御后，请注意你们前面的山脊线。

Key.Original: Just remember, don't only focus on one place. If one mine goes off, they're going to know to go around it. Out.
Key.Chinese: 要記住，不要只關注一個地方。當有地雷被觸發後，他們會繞道而行。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 要记住，别只盯着一个地方。地雷炸响之后，他们就会知道绕行。通话完毕。

Container.name: 70_Detonate
Container.situation: player's co orders player to detonate the charge

Key.Original: All right, Kerry. Do it.
Key.Chinese: 好的，克里。引爆吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，克里。引爆吧。

Container.name: 65_Get_Clear
Container.situation: player's co orders everyone to get clear

Key.Original: Okay. Wait until we're all clear before detonating.
Key.Chinese: 好。等我們都撤離後再引爆。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好。等我们都撤离后再引爆。

Container.name: 60_Planted
Container.situation: player plants the charge

Key.Original: Charge planted, sir!
Key.Chinese: 炸藥設置完成，長官!
Key.Chinesesimp: 炸药设置完成，长官！

Container.name: 55_Planting
Container.situation: player moves to plant the charge

Key.Original: I'm on it!
Key.Chinese: 我在做了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我在做了！

Container.name: 50_Plant
Container.situation: player's team orders player to plant the charge

Key.Original: Kerry, plant a charge on that wreck.
Key.Chinese: 克里，在那殘骸旁設置炸藥。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，在那残骸旁设置炸药。

Container.name: 45_Survivor_Dead
Container.participants: EPA B Medic;EPA B Delta Lead;EPA B Miller;
Container.situation: survivor dies

Key.Original: What is it?
Key.Chinese: 怎麼了?
Key.Chinesesimp: 怎么了？

Key.Original: Shit.
Key.Chinese: 該死。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。

Key.Original: Fuck.
Key.Chinese: 幹。
Key.Chinesesimp: 操。

Key.Original: Falcon, this is Delta. They've lost their pilot. Please advise, over.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，這裡是Delta。他們失去了飛行員。請下達指示，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，这里是 Delta。他们的飞行员死了。请下达指示，完毕。

Key.Original: I've got no pulse here - he's gone.
Key.Chinese: 我感覺不到他的脈搏了-他走了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我感觉不到他的脉搏了—他死了。

Key.Original: Acknowledged, Delta, you did what you could. Fall back.
Key.Chinese: 了解，Delta，你已經盡你所能了。撤回來吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，Delta，你已经尽你所能了。撤回来吧。

Key.Original: Alpha, continue on mission. Destroy the wreck and get back to Maxwell. Out.
Key.Chinese: Alpha，繼續你們的任務。摧毀殘骸後返回麥克斯韋。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Alpha，继续执行任务。摧毁残骸后返回麦克斯韦。通话完毕。

Container.name: 40_On_Station
Container.participants: EPA B Delta Lead;EPA B Medic;
Container.situation: bravo arrives at the crash site

Key.Original: Delta to Alpha, we're on the way. Sending our medic to your guy. Over.
Key.Chinese: Delta呼叫Alpha，我們在路上了。我們的醫護兵在往你們那邊過去了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Delta 呼叫 Alpha，我们在路上了。我们的卫生兵在往你们那边过去了。完毕。

Key.Original: Copy that - just hurry the fuck up - we're losing him.
Key.Chinese: 收到-只是最好快點-我們快失去他了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到—只是最好快点—我们快失去他了。

Container.name: 35_Spotted
Container.situation: player's team spots the counter attack

Key.Original: Here they come! Engage at will!
Key.Chinese: 他們來了!自由接戰!
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们来了！自由接战！

Container.name: 33_Medevac_Result
Container.situation: miller dispatches the medevac

Key.Original: All right, Alpha, the best we can do is divert an element from Delta.
Key.Chinese: 好吧，Alpha，我們可以做的最佳選擇，就是派遣Delta一部分的人去接應你們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，Alpha，我们能做的顶多就是从 Delta 派来一支分队接应你们。

Key.Original: They can bring a stretcher. Sit tight. Out.
Key.Chinese: 他們會帶來擔架。請耐心等待。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们会带来担架。请耐心等待。通话完毕。

Container.name: 30_Medevac
Container.situation: miller dispatches the medevac

Key.Original: Medevac? With respect, Alpha, it's not like we've got a helo on standby here.
Key.Chinese: 醫療後送?恕我直言，Alpha，我們這裡並不像是有一臺待命中的直升機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 医疗后送？恕我直言，Alpha，好像我们这里没有这么架直升机待命。

Key.Original: Bear with me. Wait one.
Key.Chinese: 我想想辦法。請稍等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我想想办法。请稍等。

Container.name: 25_Inform
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Lead;EPA B Miller;
Container.situation: player's team reports the survivor

Key.Original: Falcon, we've got a survivor at the crash site.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，我們在墜機點找到了一個生還者。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，我们在坠机点找到了一个生还者。

Key.Original: He's immobilized. We don't have the supplies to get him moving. Requesting medevac, over.
Key.Chinese: 他全身骨折。我們並沒有設備能移動他。請求醫療後送，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他没法活动。我们并没有设备能移动他。请求医疗后送，完毕。

Container.name: 20_Survivor
Container.situation: player's team spots the survivor

Key.Original: There's a survivor over here!
Key.Chinese: 這裡有一個生還者!
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里有一个生还者！

Key.Original: Doc, take care of him. We'll take up defensive positions.
Key.Chinese: 醫生，去照顧他。我們將會設立防禦陣地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 医生，去照顾他。我们将会设立防御阵地。

Key.Original: Kerry, you've got the mines, set up a perimeter. Get a move on.
Key.Chinese: 克里，你身上有地雷，去設置個防守圈。開始行動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，你身上有地雷，去设置防御圈。开始行动。

Container.name: 15_Report
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Lead;EPA B Miller;
Container.situation: player's team reports the contact

Key.Original: Falcon, this is Alpha. Enemy forces occupying the crash site neutralized. Securing now, over.
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，這裡是Alpha。在墜機點現場的敵兵已被殲滅。肅清完成，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，这里是 Alpha。在坠机点现场的敌人已被歼灭。正在肃清现场，完毕。

Key.Original: Copy that, Alpha. Be advised, Bravo reports enemy movement incoming from Girna.
Key.Chinese: 收到，Alpha。請注意，Bravo回報有敵人從吉爾納的方向靠近你們中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，Alpha。请注意，Bravo 报告称有敌人从格尔纳向你靠近。

Key.Original: Get in and get out. Falcon out.
Key.Chinese: 快快解決那邊的事。"獵鷹"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 赶快解决。"猎鹰"通话完毕。

Container.name: 10_Secure
Container.situation: player's team eliminated the enemies

Key.Original: Okay. Looks like that was the last of them.
Key.Chinese: 好。看來剛剛那人是他們的最後一位了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好。看来刚刚的是最后一个了。

Container.name: 05_Contact
Container.situation: player's team spots enemies at the crash site

Key.Original: Contact! Patrol just up ahead!
Key.Chinese: 接敵!前方有巡邏隊!
Key.Chinesesimp: 接敌！前方有巡逻队！

Key.Original: Find some cover and open fire!
Key.Chinese: 尋找掩護並開火射擊!
Key.Chinesesimp: 寻找掩护并开火射击！

Key.Original: You detonated the charge too early!
Key.Chinese: 你太早引爆炸藥了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你太早引爆炸药了！

Key.Original: You failed to protect the pilot!
Key.Chinese: 你沒能保護好飛行員!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你没能保护好飞行员！

Key.Original: You failed to protect the medic!
Key.Chinese: 你沒能保護好醫護兵!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你没能保护好卫生兵！

Key.Original: Close Call
Key.Chinese: 千鈞一髮
Key.Chinesesimp: 千钧一发

Key.Original:
Although unable to save the pilot - and despite being wasteful with your gear - you managed to successfully beat back an enemy patrol and destroy the wreckage. You need to plan more carefully in future, we're desperately short on supplies. At least for now, we've earned ourselves some breathing room.

However, the AAF will now be more alert to the remaining threat on their island. We'll have to act quickly before they entrench their positions.
Key.Chinese:
雖然我們不能救回飛行員-而且你浪費了你的裝備-但你仍成功擊退敵人的巡邏隊並摧毀了殘骸。下次你必須更加小心謹慎，我們的資源有限。不論如何，至少我們已經為自己贏得了一點喘息空間。

然而，阿爾蒂斯武裝力量將會更加留意島上剩下的威脅。我們要快速行動，在他們站穩腳步之前攻擊他們。
Key.Chinesesimp:
虽然我们不能救回飞行员—而且你还浪费了你的装备—但你仍成功击退敌人的巡逻队并摧毁了残骸。下次你必须更加小心谨慎，我们的资源有限。不论如何，至少我们已经为自己赢得了一点喘息空间。

然而，AAF 将会更加留意岛上剩下的威胁。我们要快速行动，在他们站稳脚步之前攻击他们。

Key.Original:
Although we failed to save the pilot's life, we managed to beat back an enemy patrol and destroy the wreckage. At least for now, we've earned ourselves some breathing room.

However, the AAF will now be more alert to the remaining threat on their island. We'll have to act quickly before they entrench their positions.
Key.Chinese:
雖然我們不能救回飛行員，但我們成功擊退敵人的巡邏隊並摧毀了殘骸。至少，我們已經為自己贏得了一點喘息空間。

然而，阿爾蒂斯武裝力量將會更加留意島上剩下的威脅。我們要快速行動，在他們站穩腳步之前攻擊他們。
Key.Chinesesimp:
虽然我们不能救回飞行员，但我们成功击退敌人的巡逻队并摧毁了残骸。至少，我们已经为自己赢得了一点喘息空间。

然而，AAF 将会更加留意岛上剩下的威胁。我们要快速行动，在他们站稳脚步之前攻击他们。

Key.Original: We're still piecing together what happened this morning, but one thing's clear: Altis Armed Forces on Stratis are hostile.%1Right now, long-range comms are down, Commander MacKinnon is confirmed KIA and whatever equipment we may have had is either halfway-scrapped or fucked entirely.%2We need to organise. Rearm. Make a plan. Take back the initiative.%3We'll split up, Alpha through Delta. I've nominated four men to lead each squad. They've agreed to operate under my coordination.%4Now, our first priority is situational awareness. Half our force will move out on recon. Another squad will dig in %5here%6 and take stock of whatever equipment we've got at hand.%7That just leaves our most pressing concern. The AAF managed to bring down a Blackfoot. It crash-landed %8dangerously close to our position%9. There's a burning wreck and smoke-stack a mile high - that's no good.%10%11Alpha%12 will secure the crash site, make a sweep for survivors, and get rid of it.
Key.Chinese: 我們仍在設法拼湊今天早上到底發生了什麼事情，但有一件事是能確定的:在斯特拉蒂斯島上的阿爾蒂斯武裝力量是敵人。%1現在，長距離的通訊已被截斷，指揮官麥金農已經確定陣亡，並且不管有什麼裝備，一定都在來的路上就被完全擊毀或報廢了。%2我們需要重整態勢。重新武裝。制定一個計劃。奪回主動權。%3我們將會分成四個隊伍，從Alpha到Delta。我已經提名四個人來領導各個小隊。而且他們也同意接受我的指揮。%4現在，我們第一要務是要了解周遭的情況。我們一半的隊伍必須出外偵察。其餘的小隊將會留守%5這裡%6，並整理我們手頭上擁有的所有裝備。%7現在我們來討論最重要且迫切的問題。阿爾蒂斯武裝力量設法擊落了一臺"黑足"。它墜落在距離我們位置%8非常接近的地方%9。它燃燒的殘骸產生了達一英里高的煙霧-這並不是件好事。%10%11Alpha%12將會肅清墜機點，搜尋生還者，並處裡掉殘骸。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们仍在设法拼凑今天早上到底发生了什么事情，但有一件事是能确定的：在斯特拉蒂斯岛上的阿尔蒂斯武装部队是敌人。%1现在，长距离的通信已被截断，指挥官麦金农已经确定阵亡，并且我们手里的装备要么是半残要么已经完全报废了。%2我们需要重整态势。重新武装。制定一个计划。夺回主动权。%3我们将会分成四个班，从 Alpha 到 Delta。我已经提名四个人来领导各班。而且他们也同意接受我的指挥。%4现在，我们第一要务是状况感知。我们一半的队伍必须出外侦察。还有一个班将会留守%5这里%6，并整理我们手头上拥有的所有装备。%7现在我们来讨论最重要且迫切的问题。AAF 设法击落了一架"黑足"。它坠落在距离我们位置%8非常接近的地方%9。它燃烧的残骸产生了达一英里高的烟雾—这并不是件好事。%10%11Alpha%12将会肃清坠机点，搜寻生还者，并处理掉残骸。

Key.Original: %1Alpha%2 - Your squad.%3%4Falcon%5 - Camp Maxwell HQ.%6%7Bravo%8 - North-west sector recon.%9%10Charlie%11 - North-east sector recon.%12%13Delta%14 - Camp Maxwell defense.
Key.Chinese: %1Alpha%2-你的小隊。%3%4"獵鷹"%5-麥克斯韋營地指揮部。%6%7Bravo%8-在西北面做偵察。%9%10Charlie%11-在東北面做偵察。%12%13Delta%14-防禦麥克斯韋營地。
Key.Chinesesimp: %1Alpha%2-你的班。%3%4"猎鹰"%5-麦克斯韦营地指挥部。%6%7Bravo%8-在西北侦察。%9%10Charlie%11-在东北侦察。%12%13Delta%14-防御麦克斯韦营地。

Key.Original: Move to %1the crash site%2 and make a sweep for survivors. Once secure, rig the wreckage, destroy it, and return to %3Maxwell%4.
Key.Chinese: 前往%1墜機點%2並搜尋生還者。一旦確定淨空後，引爆你的炸藥好來摧毀殘骸，然後返回%3麥克斯韋%4。
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往%1坠机点%2并搜寻生还者。一旦确定安全后，用炸药摧毁残骸，然后返回%3麦克斯韦%4。

Key.Original:
1. Move to %1the crash site%2.
2. Sweep for any survivors.
3. Destroy the wreckage.
4. Return to %3Camp Maxwell%4.
Key.Chinese:
1. 前往%1墜機點%2。
2. 尋找生還者。
3. 摧毀殘骸。
4. 返回%3麥克斯韋營地%4。
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 前往%1坠机点%2。
2. 寻找生还者。
3. 摧毁残骸。
4. 返回%3麦克斯韦营地%4。

Key.Original: Find Explosives
Key.Chinese: 搜尋炸藥
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜寻炸药

Key.Original: SEARCH
Key.Chinese: 搜尋
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜寻

Key.Original: Search the bodies for a demo charge.
Key.Chinese: 在那些屍體上搜尋炸藥。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在那些尸体上搜寻炸药。

Key.Original: Plant the Charge
Key.Chinese: 設置炸藥
Key.Chinesesimp: 设置炸药

Key.Original: Plant your demolition charge on %1the Blackfoot wreckage%2.
Key.Chinese: 把你的炸藥放置在%1"黑足"殘骸%2的旁邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 把你的炸药放置在%1"黑足"残骸%2的旁边。

Key.Original: Destroy the Wreckage
Key.Chinese: 摧毀殘骸
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁残骸

Key.Original: Once all elements are clear of the blast radius, detonate your charge.
Key.Chinese: 當確定殘骸附近都沒有友軍的時候，引爆你的炸藥來摧毀殘骸。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当确定残骸附近都没有友军的时候，引爆你的炸药来摧毁残骸。

Key.Original: Defend the Crash Site
Key.Chinese: 防守墜機點
Key.Chinesesimp: 防守坠机点

Key.Original: Defend %1the crash site%2 while the medic tends to the surviving pilot.
Key.Chinese: 當醫護兵在嘗試醫療飛行員的時候，請防守%1墜機點%2。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当卫生兵在尝试救治飞行员的时候，请防守%1坠机点%2。

Key.Original: Investigate the Crash Site
Key.Chinese: 調查墜機點
Key.Chinesesimp: 调查坠机点

Key.Original: One of our helicopters went down during the initial assault. Investigate %1the crash site%2.
Key.Chinese: 我們的其中一臺直升機，在最初的攻擊之時被擊墜了。請去調查%1墜機點%2。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的一架直升机在最初的攻击之时被击坠了。请去调查%1坠机点%2。

Key.Original: Report in
Key.Chinese: 報到
Key.Chinesesimp: 报到

Container.name: 350_greet_player
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Lead;EPA B Bravo Lead;EPA B Charlie Lead;EPA B Alpha Member A;EPA B Alpha Member B;
Container.situation: played when player walks nearby to the 'interactive' ai. one of the sentences get randomly selected.

Key.Original: Hi.
Key.Chinese: 嗨。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗨。

Key.Original: What's up, Kerry.
Key.Chinese: 你好嗎，克里?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你好吗，克里？

Key.Original: Hi, man.
Key.Chinese: 嗨，老兄。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗨，老兄。

Key.Original: Hello.
Key.Chinese: 哈囉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 哈啰。

Key.Original: Hey.
Key.Chinese: 嘿。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿。

Container.name: 340_armory_intro
Container.situation: played for the very 1st time player is introduced into the armory (after 1st briefing). player's gear get auto-adjusted, finishing his reload animation.

Key.Original: Alright, so that's you all set, Kerry.
Key.Chinese: 好的，這就是你的裝備了，克里。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，这就是你的装备了，克里。

Key.Original: It's the best kit we've got for the task at hand.
Key.Chinese: 這對你要執行的任務來說，已經是最好的配備了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这对你要执行的任务来说，已经是最好的配备了。

Key.Original: If you want to adjust your loadout, feel free. Your stuff is in the crate over there.
Key.Chinese: 假如你想要自訂裝備，請隨意。你可以在旁邊的箱子裡拿你要的東西。
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如你想要自定义装备，请随意。你可以在旁边的箱子里拿你要的东西。

Container.name: 330_briefing_player_late
Container.situation: played when player arrives late on the briefing.

Key.Original: Oh, nice of you to join us, Corporal.
Key.Chinese: 喔，真高興你能加入我們，下士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，真高兴你能加入我们，下士。

Key.Original: Sorry, did you need a little more time, soldier?
Key.Chinese: 抱歉，你是不是需要更多的時間，大兵?
Key.Chinesesimp: 抱歉，你是不是需要更多的时间，大兵？

Key.Original: Glad to see you finally made it, Kerry.
Key.Chinese: 真高興你終於來了，克里。
Key.Chinesesimp: 真高兴你终于来了，克里。

Container.name: 321_time_reminder_5min
Container.situation: played 5 mins before next operation briefing starts. one of the sentences get randomly played.

Key.Original: Five minutes, Kerry.
Key.Chinese: 剩5分鐘，克里。
Key.Chinesesimp: 剩5分钟，克里。

Key.Original: You've got five minutes. Get a move on.
Key.Chinese: 你只剩5分鐘了。快過來吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你只剩5分钟了。快过来吧。

Key.Original: Five minutes left, Corporal.
Key.Chinese: 剩5分鐘，下士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 剩5分钟，下士。

Container.name: 320_time_reminder_30min
Container.situation: played 30 mins before next operation briefing starts. one of the sentences get randomly played.

Key.Original: Soldier, you've got 30 minutes before you're needed back here.
Key.Chinese: 大兵，你有30分鐘的時間，之後你就得回來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 大兵，你有30分钟的时间，之后你就得回来。

Key.Original: Be advised, 30 minutes until the op.
Key.Chinese: 請注意，30分鐘後將開始任務簡報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请注意，30分钟后将开始任务简报。

Key.Original: Kerry, you've got 30 minutes. Don't be late. Out.
Key.Chinese: 克里，你有30分鐘的時間。別遲到了。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，你有30分钟的时间。别迟到了。通话完毕。

Container.name: 140_welcome_a_hub02
Container.situation: player returns to the based, half destroyed. met by delta lead again.

Key.Original: Fuck ... we didn't know if you'd make it back, Alpha.
Key.Chinese: 幹...我們不知道你們能活著回來，Alpha。
Key.Chinesesimp: 操...我们都想不到你们能活着回来，Alpha。

Key.Original: Come on then. With me.
Key.Chinese: 來吧。跟著我。
Key.Chinesesimp: 来吧。跟着我。

Key.Original: AAF hit us hard last night ... It's good to see you in one piece.
Key.Chinese: 阿爾蒂斯武裝力量在昨晚重創我們...真高興見到你們還是完整的。
Key.Chinesesimp: AAF 在昨晚重创我们...真高兴见到你们还没事。

Key.Original: We took some casualties. Gillespie. Stephenson. Couple others I didn't really know.
Key.Chinese: 我們有一些人陣亡了。吉萊斯皮。史蒂芬森。還有幾個其他我並不太熟的人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们有一些人阵亡了。吉莱斯皮。史蒂芬森。还有几个我不太熟的人。

Key.Original: Most of the rest of us are basically walking wounded.
Key.Chinese: 我們其餘的人基本上都變成了行走傷員。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们其余的人基本上都变成了行走伤员。

Key.Original: Anyway, the AAF pulled back. For now at least. Fuck knows why.
Key.Chinese: 不管如何，阿爾蒂斯武裝力量撤退了。至少現在是這樣。天知道為什麼。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不管如何，AAF 撤退了。至少现在是这样。天知道为什么。

Key.Original: As you can see ... things are pretty fucked up here.
Key.Chinese: 就你所見...這裡已經被打爆的差不多了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 就你所见...这里已经被打的差不多了。

Key.Original: So, we're moving out. Miller's called a meet. Get your shit together. Head over when you're ready.
Key.Chinese: 所以，我們準備要撤離這裡了。米勒正在準備會議。把你們自己整備好。然後就過來開會吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以，我们准备要撤离这里了。米勒正在准备会议。把你们自己整备好。然后就过来开会吧。

Key.Original: And you, Corporal Kerry, you seem to developed the habit of staying alive.
Key.Chinese: 還有你，下士克里，看起來你已經很習慣保持活著了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有你，下士克里，看起来你已经很习惯于活下来了。

Key.Original: You'll want to hold on to that.
Key.Chinese: 希望你能繼續保持下去。
Key.Chinesesimp: 希望你能继续保持。

Container.name: 120_welcome_a_hub01
Container.situation: player approaches camp maxwell for the first time. met by one of miller's men.

Key.Original: Alright, follow me.
Key.Chinese: 好的，跟我來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，跟我来。

Key.Original: For now, we're regrouping at Maxwell - whoever's left.
Key.Chinese: 現在，我們所有剩下的人正在麥克斯韋重新集結。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在，我们所有剩下的人正在麦克斯韦重新集结。

Key.Original: Get your shit together and report in when your set, Corporal.
Key.Chinese: 把你自己整理好，然後向你的長官報到，下士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 把你自己整理好，然后向你的长官报到，下士。

Key.Original: We'll try to sort out exactly what the fuck is going on.
Key.Chinese: 我們將會盡快搞清楚這到底是怎麼一回事。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们将会尽快搞清楚这到底是怎么一回事。

Key.Original: Just don't get too comfortable. You're one of the last groups we've been in contact with.
Key.Chinese: 先不要太高興。你們是我們最後聯繫上的小隊了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 先不要太高兴。你们是我们最后联系上的队伍了。

Key.Original: Captain Miller's coordinating things. Believe it or not, he's the ranking officer left on this fucking rock.
Key.Chinese: 米勒上校負責指揮這裡。信不信由你，他現在是這個島上唯一留下的高級軍官了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 米勒上校负责指挥这里。信不信由你，他现在是这个岛上的最高级军官了。

Key.Original: He's just over there ... setting up a temporary briefing area now.
Key.Chinese: 他就在那裡...正在設置一個臨時的簡報區。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他就在那里...正在设置一个临时的简报区。

Key.Original: We're pooling what little weapons and ammo we have just beside it.
Key.Chinese: 我們正在收集所有的小武器與彈藥並存放在它旁邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们正在把手里有的那点武器与弹药并存放起来。

Key.Original: It's not exactly an armory, but we need to take stock of whatever we've got left.
Key.Chinese: 嚴格來說，它並不是一個軍械庫，但我們只能盡可能的集中我們手頭上有的資源了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 严格来说，它并不是一个军械库，但我们只能尽可能的集中我们手头上有的资源了。

Key.Original: So, for now, we're divided up into four squads, Alpha through Delta.
Key.Chinese: 而現在，我們全部的人被分成了四個小隊，從Alpha到Delta。
Key.Chinesesimp: 而现在，我们全部的人被分成了四个班，从 Alpha 到 Delta。

Key.Original: I'm leading Delta - and your squad leader's just over there - Sergeant Conway's heading up Alpha, you guys must know each other.
Key.Chinese: 我領導著Delta-而你的小隊長就在那裡-中士康維領導著Alpha，你們一定互相認識了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我领导着 Delta-而你的班长就在那里—康维中士领导着 Alpha，你们一定互相认识了。

Key.Original: Anyway, Miller's got the details. A helo went down in a forest nearby. He's putting together a plan.
Key.Chinese: 先不管其他的事了，米勒接獲一個情報。一臺直升機墜落在我們的附近。他正在制定一個計劃。
Key.Chinesesimp: 多的不说，米勒知道细节。一架直升机坠落在我们的附近。他正在制定计划。

Container.name: 104_skirmish_talk_lost_gear
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Member A;EPA B Alpha Member B;
Container.situation: ambient chat about possible skirmish poi. played when linked poi gets activated and only when player is close.

Key.Original: Yeah, we had to leave a whole bunch of gear out the way.
Key.Chinese: 可惡，我們在來的路上竟然得拋下一大堆裝備。
Key.Chinesesimp: 可恶，我们在来的路上竟然得抛下一大堆装备。

Key.Original: I know, just - when we're so low on resources - seems like a damn waste.
Key.Chinese: 我知道，只是-當我們的資源很稀少的時候-那些裝備就格外令人感覺到很浪費。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我知道，只是—当我们的资源很稀少的时候—那些装备就格外令人感觉到很浪费。

Key.Original: Hey, man, no one blames you guys for that. Don't sweat it.
Key.Chinese: 嘿，老兄，並沒有任何人指責你們。別內疚了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，老兄，并没有任何人指责你们。别内疚了。

Container.name: 103_skirmish_talk_firefight
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Member A;EPA B Alpha Member B;
Container.situation: ambient chat about possible skirmish poi. played when linked poi gets activated and only when player is close.

Key.Original: Shit. Our guys okay?
Key.Chinese: 該死。我們的人還好吧?
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。我们的人还好吧？

Key.Original: Apparently there was some firefight not far from our position.
Key.Chinese: 我們正在接近某個槍戰當中，離我們的位置不遠。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听起来在离我们的位置不远的地方有交火声。

Key.Original: That's the thing. Not one of ours. At least, not anyone accounted for.
Key.Chinese: 說到重點了。並沒有我們的人。至少，沒有任何相關的回報說我們有參與在裡面。
Key.Chinesesimp: 说到重点了。不是我们的人。至少不是我们现有的人。

Container.name: 102_skirmish_talk_timed_transport
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Member A;EPA B Alpha Member B;
Container.situation: ambient chat about possible skirmish poi. played when linked poi gets activated and only when player is close.

Key.Original: There's talk about a small convoy en route to Girna.
Key.Chinese: 我聽說有一小支車隊在前往吉爾納的路上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我听说有一小支车队在前往格尔纳的路上。

Key.Original: No, a friendly one! Yes, idiot, a Greenback convoy.
Key.Chinese: 不，是友方的!幹，我是個笨蛋，的確是綠軍的車隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不，是友军的！操，我真蠢，的确是绿军的车队。

Key.Original: ... A Greenback convoy, you mean?
Key.Chinese: ...你的意思是，綠軍的車隊?
Key.Chinesesimp: ...你是说绿军的车队？

Key.Original: Huh. Probably carrying some useful shit, too.
Key.Chinese: 哈。它們可能在運送著一些有用的東西。
Key.Chinesesimp: 哈。它们可能在运送着一些有用的东西。

Container.name: 101_skirmish_talk_crashed_transport
Container.situation: ambient chat about possible skirmish poi. played when linked poi gets activated and only when player is close.

Key.Original: Yeah, Charlie reports that they spotted one of our trucks when they were on recon.
Key.Chinese: 恩，Charlie回報他們在偵察的時候，發現了一輛我方的卡車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 恩，Charlie 报告说他们在侦察时发现了一辆我方的卡车。

Key.Original: Said it looked pretty intact, but they had to pull back before they could investigate.
Key.Chinese: 它看起來相當完整，但是在他們可以進行進一步調查之前，就被叫回來了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 它看起来相当完整，但是他们在进行进一步调查之前就被叫回来了。

Container.name: 100_skirmish_talk_crashed_helicopter
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Member A;EPA B Alpha Member B;
Container.situation: ambient chat about possible skirmish poi. played when linked poi gets activated and only when player is close.

Key.Original: Apparently someone managed to get off a lucky shot on one of their choppers.
Key.Chinese: 看來有人曾嘗試甩掉向他們射擊的飛彈。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看来有个幸运儿成功打中了他们的直升机。

Key.Original: Yeah, hit the deck somewhere to up north.
Key.Chinese: 恩，你看看被打中的地方，離機身還有好一段距離。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，那飞机就坠毁在北边不知什么地方了。

Key.Original: Oh, yeah?
Key.Chinese: 喔，怎說?
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，怎么讲？

Key.Original: Right.. wonder if the wreck's still intact.
Key.Chinese: 原來..難怪殘骸還如此完整。
Key.Chinesesimp: 原来..残骸可能还是完整的吧。

Container.name: 093_ambient_special_03
Container.participants: EPA B Charlie Lead;EPA B Alpha Lead;
Container.situation: for use in a_in, rogain.

Key.Original: C'mon, it's hardly like it's a surprise.
Key.Chinese: 拜託，事情會搞到這樣並不意外。
Key.Chinesesimp: 拜托，如果真这样也没什么好奇怪的。

Key.Original: The economy's been in the tank for a decade - at least.
Key.Chinese: 至少我們的經濟在這十年間一直在賠。
Key.Chinesesimp: 至少我们的经济在这十年间一直在赔。

Key.Original: How did things get this fucked, anyway?
Key.Chinese: 話說，為什麼現在的狀況會如此糟糕?
Key.Chinesesimp: 话说，为什么现在的状况会如此糟糕？

Key.Original: Not our call any more.
Key.Chinese: 這已經由不得我們了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这已经由不得我们了。

Key.Original: They got jobs. Growth. Influence. Fucking... China, man.
Key.Chinese: 他們得到了工作。實力變強。越來越有影響力。幹...該死的中國，老兄。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们有工作。经济增长。影响力。操...该死的中国，老兄。

Key.Original: Yeah, but CSAT? How'd we ever let that happen, you know?
Key.Chinese: 是阿，但是廣協同盟?為什麼我們會讓他發生，你知道嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊，但是广协？为什么我们能眼睁睁看着这发生啊？

Container.name: 092_ambient_special_02
Container.participants: EPA B Charlie Lead;EPA B Alpha Lead;
Container.situation: for use in a_in, rogain.

Key.Original: The Brits are broke, man. Everyone knows it.
Key.Chinese: 英國人破產了，老兄。大家都知道這點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 英国人破产了，老兄。大家都知道。

Key.Original: They can't even afford to defend their pointless little islands any more.
Key.Chinese: 他們甚至負擔不起防禦一座毫無意義的小島嶼。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们甚至没钱防御一座毫无意义的小岛屿。

Key.Original: If it's their goddamn problem, where the hell are they?
Key.Chinese: 如果這是他們該死的問題，那他們人現在到底是在哪裡?
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果这是他们的倒霉问题，那他们的人现在又特么在哪儿？

Key.Original: Why d'you think we're shipping out? We did our time. We kept our peace.
Key.Chinese: 那你認為為什麼我們要離開了?我們已經盡了責任。我們保持我們的和平。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那为什么你认为我们要离开了？我们已经尽了责任。我们保持我们的和平。

Key.Original: Now we get to go play with the big boys in the Pacific.
Key.Chinese: 現在該是去跟太平洋的大傢伙玩玩了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在该是去跟太平洋的大家伙玩玩了。

Key.Original: So why do we get stuck with them?
Key.Chinese: 那麼，為什麼我們會被他們卡在這裡?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那么，为什么我们会被他们卡在这里？

Container.name: 091_ambient_special_01
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Member A;EPA B Alpha Member B;
Container.situation: for use in a_in, lz connor.

Key.Original: I thought we were supposed to be broke, though?
Key.Chinese: 我以為我們會被打爆，不過?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我曾以为我们也会破产，不过嘛？

Key.Original: I mean... the military - we're staring down the barrel of a conflict in the Pacific - and we're junking our vehicles?
Key.Chinese: 我的意思是...我們的軍隊在太平洋的衝突中每況愈下-而我們竟然只是在這邊拆掉自己的載具?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我是说...军事问题，我们在太平洋已经要擦枪走火了—而此时我们还要报废掉这些车子？

Key.Original: How's that meant to make any sense?
Key.Chinese: 這話怎說?
Key.Chinesesimp: 这有什么道理？

Key.Original: I don't follow, man.
Key.Chinese: 我不明白，老兄。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不明白，老兄。

Key.Original: True.
Key.Chinese: 真的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 真的。

Key.Original: Well, it's not that simple.
Key.Chinese: 不過，事情也不是這麼簡單。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过，事情也不是这么简单。

Key.Original: It probably costs more to ship this shit anywhere.
Key.Chinese: 我們可能需要更多的船才有可能載送這些東西到別的地方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们可能需要更多的船才有可能载送这些东西到别的地方。

Key.Original: Plus - you gotta admit - it's kinda dated, too. At this point, it's worth more as scrap.
Key.Chinese: 而且-你得承認-他們確實也有點過時了。因為這點，他們值得被拆掉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 而且—你得承认—他们确实也有点过时了。因为这点，他们值得被拆掉。

Key.Original: And we're sure as hell not about to hand it over to the Greenbacks.
Key.Chinese: 而且打死我們也不會把這些東西送給綠軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 而且打死我们也不会把这些东西送给绿军。

Container.name: 090_ambient_special_00
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Member A;EPA B Alpha Member B;
Container.situation: for use in a_in, lz connor.

Key.Original: Wait, what's the assignment today?
Key.Chinese: 等等，今天的工作分配是什麼?
Key.Chinesesimp: 等等，今天的工作分配是什么？

Key.Original: What, we're on that for the whole week?
Key.Chinese: 啥，我們已經做了整整一個禮拜了?
Key.Chinesesimp: 啥，我们已经做了整整一个礼拜了？

Key.Original: ...I literally cannot wait to get off this fucking rock.
Key.Chinese: ...我真等不及可以快點離開這該死的島了。
Key.Chinesesimp: ...我真等不及可以快点离开这该死的岛了。

Key.Original: Just the same shit as yesterday, man. Vehicle tear-down.
Key.Chinese: 就跟昨天一樣，老兄。還是該死的拆除載具。
Key.Chinesesimp: 就跟昨天一样，老兄。还是特么的拆车子。

Key.Original: Yup. At least until the contractors get here, we're the junkyard dogs.
Key.Chinese: 是啊。至少要做到有人來交接為止，我們根本是垃圾場裡的狗。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊。至少要做到有人来交接为止，我们根本是垃圾场里的狗。

Container.name: 080_ambient_talk_10
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Member A;EPA B Alpha Member B;
Container.situation: ambient chat, played randomly by soldiers on hub, when player is close.

Key.Original: I dunno... I just hope Captain Miller knows what the hell he's doing.
Key.Chinese: 我不知道...我只希望米勒上校知道他自己在做些什麼。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不知道...我只希望米勒上校知道他自己在做些什么。

Key.Original: Yeah, and that's what worries me.
Key.Chinese: 恩，而那正是我所擔心的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 恩，而那正是我所担心的。

Key.Original: We don't really have much other choice right now.
Key.Chinese: 我們現在沒有太多其它的選擇了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们现在没有太多其它的选择了。

Container.name: 079_ambient_talk_09
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Member A;EPA B Alpha Member B;
Container.situation: ambient chat, played randomly by soldiers on hub, when player is close.

Key.Original: An end goal's one thing - just not getting killed right now is fine by me.
Key.Chinese: 對我來說最終的目標只有一個-那就是不要被殺死。
Key.Chinesesimp: 对我来说最终的目标只有一个—那就是不要被杀死。

Key.Original: But what's the end goal, you know?
Key.Chinese: 但是最終的目標是什麼，你知道嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 但是最终的目标是什么，你知道吗？

Key.Original: Sure, man, but - without full NATO support - just feels like we're just pissing into the wind.
Key.Chinese: 當然，老兄，但是-在沒有北約完整的支援下-感覺我們隨時都會隨風而去。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当然，老兄，但是—在没有北约的全面支援下—感觉我们随时都会随风而去。

Container.name: 078_ambient_talk_08
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Member A;EPA B Alpha Member B;
Container.situation: ambient chat, played randomly by soldiers on hub, when player is close.

Key.Original: You know this whole place used to be British?
Key.Chinese: 你知道這整個地方原本是屬於英國人的嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你知道这整个地方原本是属于英国人的吗？

Key.Original: Yeah.
Key.Chinese: 是的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的。

Key.Original: Like a colony or some shit?
Key.Chinese: 就像是殖民地或者其他東西?
Key.Chinesesimp: 就像是殖民地或者其他东西？

Key.Original: Shit. Figures.
Key.Chinese: 該死。我想通了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。我想通了。

Key.Original: Of course we'd be cleaning up their mess now.
Key.Chinese: 理所當然現在我們得為他們清理爛攤子。
Key.Chinesesimp: 理所当然现在我们得为他们清理烂摊子。

Container.name: 077_ambient_talk_07
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Member A;EPA B Alpha Member B;
Container.situation: ambient chat, played randomly by soldiers on hub, when player is close.

Key.Original: Greenbacks were getting cocky for a while, though.
Key.Chinese: 綠軍他們最近變得越來越如坐針氈了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 绿军他们最近变得越来越如坐针毡了。

Key.Original: Us pulling out, CSAT at their back, Europe, fucking... nowhere.
Key.Chinese: 我們要撤走了，廣協同盟在後面虎視眈眈，而歐洲，幹...就別提了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们要撤走了，广协在后面虎视眈眈，而欧洲，操...什么用都派不上。

Key.Original: True. Sometimes all you need is one loose trigger for a flashpoint, though...
Key.Chinese: 的確。有時候，你只需要不小心按到板機來作為一個衝突引爆點...
Key.Chinesesimp: 的确。有时候只需要不小心扣到扳机就会点燃冲突的导火索...

Key.Original: Yeah, they've been a giant pain in the ass for months, man, but...
Key.Chinese: 是阿，這幾個月的變化對他們來說真的很痛苦，老兄，但是...
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊，几个月来那里一直是如骨鲠在喉，老兄，但是...

Key.Original: Well, you know, there's a difference between that and war.
Key.Chinese: 恩，你知道的，那與戰爭還是有一點差別。
Key.Chinesesimp: 恩，但你知道，那与战争还是有一点差别。

Key.Original: Yeah. Maybe this whole thing's one big misunderstanding.
Key.Chinese: 是阿。或許這整件事情就是一件天大的誤會。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊。或许这整件事情就是一件天大的误会。

Container.name: 076_ambient_talk_06
Container.situation: ambient chat, played randomly by soldiers on hub, when player is close.

Key.Original: Jesus... We were just here to break down some vehicles... Tear down some bases.
Key.Chinese: 天殺的...我們在這裡只是為了分解一些載具...拆除掉一些基地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的...我们在这里只是为了拆解一些车辆...拆除掉一些基地。

Key.Original: When I heard I wasn't gonna be drafted back out to the Pacific, I couldn't believe my luck.
Key.Chinese: 當我聽到我不用被調回太平洋的時候，我真不敢相信我的好運。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当我听到我不用被调回太平洋的时候，我真不敢相信我的好运。

Key.Original: Dunno what the hell I must have done to end up here now. Fucking Karma, man.
Key.Chinese: 真不知道為什麼現在我會落到這裡處理這些事情。去他媽的因果報應，混蛋。
Key.Chinesesimp: 真不知道为什么现在我会落到这里处理这些事情。去他妈的因果报应，混蛋。

Container.name: 075_ambient_talk_05
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Member A;EPA B Alpha Member B;
Container.situation: ambient chat, played randomly by soldiers on hub, when player is close.

Key.Original: What do you mean?
Key.Chinese: 你意思是?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你意思是？

Key.Original: Well, everything's so lethal. So 'on target'. You know?
Key.Chinese: 恩，所有事情都這麼的致命。這麼的'目標導向'。你知道嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 恩，所有事情都这么的致命。这么的'目标导向'。你知道吗？

Key.Original: Maybe we should have seen it coming, you know?
Key.Chinese: 或許我們早該知道這會發生了，你覺得呢?
Key.Chinesesimp: 或许我们早该知道这会发生了，你觉得呢？

Key.Original: Makes me wonder how much longer we can actually hold out.
Key.Chinese: 這讓我很懷疑，我們到底還能撐多久。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这让我很怀疑，我们到底还能撑多久。

Key.Original: Fucking... Greenbacks, man, butchering half their own population during the conflict?
Key.Chinese: 他媽的...綠軍，天啊，在衝突期間竟然屠殺了自己的國民超過一半以上?
Key.Chinesesimp: 他妈的...绿军，天啊，在冲突期间竟然屠杀了自己半数以上的国民？

Key.Original: Civil war's one thing - that was just - I dunno.
Key.Chinese: 內戰是一回事-但這件事-我不知道。
Key.Chinesesimp: 内战是一回事—但这件事—我不知道。

Key.Original: Yeah, I get it, man.
Key.Chinese: 恩，我知道了，老兄。
Key.Chinesesimp: 恩，我知道了，老兄。

Container.name: 074_ambient_talk_04
Container.situation: ambient chat, played randomly by soldiers on hub, when player is close.

Key.Original: I'm going to feel a lot better once we actually get comms with command back online.
Key.Chinese: 在可以重新與指揮部通訊後，我的感覺才可能好點些。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在可以重新与指挥部通信后，我的感觉才可能好点些。

Key.Original: Who knows what's going on out there, you know?
Key.Chinese: 天曉得現在外面的情況如何，你說是不是?
Key.Chinesesimp: 天晓得现在外面的情况如何，你说是不是？

Key.Original: I mean, it could be World War 3 for all we know...
Key.Chinese: 我的意思是，現在外面可能已經在打第三次世界大戰了...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的意思是，现在外面可能已经在打第三次世界大战了...

Container.name: 073_ambient_talk_03
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Member A;EPA B Alpha Member B;
Container.situation: ambient chat, played randomly by soldiers on hub, when player is close.

Key.Original: And who the hell is this Miller guy anyway?
Key.Chinese: 話說這個叫米勒的傢伙到底是什麼來歷?
Key.Chinesesimp: 话说这个叫米勒的家伙到底是什么来历？

Key.Original: Yeah, I mean sure, 'CTRG'. Whatever the fuck that means.
Key.Chinese: 恩，可能吧，'戰研大隊'。天曉得那是什麼意思。
Key.Chinesesimp: 恩，可能吧，'战研大队'。天晓得那是什么意思。

Key.Original: For all I know, he's the royal fucking janitor.
Key.Chinese: 就我所知，他是皇家他媽的傳令人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 就我所知，他是皇家他妈的传令人。

Key.Original: I dunno. Special Forces. SBS or some shit, man.
Key.Chinese: 我不知道。特種部隊。英國皇家海軍特戰隊或其他東西，老兄。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不知道。特种部队。特种舟艇大队或什么玩意儿的，老兄。

Key.Original: And it's like... who died and made him king?
Key.Chinese: 而且這就像是...是因為誰死了而讓他擁有指揮權?
Key.Chinesesimp: 而且这就像是...是因为谁死了而让他拥有指挥权？

Key.Original: Sure, you're right. It's just that accent, you know? Gets right up my nose.
Key.Chinese: 是啊，你說的沒錯。你聽我這口音，有像他嗎?只要多用鼻子發點鼻音。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊，你说的没错。你听我这口音，有像他吗？只要多用鼻子发点鼻音。

Key.Original: MacKinnon.
Key.Chinese: 麥金農。
Key.Chinesesimp: 麦金农。

Key.Original: And - to be fair to the guy - he's kept us alive this far.
Key.Chinese: 但-憑良心講-也是因為有他我們才能活這麼久。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但—凭良心讲—也是因为有他我们才能活这么久。

Key.Original: I hear that, man, I hear that...
Key.Chinese: 我聽到了，老兄，我聽到了...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我听到了，老兄，我听到了...

Container.name: 072_ambient_talk_02
Container.situation: ambient chat, played randomly by soldiers on hub, when player is close.

Key.Original: Who fired first? Shit... gotta be Greenback.
Key.Chinese: 是誰先開火的?該死...肯定是綠軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是谁先开火的？该死...肯定是绿军。

Key.Original: I mean, they were twitchy. Something to do with MacKinnon.
Key.Chinese: 我的意思是，他們之前很焦躁不安。有某樣東西做掉了麥金農。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的意思是，他们之前很焦躁不安。可能跟麦金农有关。

Key.Original: You know, yeah, you used to hearing about that green-on-blue shit, but, Christ... not for a good decade, at least.
Key.Chinese: 你知道，是阿，你曾經聽到過綠對藍的該死訊息，但是，天殺的...這至少有10年沒發生過了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你知道，是啊，你曾经听到过绿对蓝的该死信息，但是，天杀的...这至少有10年没发生过了。

Key.Original: I just can't see what the fuck they were thinking.
Key.Chinese: 我只是不能想像他們當時到底在想些什麼。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我只是不能想像他们当时到底在想些什么。

Key.Original: Something's missing. I dunno...
Key.Chinese: 整件事缺少了某樣事實。我不知道...
Key.Chinesesimp: 整件事缺少了某一环。我不知道...

Container.name: 071_ambient_talk_01
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Member A;EPA B Alpha Member B;
Container.situation: ambient chat, played randomly by soldiers on hub, when player is close.

Key.Original: Well, I heard it all kicked off up at Kamino.
Key.Chinese: 那個，我聽到了一切在卡米諾的開端。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那个，我听说一切都是从卡米诺开始的。

Key.Original: Yeah - comms were fucked, though - could barely make out the messages.
Key.Chinese: 恩-通訊被截斷，真的-幾乎不能放出訊息。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯—通信被截断，真的—信息根本发不出去。

Key.Original: Oh, yeah?
Key.Chinese: 喔，怎樣了?
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，怎样了？

Key.Original: Right, I heard that. It was a mess. Fuckin' Greenbacks, man...
Key.Chinese: 是阿，我聽過了。那真是一團混亂。去他狗娘養的綠軍，混蛋...
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊，我听过了。那真是一团混乱。去他狗娘养的绿军，混蛋...

Container.name: 070_ambient_talk_00
Container.participants: EPA B Alpha Member A;EPA B Alpha Member B;
Container.situation: ambient chat, played randomly by soldiers on hub, when player is close.

Key.Original: Christ. Where the hell are our reinforcements?
Key.Chinese: 天殺的。我們的援軍到底在哪裡?
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的。我们的援军到底在哪里？

Key.Original: Your guess is as good as mine, man...
Key.Chinese: 你的問題同樣也是我的問題，老兄...
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的问题同样也是我的问题，老兄...

Container.name: 055_a_out_briefing
Container.situation: briefing played by miller.

Key.Original: I know things don't look good for us right now. We took a hit. We lost a number of good men.
Key.Chinese: 我知道現在的狀況看來不是倒向我們這邊。我們遭受打擊。我們失去了好幾名優秀的人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我知道现在的状况看来不是倒向我们这边。我们遭受打击。我们失去了好几名优秀的人。

Key.Original: Now, nothing I've got to say will change that fact, but I do have new information.
Key.Chinese: 現在，不管我說什麼都改變不了這個事實，不過我確實有個新消息。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在，不管我说什么都改变不了这个事实，不过我确实有个新消息。

Key.Original: Good luck, gentlemen.
Key.Chinese: 祝好運，先生們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 祝好运，先生们。

Key.Original: Late last night Delta managed to establish temporary long-range contact with NATO MEDCOM.
Key.Chinese: 昨天深夜，Delta成功建立起臨時的長距離通訊，並與北約的地中海司令部接上了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 昨天深夜，Delta 成功建立起临时的长距离通信，并与北约的地中海司令部接上了。

Key.Original: Reinforcements are inbound.
Key.Chinese: 援軍正在趕來了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 援军正在赶来了。

Key.Original: We need to lay the groundwork for a full invasion. They need an established foothold, not a broken down base hidden in the woods.
Key.Chinese: 我們需要為入侵行動打下良好的基礎。他們需要一個堅固的立足點，而不是一座隱藏在森林裡並毀損的基地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们需要为入侵行动打下良好的基础。他们需要一个坚固的立足点，而不是一座隐藏在森林里并毁损的基地。

Key.Original: I say we attack now. We catch the AAF off-guard. We hold the ground we seize.
Key.Chinese: 我說我們現在就必須要攻擊。我們抓住阿爾蒂斯武裝力量放鬆警戒的時候。我們要堅守住我們肅清的每一塊地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我说我们现在就必须要攻击。我们抓住 AAF 放松警戒的时候。我们要坚守住我们肃清的每一块地。

Key.Original: I'll lead Delta behind enemy lines and take up an advanced position to the North of Agia Marina.
Key.Chinese: 我將會帶領Delta深入敵後，前往聖馬里納的北方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我将会带领 Delta 深入敌后，前往圣马里纳的北方。

Key.Original: Alpha and Bravo will lead the main assault on the military range, while Charlie hit Camp Rogain and contain any counter-attack that might flank our main assault.
Key.Chinese: Alpha和Bravo將會對軍用靶場發起主要攻擊，同時Charlie將會攻擊羅根營地並確保不會有任何反擊會碰觸到我們主攻擊的後翼。
Key.Chinesesimp: Alpha 和 Bravo 将会对军用靶场发起主要攻击，同时 Charlie 将会攻击罗根营地并阻截任何可能针对主要突击侧翼的反击。

Key.Original: Once the range is secure, we'll converge on the town and entrench our position.
Key.Chinese: 在靶場被肅清之後，我們將會在城鎮裡會合並鞏固我們的位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在靶场被肃清之后，我们将会在城镇里会合并巩固我们的位置。

Key.Original: I'll go through the exact details of the plan with each individual squad leader. They'll bring the rest of their men up to speed.
Key.Chinese: 我將會再跟各個隊長核對具體細節。他們會在個別通知各小隊成員。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我将会再跟各班核对具体细节。他们会再个别通知各班成员。

Container.name: 050_a_m05_briefing
Container.situation: briefing played by miller.

Key.Original: Ok, listen up.
Key.Chinese: 好，聽好了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好，听好了。

Key.Original: Recon reports indicate that the AAF will make a push south in the next few hours. It appears they're keen to lock down the area around Girna.
Key.Chinese: 偵察報告指出，阿爾蒂斯武裝力量將會在接下來的幾個小時向南推進。而且他們正封鎖吉爾納的四周。
Key.Chinesesimp: 侦察报告指出，AAF 将会在接下来的几个小时向南推进。而且他们正封锁格尔纳的四周。

Key.Original: Intel suggests that the highest-ranking officer on Stratis will himself be in the area. Neutralising him will deal a serious blow to our enemy.
Key.Chinese: 情報表明，該區將會出現敵軍在斯特拉蒂斯島上最高軍階的軍官。幹掉他將會帶給我們敵人一個重重的打擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 情报表明，该区将会出现敌军在斯特拉蒂斯岛上最高军衔的军官。干掉他将给我们敌人带来沉重打击。

Key.Original: Decapitating their command structure may even signal an end to this whole situation.
Key.Chinese: 殺掉他們的指揮官可能還可以讓這整件事情結束也說不定。
Key.Chinesesimp: 杀掉他们的指挥官或许还可能让这整件事情结束。

Key.Original: We simply cannot let this opportunity pass us by, gentlemen.
Key.Chinese: 我們不能讓這機會流失，先生們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们不能坐失良机，先生们。

Key.Original: Now, we've come up with a plan of action. My team has a submersible stashed just off the west coast.
Key.Chinese: 現在，我們制定出了一個計劃。我的小隊藏匿了一臺潛水艇在西海岸邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在，我们制定出了一个计划。我的小组在西海岸藏匿了一台潜水艇。

Key.Original: That's why we asked for volunteers - those with diving experience.
Key.Chinese: 這就是為什麼要徵求志願者-那些有潛水經驗的人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这就是为什么要征求志愿者—那些有潜水经验的人。

Key.Original: One of my men, Lieutenant James here, will use it to lead a small team and insert just north of Girna.
Key.Chinese: 我的其中一個手下，上尉詹姆斯，將會帶領一小支隊伍潛入吉爾納的北方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的其中一个手下，詹姆斯上尉，将会带领一小支队伍潜入格尔纳的北方。

Key.Original: Meanwhile, Bravo will circle around and take up a position to the south. Once both teams are in place, we close the trap.
Key.Chinese: 同時，Bravo將會從南方的位置進行包圍。當兩隊都就定位的時候，我們就可以收網釣大魚了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 同时，Bravo 将会从南方的位置进行包围。当两队都就定位的时候，我们就可以收网钓大鱼了。

Key.Original: Alright, let's set this in motion. Dismissed.
Key.Chinese: 好的，讓我們付諸行動吧。解散。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，让我们付诸行动吧。解散。

Container.name: 045_a_m04_briefing
Container.situation: briefing played by miller.

Key.Original: We've struck some fairly significant blows against the AAF. They've been weakened.
Key.Chinese: 我們已經對阿爾蒂斯武裝力量做出了一些重大的打擊。他們現在已被削弱。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们已经给予了 AAF 一系列重大打击。他们现在已被削弱。

Key.Original: We only have a small window of opportunity to exploit that fact, though, before they're reinforced.
Key.Chinese: 趁他們重新整備好之前，我們有一個機會可以好好利用。
Key.Chinesesimp: 趁他们重新整备好之前，我们有一个机会可以好好利用。

Key.Original: It's also become clear that we're running short on ammo and supplies. We've got the momentum, but we risk stretching ourselves thin, gentlemen.
Key.Chinese: 相信大家也很清楚，我們的彈藥與物資快要用完了。我們現在正在勢頭上，但很快也就沒有了，先生們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 相信大家也很清楚，我们的弹药与物资快要用完了。我们现在有主动权，但我们也在冒险过度延伸，先生们。

Key.Original: Fortunately, an opportunity has presented itself. We've managed to re-establish communication with a contact that has ties to the local guerrillas.
Key.Chinese: 幸運的是，一個機會向我們展開了雙臂。我們已經重新與當地的游擊隊搭上線。
Key.Chinesesimp: 幸运的是，一个机会向我们展开了双臂。我们已经重新与当地的游击队建立联系。

Key.Original: It's a small cell. Part of a larger network of resistance on the Altis mainland. They call themselves the F-I-A. 'Fee-ah'.
Key.Chinese: 他們是個分部。屬於阿爾蒂斯主島上反抗軍的一部分。他們稱呼自己為自由獨立同盟F-I-A。'Fee-ah'。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们是阿尔蒂斯主岛上抵抗力量网络的一个小分部。他们称呼自己为 FIAF-I-A。'Fee-ah'。

Key.Original: In the wake of the AAF attack, our contact - goes by the name 'Nikos' - set up an ammunition dump somewhere near LZ Connor.
Key.Chinese: 在阿爾蒂斯武裝力量發動攻擊之後，我們的線人-其名稱為'尼科斯'-設置了一處彈藥庫在康納著陸區附近。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在 AAF 发动攻击之后，我们的线人—名为'尼科斯'-在康纳着陆区附近设置了一处弹药储存点。

Key.Original: He's offering to, well, share it, in a manner of speaking.
Key.Chinese: 他通過對話說要提供，這個，分享他的資源。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他同意，怎么讲，分享他的资源。

Key.Original: Now, we've agreed to link up just south of here.
Key.Chinese: 現在，我們已經同意與他在南方的位置碰頭。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在，我们已经同意与他在南方的位置碰头。

Key.Original: Meet with him, secure some supplies, and RTB. Be on your guard and good luck.
Key.Chinese: 跟他碰面，確保物資，然後返回基地。保持緊戒，祝好運。
Key.Chinesesimp: 跟他碰面，确保物资，然后返回基地。保持紧戒，祝好运。

Container.name: 040_a_m03_briefing
Container.situation: briefing played by miller.

Key.Original: As I'm sure you're all well aware, comms are still down.
Key.Chinese: 正如你們一直很關心的，通訊仍然是斷的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我相信你们都同样关心，通信仍然处于被切断状态。

Key.Original: Efforts to restore contact with NATO MEDCOM have, thus far, proven fruitless.
Key.Chinese: 我們一直努力與北約的地中海司令部進行聯繫，但到目前為止，都是徒勞無功的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们一直努力与北约地中海司令部进行联系，但到目前为止始终徒劳无功。

Key.Original: The rest of you, get set. Dismissed.
Key.Chinese: 剩下的人，去準備好裝備。解散。
Key.Chinesesimp: 剩下的人，去准备好装备。解散。

Key.Original: The plain truth is, gentlemen - with the AAF regrouping - we must re-establish a link soon.
Key.Chinese: 計劃很明顯，先生們-由於阿爾蒂斯武裝力量正在重新集結-所以我們必須加快聯繫外援的動作。
Key.Chinesesimp: 计划很明显，先生们—由于 AAF 正在重新集结—所以我们必须加快联系外援的动作。

Key.Original: Now, aside from the airbase, Mike-26 is probably the most hi-tech installation on Stratis.
Key.Chinese: 現在，除了空軍基地，Mike-26可能是斯特拉蒂斯島上唯一裝有高科技裝備的地方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在，除了空军基地，Mike-26可能是斯特拉蒂斯岛上唯一装有高科技设备的地方。

Key.Original: It's also one of the most strategically valuable positions on the island.
Key.Chinese: 它也是島上其中一處最具戰略價值的位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 它也是岛上其中一处最具战略价值的位置。

Key.Original: It's a risk, but hitting the facility will deal a serious blow to the AAF, and - if anywhere holds an opportunity to re-open com channels - it's there.
Key.Chinese: 這風險很高，但打擊這個設施將會重重的打擊阿爾蒂斯武裝力量，並且-假如有任何機會可以重新連繫上通訊頻道-這就是了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这风险很高，但打击这个设施将会重重的打击 AAF，并且—假如有任何机会可以重新连系上通信频道—那就是它了。

Key.Original: This will be a coordinated effort.
Key.Chinese: 此次行動將由大家共同合作。
Key.Chinesesimp: 此次行动将由大家共同合作。

Key.Original: Charlie will set up a mortar. Alpha will provide overwatch and mark priority targets.
Key.Chinese: Charlie將會設置迫擊砲。Alpha則會提供觀測並標記優先目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: Charlie 将会设置迫击炮。Alpha 则会提供观测并标记优先目标。

Key.Original: We'll strike hard from distance and - together with Bravo - move in quickly, holding the position against any potential counter-attack.
Key.Chinese: 我們將從一定的距離外嚴重打擊他們-然後再與Bravo一同快速進入，堅守陣地並排除所有潛在的反擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们将从一定的距离外狠狠打击他们—然后再与 Bravo 一同快速突入，坚守阵地并阻止所有潜在的反击。

Key.Original: Ok, squad leaders, form on me. I'll share some extra details.
Key.Chinese: 好，各隊長，跟我來。我再跟你們分享一些額外的細節。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好，各班长，跟我来。我再跟你们分享一些额外的细节。

Container.name: 035_a_m02_briefing
Container.situation: briefing played by miller.

Key.Original: As you're probably aware, we've been scouting positions to our north, keeping tabs on enemy movement.
Key.Chinese: 正如你們所知，我們已經偵察了我們位置的北方，持續留意敵人的動向。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正如你们所知，我们已经侦察了我们位置的北方，持续留意敌人的动向。

Key.Original: Unfortunately, Bravo ran into trouble, taking contact in a village a little to the west of our position.
Key.Chinese: 不幸的是，Bravo陷入了麻煩，與敵人在我們西方不遠處的村莊中交戰。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不幸的是，Bravo 陷入了麻烦，与敌人在我们西方不远处的村庄中交战。

Key.Original: They're pinned down and need our support, gentlemen.
Key.Chinese: 他們被壓制，並且需要我們的支援，先生們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们被压制，并且需要我们的支援，先生们。

Key.Original: Now, an advanced element has already set up a position nearby to get eyes on the situation.
Key.Chinese: 現在，一個偵察員已經被派遣到前線去了解狀況。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在，一个先遣分队已经被派遣到前线去了解状况。

Key.Original: AAF units have mobilized along the valley leading to the village. More support is no doubt en route.
Key.Chinese: 阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的部隊正沿著山谷前往村莊。無疑的，更多的支援正在路上了。
Key.Chinesesimp: AAF 正沿着山谷前往村庄。无疑的，更多的支援正在路上了。

Key.Original: Alpha will approach from the east. Use the high ground and forest cover to your advantage.
Key.Chinese: Alpha將從東方靠近。利用制高點與森林來創造你們的優勢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Alpha 将从东面靠近。利用制高点与森林来创造你们的优势。

Key.Original: Clear the village and get our boys out of there.
Key.Chinese: 肅清村莊並帶我們的兄弟離開那裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清村庄并带我们的兄弟离开那里。

Key.Original: Okay. Regroup and report in.
Key.Chinese: 好的。重新集結並報到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的。重新集结并报到。

Container.name: 030_a_m01_briefing
Container.situation: briefing played by miller.

Key.Original: We're still piecing together what happened this morning, but one thing's clear: Altis Armed Forces on Stratis are hostile.
Key.Chinese: 我們仍在設法拼湊今天早上到底發生了什麼事情，但有一件事是能確定的:在斯特拉蒂斯島上的阿爾蒂斯武裝力量是敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们仍在设法拼凑今天早上到底发生了什么事情，但有一件事是能确定的：在斯特拉蒂斯岛上的阿尔蒂斯武装部队是敌人。

Key.Original: Right now, long-range comms are down, Commander MacKinnon is confirmed KIA, and whatever equipment we may have had is either halfway-scrapped or wrecked entirely.
Key.Chinese: 現在，長距離的通訊已被截斷，指揮官麥金農已經確定陣亡，並且不管有什麼裝備，一定都在來的路上就被完全擊毀或報廢了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在，长距离的通信已被截断，指挥官麦金农已经确定阵亡，并且我们手里的装备要么是半残要么已经完全报废了。

Key.Original: Alright. Let's move out, gentlemen.
Key.Chinese: 好。我們行動吧，先生們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好。我们行动吧，先生们。

Key.Original: We need to organise. Rearm. Make a plan. Take back the initiative.
Key.Chinese: 我們需要重整態勢。重新武裝。制定一個計劃。奪回主動權。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们需要重整态势。重新武装。制定一个计划。夺回主动权。

Key.Original: We'll split up. I've nominated three men - Conway, Lacey and Mitchell - to each lead a squad, Alpha through Charlie.
Key.Chinese: 我們必須分隊伍。我提名三名人員-康維，萊西和米徹爾-各自帶領一個小隊，從Alpha到Charlie。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们必须分队伍。我提名三名人员—康维，莱西和米彻尔—各自带领一个班，从 Alpha 到 Charlie。

Key.Original: My own team will operate as Delta under the command of Lt. James.
Key.Chinese: 我的小隊將會變成Delta，並交由上尉詹姆斯來指揮。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的小组将会变成 Delta，并交由詹姆斯上尉来指挥。

Key.Original: Now, our first priority is situational awareness. Half our force will move out on recon.
Key.Chinese: 現在，我們第一要務是要了解周遭的情況。我們一半的隊伍必須出外偵察。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在，我们第一要务是态势感知。我们一半的队伍必须出外侦察。

Key.Original: Another squad will dig in here and take stock of whatever equipment we've got at hand.
Key.Chinese: 其餘的小隊將會留守這裡，並整理我們手頭上擁有的所有裝備。
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有一个班留守这里，并整理我们手头上拥有的所有装备。

Key.Original: That just leaves our most pressing concern.
Key.Chinese: 現在我們來討論最重要且迫切的問題。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在我们来讨论最重要且迫切的问题。

Key.Original: The AAF managed to bring down a Blackfoot. It crash-landed dangerously close to our position. There's a burning wreck and smoke-stack a mile high - that's no good.
Key.Chinese: 阿爾蒂斯武裝力量設法擊落了一臺"黑足"。它墜落在距離我們位置非常接近的地方。它燃燒的殘骸產生了達一英里高的煙霧-這並不是件好事。
Key.Chinesesimp: AAF 设法击落了一架"黑足"。它坠落在与我位置非常接近的地方。它燃烧的残骸产生了达一英里高的烟雾—这并不是件好事。

Key.Original: Alpha will secure the crash site, make a sweep for survivors, and get rid of it. Questions?
Key.Chinese: Alpha將會肅清墜機點，搜尋生還者，並處裡掉殘骸。有問題嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: Alpha 要肃清坠机点，搜寻生还者，并处里掉残骸。有问题吗？

Container.name: 025_a_out_intro
Container.situation: brief mission introduction played by a 'non-miller' soldier. followed by confirmation pop-up.

Key.Original: Kerry, it's good to see you're still in one piece.
Key.Chinese: 克里，真高興見到你還是完整的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，真高兴见到你还活着。

Key.Original: Miller wants to speak to us. Sounds serious. You coming?
Key.Chinese: 米勒想要跟我們說話。聽起來很嚴重。你跟上嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 米勒想要跟我们说话。听起来很严重。你跟上吗？

Container.name: 020_a_m05_intro
Container.situation: brief mission introduction played by a 'non-miller' soldier. followed by confirmation pop-up.

Key.Original: Kerry, you went through diver training, didn't you.
Key.Chinese: 克里，你有通過潛水訓練吧，不是嗎。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，你有通过潜水训练吧，不是吗。

Key.Original: Miller's got an op for us - are you up to it?
Key.Chinese: 米勒有個任務要交付給我們-你準備好了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 米勒有个任务要交付给我们—你准备好了吗？

Container.name: 015_a_m04_intro
Container.situation: brief mission introduction played by a 'non-miller' soldier. followed by confirmation pop-up.

Key.Original: Seems like Miller's set up some sort of supply operation tonight.
Key.Chinese: 看來米勒今晚準備要執行一個補給行動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看来米勒今晚准备要执行一场补给行动。

Key.Original: You in, Kerry?
Key.Chinese: 你要一起來嗎，克里?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你要一起来吗，克里？

Container.name: 010_a_m03_intro
Container.situation: brief mission introduction played by a 'non-miller' soldier. followed by confirmation pop-up.

Key.Original: Shit, looks like we're going to hit Mike-26, Kerry.
Key.Chinese: 該死，看來我們要去攻擊Mike-26了，克里。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死，看来我们要去攻击 Mike-26了，克里。

Key.Original: Miller's going to brief us now. You ready?
Key.Chinese: 米勒準備要跟我們簡報。你準備好了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 米勒准备要跟我们简报。你准备好了吗？

Container.name: 005_a_m02_intro
Container.situation: brief mission introduction played by a 'non-miller' soldier. followed by confirmation pop-up.

Key.Original: Hey, Kerry, did you hear? Bravo ran into some trouble.
Key.Chinese: 嘿，克里，你聽說了嗎?Bravo遇到某些麻煩了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，克里，你听说了吗？Bravo 遇到某些麻烦了。

Key.Original: Sergeant Lacey's pinned down in some village. You ready to go?
Key.Chinese: 中士萊西被壓制在一個村莊。你準備走了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 莱西中士被压制在一个村庄。你准备走了吗？

Container.name: 000_a_m01_intro
Container.situation: brief mission introduction played by a 'non-miller' soldier. followed by confirmation pop-up.

Key.Original: Kerry, good to see you, man, this shit's a mess...
Key.Chinese: 克里，真高興見到你，兄弟，這真是一團混亂...
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，真高兴见到你，兄弟，这真是一团混乱...

Key.Original: Anyway, this 'Captain Miller' wants to speak to us.
Key.Chinese: 總之，這位'米勒上校'希望我們去跟他說幾句話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 总之，这位'米勒上校'希望我们去跟他说几句话。

Key.Original: C'mon, let's find out what's going on. You coming?
Key.Chinese: 來吧，讓我們看看現在到底是啥狀況。你要來嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 来吧，让我们看看现在到底是啥状况。你要来吗？

Key.Original: REPORT IN
Key.Chinese: 報到
Key.Chinesesimp: 报到

Key.Original: Report in with one of the officers preparing to go on an operation.
Key.Chinese: 與準備要執行任務的軍官報到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与准备要执行任务的军官报到。

Key.Original: Rearm (Optional)
Key.Chinese: 重新武裝(支線任務)
Key.Chinesesimp: 重新武装（支线任务）

Key.Original: REARM
Key.Chinese: 重新武裝
Key.Chinesesimp: 重新武装

Key.Original: Pick your loadout.%1%1Be aware, when you've finished a mission briefing, your weapons and equipment may be adjusted to best fit the mission profile.
Key.Chinese: 選擇你的裝備。%1%1請注意，當你完成任務簡報之後，你的武器與裝備將會自動調整成最適合該任務的狀態。
Key.Chinesesimp: 选择你的装备。%1%1请注意，当你完成任务简报之后，你的武器与装备将会自动调整成最适合该任务的状态。

Key.Original: Return to Camp (Optional)
Key.Chinese: 返回營地(支線任務)
Key.Chinesesimp: 返回营地（支线任务）

Key.Original: RETURN
Key.Chinese: 返回
Key.Chinesesimp: 返回

Key.Original: Finish up the patrol by returning to Camp Maxwell.
Key.Chinese: 要結束巡邏，只要返回麥克斯韋營地即可。
Key.Chinesesimp: 要结束巡逻，只要返回麦克斯韦营地即可。

Key.Original: Patrol (Optional)
Key.Chinese: 巡邏(支線任務)
Key.Chinesesimp: 巡逻（支线任务）

Key.Original: Leave the camp and head out on patrol.%1%1This task is optional.
Key.Chinese: 離開營地並出外巡邏。%1%1此任務為支線任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 离开营地并出外巡逻。%1%1此任务为支线任务。

Key.Original: Assemble
Key.Chinese: 集合
Key.Chinesesimp: 集合

Key.Original: ASSEMBLY POINT
Key.Chinese: 集合點
Key.Chinesesimp: 集合点

Key.Original: Choose your equipment and link up with the rest of your team at the assembly point.
Key.Chinese: 選擇你的裝備，並跟你剩下的隊友在集合點碰面。
Key.Chinesesimp: 选择你的装备，并跟你剩下的队友在集合点碰面。

Key.Original: Cpl. Kerry heads out on patrol.
Key.Chinese: 下士克里出外巡邏。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里下士出外巡逻。

Key.Original: Cpl. Kerry heads out on patrol.
Key.Chinese: 下士克里出外巡邏。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里下士出外巡逻。

Key.Original: NATO survivors return to their badly damaged encampment.
Key.Chinese: 北約的倖存者們回到了他們嚴重損毀的營地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约的幸存者们回到了他们严重损毁的营地。

Key.Original: NATO survivors regroup at a disused military base.
Key.Chinese: 北約的倖存者們重新在一個廢棄的軍事營地集結。
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约的幸存者们重新在一个废弃的军事营地集结。

Key.Original: Patrol
Key.Chinese: 巡邏
Key.Chinesesimp: 巡逻

Key.Original: Patrol
Key.Chinese: 巡邏
Key.Chinesesimp: 巡逻

Key.Original: Maxwell
Key.Chinese: 麥克斯韋
Key.Chinesesimp: 麦克斯韦

Key.Original: Maxwell
Key.Chinese: 麥克斯韋
Key.Chinesesimp: 麦克斯韦

Key.Original: Nine hours later...
Key.Chinese: 9小時過後...
Key.Chinesesimp: 9小时过后...

Key.Original: Eight hours later...
Key.Chinese: 8小時過後...
Key.Chinesesimp: 8小时过后...

Key.Original: Seven hours later...
Key.Chinese: 7小時過後...
Key.Chinesesimp: 7小时过后...

Key.Original: Six hours later...
Key.Chinese: 6小時過後...
Key.Chinesesimp: 6小时过后...

Key.Original: Five hours later...
Key.Chinese: 5小時過後...
Key.Chinesesimp: 5小时过后...

Key.Original: Four hours later...
Key.Chinese: 4小時過後...
Key.Chinesesimp: 4小时过后...

Key.Original: Three hours later...
Key.Chinese: 3小時過後...
Key.Chinesesimp: 3小时过后...

Key.Original: Two hours later...
Key.Chinese: 2小時過後...
Key.Chinesesimp: 2小时过后...

Key.Original: One hour later...
Key.Chinese: 1小時過後...
Key.Chinesesimp: 1小时过后...

Key.Original: Ten hours later...
Key.Chinese: 10小時過後...
Key.Chinesesimp: 10小时过后...

Key.Original: The next operation begins at %1:%2.
Key.Chinese: 下一個任務將在%1:%2後開始。
Key.Chinesesimp: 下一个任务将在%1：%2后开始。

Key.Original: YES
Key.Chinese: 是
Key.Chinesesimp: 是

Key.Original: Confirmation
Key.Chinese: 確認
Key.Chinesesimp: 确认

Key.Original: Do you want to start the operation?
Key.Chinese: 你是否要開始任務?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你是否要开始任务？

Key.Original: NOT YET
Key.Chinese: 還不要
Key.Chinesesimp: 还不要

Key.Original: WRECKED TRUCK
Key.Chinese: 卡車殘骸
Key.Chinesesimp: 卡车残骸

Key.Original: ENEMY PATROL ROUTE
Key.Chinese: 敵軍巡邏隊路線
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌军巡逻队路线

Key.Original: ENEMY PATROL
Key.Chinese: 敵軍巡邏隊
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌军巡逻队

Key.Original: DOWNED HELICOPTER
Key.Chinese: 墜落的直升機
Key.Chinesesimp: 坠落的直升机

Key.Original: CONVOY ROUTE
Key.Chinese: 車隊路線
Key.Chinesesimp: 车队路线

Key.Original: CONVOY
Key.Chinese: 車隊
Key.Chinesesimp: 车队

Key.Original: COMBAT ZONE
Key.Chinese: 作戰區域
Key.Chinesesimp: 作战区域

Key.Original: ABANDONED TRUCK
Key.Chinese: 廢棄的卡車
Key.Chinesesimp: 废弃的卡车

Key.Original: ABANDONED GEAR
Key.Chinese: 廢棄的裝備
Key.Chinesesimp: 废弃的装备

Key.Original: WASHROOM
Key.Chinese: 盥洗室
Key.Chinesesimp: 盥洗室

Key.Original: TOILETS
Key.Chinese: 廁所
Key.Chinesesimp: 厕所

Key.Original: SQUAD
Key.Chinese: 小隊
Key.Chinesesimp: 小队

Key.Original: SHOOTING RANGE
Key.Chinese: 靶場
Key.Chinesesimp: 靶场

Key.Original: LIVING QUARTERS
Key.Chinese: 生活區
Key.Chinesesimp: 生活区

Key.Original: INFIRMARY
Key.Chinese: 診療區
Key.Chinesesimp: 诊疗区

Key.Original: HELIPAD
Key.Chinese: 直升機停機坪
Key.Chinesesimp: 直升机停机坪

Key.Original: EQUIPMENT CACHE
Key.Chinese: 儲貨區
Key.Chinesesimp: 储货区

Key.Original: CANTEEN
Key.Chinese: 飲食區
Key.Chinesesimp: 饮食区

Key.Original: BRIEFING AREA
Key.Chinese: 簡報區
Key.Chinesesimp: 简报区

Key.Original: BATHROOMS
Key.Chinese: 淋浴區
Key.Chinesesimp: 淋浴区

Key.Original: ASSEMBLY POINT
Key.Chinese: 集合點
Key.Chinesesimp: 集合点

Key.Original: ARMORY
Key.Chinese: 軍械庫
Key.Chinesesimp: 军械库

Key.Original: Stratis in its entirety lies in enemy hands. Entering enemy territory is inadvisable. We only have fragmented information about their positions. These are marked on your map. It is strongly recommended that you avoid these areas.
Key.Chinese: 斯特拉蒂斯已經整個落入了敵人的手裡。擅闖敵人的領地是不明智的。關於敵方的位置，我們只有零散的情報。已知的敵方位置已經標記在你的地圖上。強烈建議你避開這些區域。
Key.Chinesesimp: 斯特拉蒂斯岛已经完全落入了敌人的手里。擅闯敌人的领地是不明智的。关于敌方的位置，我们只有零散的情报。已知的敌方位置已经标记在你的地图上。强烈建议你避开这些区域。

Key.Original: Stratis in its entirety lies in enemy hands. Entering enemy territory is inadvisable. We only have fragmented information about their positions. These are marked on your map. It is strongly recommended that you avoid these areas.
Key.Chinese: 斯特拉蒂斯已經整個落入了敵人的手裡。擅闖敵人的領地是不明智的。關於敵方的位置，我們只有零散的情報。已知的敵方位置已經標記在你的地圖上。強烈建議你避開這些區域。
Key.Chinesesimp: 斯特拉蒂斯岛已经整个落入了敌人的手里。擅闯敌人的领地是不明智的。关于敌方的位置，我们只有零散的情报。已知的敌方位置已经标记在你的地图上。强烈建议你避开这些区域。

Key.Original: Following an AAF attack during the night, the remaining NATO survivors return to their badly damaged encampment.
Key.Chinese: 在阿爾蒂斯武裝力量夜間的攻擊之後，剩餘的北約倖存者回到了他們嚴重損毀的營地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在 AAF 的夜间攻击之后，剩余的北约幸存者回到了他们严重损毁的营地。

Key.Original: NATO survivors managed to regroup at Camp Maxwell, a disused military base hidden in the woods of central Stratis.
Key.Chinese: 北約的倖存者們重新在麥克斯韋營地集結，一個隱蔽在斯特拉蒂斯中部森林裡的廢棄基地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约的幸存者们重新在麦克斯韦营地集结，一个隐蔽在斯特拉蒂斯岛中部森林里的废弃基地。

Key.Original: To get off to the best possible start - and to get the most out of your experience - please look through a quick set of options. Then, either have a look at what the game offers, or start exploring yourself. A good place to start could be the Bootcamp content in the TUTORIALS menu!
Key.Chinese: 為了能讓你更快開始遊戲-並得到良好的遊戲體驗-請遵照以下步驟來調整遊戲。然後，你就可以選擇你要玩那些內容，我們建議你可以先從新訓中心開始體驗!
Key.Chinesesimp: 为了能让你更快开始游戏—并得到良好的游戏体验—请遵照以下步骤来调整游戏。然后，你就可以选择你要玩那些内容，我们建议你可以先从新训中心开始体验！

Key.Original: Crimson Tide
Key.Chinese: 赤色風暴
Key.Chinesesimp: 赤色风暴

Key.Original: There was an intense fire-fight on the east coast earlier today. Search the area carefully and see what can be found.
Key.Chinese: 今天稍早，我們的東岸發生了一場激烈交火。你可以過去搜索看看，看看有沒有我們能用的東西。
Key.Chinesesimp: 今天稍早，我们的东岸发生了一场激烈交火。你可以过去搜索看看，看看有没有我们能用的东西。

Key.Original: Immobile
Key.Chinese: 廢棄的"獵人"
Key.Chinesesimp: 废弃的"猎人"

Key.Original: Charlie saw an abandoned Hunter while they were retreating back to Camp Maxwell. Search the area, find it, and try to retrieve any useful equipment which may be left there.
Key.Chinese: 據Charlie的回報，在他們撤退回麥克斯韋營地的路上，他們看見了一臺被廢棄的"獵人"。搜索該區，找到那臺"獵人"，看看有沒有我們能用的裝備。
Key.Chinesesimp: 据 Charlie 的回报，在他们撤退回麦克斯韦营地的路上，看见了一台被废弃的"猎人"。搜索该区，找到那辆"猎人"，看看有没有我们能用的装备。

Key.Original: Abandoned Battlefield
Key.Chinese: 廢棄的戰場
Key.Chinesesimp: 废弃的战场

Key.Original: We didn't have time to search Air Station Mike-26 properly after we secured it. Since it's now out of action, the Greenbacks will probably just abandon the place, which gives us an opportunity to salvage any equipment left behind.
Key.Chinese: 在我們肅清Mike-26基地臺的時候，並沒有機會去搜索任何裝備。而且現在看來，綠軍也沒有重新進駐那個被炸毀的地方，這是個機會，能讓我們回去搜索任何有用的裝備。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们在肃清 Mike-26航空站的时候没有机会去搜索任何装备。而且现在看来，绿军也没有重新进驻那个被炸毁的地方，这是个让我们回去搜索任何有用的装备的机会。

Key.Original: Although we suffered heavy losses during the AAF's surprise assault, we at least managed to strike a blow of our own - one Greenback Mohawk was brought down and crashed somewhere north of Camp Maxwell. Investigating the crash site might provide some useful information or supplies.
Key.Chinese: 儘管我們在阿爾蒂斯武裝力量發動攻擊時損失慘重，但我們也讓他們付出了一些代價-我們的人設法擊毀了一臺"莫霍克"，而它就墜毀在麥克斯韋營地北邊的位置。調查墜機現場，搜尋任何有用的資訊或補給品。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管我们在 AAF 发动攻击时损失惨重，但我们也让他们付出了一些代价—我们的人设法击落了一架"莫霍克"，而它就坠毁在麦克斯韦营地北边的位置。调查坠机现场，搜寻任何有用的情报或补给品。

Key.Original: Lucky Shot
Key.Chinese: 幸運一擊
Key.Chinesesimp: 幸运一击

Key.Original: Purchase
Key.Chinese: 購買
Key.Chinesesimp: 购买

Key.Original:
FULL GAME REQUIRED

We hope you've enjoyed the first episode of 'The East Wind'!

This version of the game does not include the second and third campaign episodes. Purchase the full game to continue playing (after purchasing you'll need to shut down the game and update it first).

ADAPT & WIN

Adapt: Cut off from the outside world, surviving NATO forces make their way to the Altis mainland seeking the assistance of local guerrilla forces.

Win: The Republic of Altis and Stratis sits at the center of an escalating global conflict. As the world stands on the brink of all-out war, NATO forces join the fray.
Key.Chinese:
需要完整版遊戲

我們希望你很享受'東風'戰役的第一章!

本版本並沒有包括第二章與第三章。請購買完整版遊戲來繼續體驗戰役其餘的章節(購買之後，你必須先關閉遊戲讓他進行更新)。

適應&勝利

適應:與外界失去聯繫，北約倖存的部隊想辦法抵達了阿爾蒂斯主島，並尋求當地反抗軍的幫助。

勝利:隨著阿爾蒂斯與斯特拉蒂斯持續的動盪不安。世界也面臨隨時要展開下一場世界大戰的局面，此時此刻，北約派遣部隊誓言要搶回阿爾蒂斯和斯特拉蒂斯。
Key.Chinesesimp:
需要完整版游戏

我们希望你很享受'东风'战役的第一章！

本版本并没有包括第二章与第三章。请购买完整版游戏来继续体验战役其余的章节（购买之后，你必须先关闭游戏让他进行更新）。

适应&胜利

适应：与外界失去联系，北约幸存的部队想办法抵达了阿爾蒂斯主岛，并寻求当地反抗军的帮助。

胜利：随着阿爾蒂斯与斯特拉蒂斯持续的动荡不安。世界也面临随时要展开下一场世界大战的局面，此时此刻，北约派遣部队誓言要抢回阿爾蒂斯和斯特拉蒂斯。

Key.Original: Purchase the full game via Steam.
Key.Chinese: 透過Steam購買完整版的遊戲。
Key.Chinesesimp: 通过 Steam 购买完整版的游戏。

Key.Original: check out showcases of our new features and gameplay, load up quick and fun challenges, explore multiplayer in Arma 3 Zeus and other modes, or dig into the sandbox with the Eden Editor.
Key.Chinese: 透過任務展示來體驗新的內容與特色，快速著裝來試試各種挑戰，玩玩新的武裝突襲3宙斯多人模式與其他各種模式，或者深入伊甸編輯器來製作各種任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 透过任务展示来体验新的内容与特色，快速着装来试试各种挑战，玩玩新的武装突袭3宙斯多人模式与其他各种模式，或者深入伊甸编辑器来制作各种任务。

Key.Original: FREE TIME REMAINING
Key.Chinese: 免費剩餘時間
Key.Chinesesimp: 免费剩余时间

Key.Original: Welcome to this free <t color='%1'>Steam</t> version of the next evolution in the <t color='%1'>Arma</t> series! For a limited time, you'll be able to explore almost the entire core game - excluding the singleplayer 'The East Wind' campaign. Pick up the game now at a discounted price to play through the story, and to enjoy the full Arma 3 experience. To get started in Arma 3, we'd like to let you know what the game is about, what's new since Arma 2, and how to get going.
Key.Chinese: 歡迎來到免費<tcolor='%1'>Steam</t>體驗版，來試玩新一代的<tcolor='%1'>武裝突襲</t>!在有限的時間裡面，你可以自由的探索整個遊戲-包括'東風'戰役的第一章。你也可以趁著打折時刻順便入手完整版遊戲，並加入武裝突襲3這個大家庭。在開始玩武裝突襲3之前，我們想先跟你介紹一下這款遊戲，並說明它與2代有哪些不同之處，並且要如何深入研究。
Key.Chinesesimp: 欢迎来到免费<tcolor='%1'>Steam</t>体验版，来试玩新一代的<tcolor='%1'>武装突袭</t>！在有限的时间里面，你可以自由的探索整个游戏—包括'东风'战役的第一章。你也可以趁着打折时刻顺便入手完整版游戏，并加入武装突袭3这个大家庭。在开始玩武装突袭3之前，我们想先跟你介绍一下这款游戏，并说明它与2代有哪些不同之处，并且要如何深入研究。

Key.Original: PREPARE FOR OPERATION
Key.Chinese: 準備作戰
Key.Chinesesimp: 准备作战

Key.Original: Gear up and join your squad.
Key.Chinese: 穿上裝備，加入小隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 穿上装备，加入小队。

Key.Original: ATTEND BRIEFING
Key.Chinese: 出席簡報
Key.Chinesesimp: 出席简报

Key.Original: Your presence at the briefing is required.
Key.Chinese: 你必須出席簡報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你必须出席简报。

Key.Original: REARM REMINDER
Key.Chinese: 重新整裝提醒
Key.Chinesesimp: 重新整装提醒

Key.Original: Adjust your loadout at the armory.
Key.Chinese: 在軍械庫調整你的裝備。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在军械库调整你的装备。

Key.Original: MISSING REQUIRED GEAR!
Key.Chinese: 任務需求裝備!
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务需求装备！

Key.Original: Grab the required items from the armory.
Key.Chinese: 從軍械庫拿取任務所需裝備。
Key.Chinesesimp: 从军械库拿取任务所需装备。

Key.Original: INVENTORY FULL!
Key.Chinese: 裝備已滿!
Key.Chinesesimp: 装备已满！

Key.Original: Some gear could not be added.
Key.Chinese: 某些裝備不能被加入。
Key.Chinesesimp: 某些装备不能被加入。

Key.Original: ADDING GEAR FAILED!
Key.Chinese: 裝備加入失敗!
Key.Chinesesimp: 装备加入失败！

Key.Original: GEAR ADDED
Key.Chinese: 裝備已加入
Key.Chinesesimp: 装备已加入

Key.Original: Take Default Loadout
Key.Chinese: 拿取預設裝備
Key.Chinesesimp: 拿取预设装备

Key.Original: List of Required Gear:
Key.Chinese: 需求裝備清單:
Key.Chinesesimp: 需求装备清单：

Key.Original: Vest
Key.Chinese: 背心
Key.Chinesesimp: 背心

Key.Original: Uniform
Key.Chinese: 制服
Key.Chinesesimp: 制服

Key.Original: Secondary Weapon Ammo
Key.Chinese: 副武器彈藥
Key.Chinesesimp: 副武器弹药

Key.Original: Secondary Weapon
Key.Chinese: 副武器
Key.Chinesesimp: 副武器

Key.Original: Primary Weapon Rounds
Key.Chinese: 主武器彈藥
Key.Chinesesimp: 主武器弹药

Key.Original: Primary Weapon
Key.Chinese: 主武器
Key.Chinesesimp: 主武器

Key.Original: Headgear
Key.Chinese: 頭盔
Key.Chinesesimp: 头盔

Key.Original: Handgun Rounds
Key.Chinese: 手槍彈藥
Key.Chinesesimp: 手枪弹药

Key.Original: Handgun
Key.Chinese: 手槍
Key.Chinesesimp: 手枪

Key.Original: Backpack
Key.Chinese: 背包
Key.Chinesesimp: 背包

Key.Original: Gear is given to you automatically the first time you get to the armory.
Key.Chinese: 裝備會在你第一次進入軍械庫時自動拿給你。
Key.Chinesesimp: 装备会在你第一次进入军械库时自动拿给你。

Key.Original: Required Gear
Key.Chinese: 需求裝備
Key.Chinesesimp: 需求装备

Key.Original:
%3%11%4 requires the following gear:
%12
Start Briefing
Key.Chinese: 開始簡報
Key.Chinesesimp: 开始简报

Key.Original: Start Patrol
Key.Chinese: 開始巡邏
Key.Chinesesimp: 开始巡逻

Key.Original: Select starting position
Key.Chinese: 選擇開始的位置
Key.Chinesesimp: 选择开始的位置

Key.Original: It's great to have you with us as we take on the next evolution of the <t color='%1'>Arma</t> series! To get started, we'd like to let you know what Arma 3 is about, what's new since Arma 2, and how to get going.
Key.Chinese: 很高興來跟你分享這次<tcolor='%1'>武裝突襲</t>有哪些進化!首先，我們想要讓你知道武裝突襲3的新內容，和有哪些內容是跟武裝突襲2不一樣的，還有我們未來將要怎樣走下去。
Key.Chinesesimp: 很高兴来跟你分享这次<tcolor='%1'>武装突袭</t>有哪些进化！首先，我们想要让你知道武装突袭3的新内容，和有哪些内容是跟武装突袭2不一样的，还有我们未来将要怎样走下去。

Key.Original: WHAT'S NEW?
Key.Chinese: 有哪些新特色?
Key.Chinesesimp: 有哪些新特色？

Key.Original: Sandbox
Key.Chinese: 沙盒
Key.Chinesesimp: 沙盒

Key.Original: many supporting static items and objects to use in the editor: medical supplies, survival equipment and more
Key.Chinese: 許多新的靜態物件可以在編輯者模式中使用:像是醫療補給品，生存裝備等等
Key.Chinesesimp: 许多新的静态物件可以在编辑者模式中使用：像是医疗补给品，生存装备等等

Key.Original: Radio protocols
Key.Chinese: 無線電對話
Key.Chinesesimp: 无线电对话

Key.Original: full British accent actor recordings
Key.Chinese: 完整收錄英國口音，讓你的英國士兵不再講美式英文
Key.Chinesesimp: 完整收录英国口音，让你的英国士兵不再讲美式英文

Key.Original: Zubr revolver
Key.Chinese: "野牛"左輪手槍
Key.Chinesesimp: "野牛"左轮手枪

Key.Original: .45 ACP sidearm and Yorris optic
Key.Chinese: .45 ACP手槍和"約里斯"瞄準鏡
Key.Chinesesimp: .45 ACP 手枪和"约里斯"瞄准镜

Key.Original: 4-Five pistol
Key.Chinese: 4-Five手槍
Key.Chinesesimp: 4-Five 手枪

Key.Original: heavy sidearm and MRD optic
Key.Chinese: 重型手槍和掛盾式設計瞄準鏡
Key.Chinesesimp: 重型手枪和挂盾式设计瞄准镜

Key.Original: Rahim rifle
Key.Chinese: "拉希姆"步槍
Key.Chinesesimp: "拉希姆"步枪

Key.Original: brand-new CSAT marksman rifle and DMS scope
Key.Chinese: 全新的廣協同盟精準射手步槍和精準射手瞄準鏡
Key.Chinesesimp: 全新的广协精准射手步枪和精准射手瞄准镜

Key.Original: Team Arma 3
Key.Chinese: 武裝突襲3開發團隊
Key.Chinesesimp: 武装突袭3开发团队

Key.Original: As always, thank you for your support and enjoy the first episode!
Key.Chinese: 與往常一樣，我們還是很感謝你的支持，祝你玩戰役第一章愉快!
Key.Chinesesimp: 与往常一样，我们还是很感谢你的支持，祝你玩战役第一章愉快！

Key.Original: More at www.arma3.com/whatsnewsurvive
Key.Chinese: 更多訊息請詳見www.arma3.com/whatsnewsurvive
Key.Chinesesimp: 更多信息请详见 www.arma3.com/whatsnewsurvive

Key.Original: Besides the campaign episode, we've added more content for everyone to use in their own creations:
Key.Chinese: 除了戰役，我們也新增了許多物件來供每個玩家擺進他們的任務裡:
Key.Chinesesimp: 除了战役，我们也新增了许多物件来供每个玩家摆进他们的任务里：

Key.Original: THE EAST WIND
Key.Chinese: 東風
Key.Chinesesimp: 东风

Key.Original: Tensions rise and you find yourself in the middle of an escalating situation.
Key.Chinese: 緊張的局勢不斷地攀升，而你將會發現你正處在這個緊張的狀況當中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 紧张局势不断升温，而你将会发现你身处于升级态势的中心。

Key.Original: The resulting power vacuum is quickly filled by CSAT forces.
Key.Chinese: 而趁著這個權力真空的時候，廣協同盟部隊則快速地趁虛而入。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这所导致的势力真空使得广协部队快速趁虚而入。

Key.Original: Several years of uneasy cease-fire have led to a staged draw down of troops in the area.
Key.Chinese: 在這幾年令人不安的停火中，部隊階段性的撤離該地區。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在这几年令人不安的停火中，部队被阶段性的撤离该地区。

Key.Original: NATO is reducing its presence in the Republic of Altis and Stratis.
Key.Chinese: 北約正逐漸減少他們在阿爾蒂斯和斯特拉蒂斯共和國上的駐軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约正逐渐减少他们在阿尔蒂斯和斯特拉蒂斯共和国领土上的驻军。

Key.Original: More at www.arma3.com/campaign
Key.Chinese: 更多訊息請詳見www.arma3.com/campaign
Key.Chinesesimp: 更多信息请详见 www.arma3.com/campaign

Key.Original: You are Corporal Ben Kerry - an infantryman deployed to Stratis as part of a Mediterranean peace-keeping effort.
Key.Chinese: 你將扮演下士本·克里-一名被派駐在斯特拉蒂斯的步兵，為了地中海的和平而努力。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你将扮演下士本·克里—一名被派驻在斯特拉蒂斯岛的步兵，为了地中海的和平而努力。

Key.Original: PLAY NOW?
Key.Chinese: 現在玩?
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在玩？

Key.Original: Indifferent
Key.Chinese: 不感興趣?
Key.Chinesesimp: 不感兴趣？

Key.Original: not interested in the campaign? Check out the other added content, and stay tuned for more to come.
Key.Chinese: 你不對戰役感興趣嗎?那就來看看其他的新內容，並時時關注我們接下來的其他更新。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你不对战役感兴趣吗？那就来看看其他的新内容，并时时关注我们接下来的其他更新。

Key.Original: Holistic
Key.Chinese: 等待完全劇情?
Key.Chinesesimp: 等待完全剧情？

Key.Original: do you prefer to play the whole story in one go, then we recommend waiting for the other episodes.
Key.Chinese: 你是一個喜歡一次玩玩整個故事劇情的玩家嗎?那就請稍等我們的其他章節。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你是一个喜欢一次玩玩整个故事剧情的玩家吗？那就请稍等我们的其他章节。

Key.Original: Episodic
Key.Chinese: 章節式遊玩?
Key.Chinesesimp: 章节式游玩？

Key.Original: don't mind waiting for the next episode, then by all means enjoy 'Survive' right now!
Key.Chinese: 不用特別等待下一個章節，你現在就可以盡情的用各種玩法來享受'生存'!
Key.Chinesesimp: 不用特别等待下一个章节，你现在就可以尽情的用各种玩法来享受'生存'！

Key.Original: Since we're releasing the campaign in several episodes, please have a think about what play style fits you best:
Key.Chinese: 因為我們的戰役將會使用章節的方式釋出，你可以想想看你想用哪種方式來玩戰役:
Key.Chinesesimp: 因为我们的战役将会使用章节的方式释出，你可以想想看你想用哪种方式来玩战役：

Key.Original: Welcome to the first campaign episode: <t color='%1'>'Survive'</t>. Let's quickly go over what the campaign is about and what else we've added to the Arma 3%2 sandbox.
Key.Chinese: 歡迎來到戰役的第一個章節:<tcolor='%1'>'生存'</t>。讓我們來快速的觀看戰役的內容，和有哪些新東西被加進武裝突襲3的%2沙盒。
Key.Chinesesimp: 欢迎来到战役的第一个章节：<tcolor='%1'>'生存'</t>。让我们来快速的观看战役的内容，和有哪些新东西被加进武装突袭3的%2沙盒。

Key.Chinese: 隱藏
Key.Chinesesimp: 隐藏

Key.Chinese: 隱藏
Key.Chinesesimp: 隐藏

Key.Chinese: 顯示
Key.Chinesesimp: 显示

Key.Chinese: 顯示
